0c66756d449f863d16c6d41bb9932d521197b178.title: An ELR communication method, apparatus and readable storage medium
0c66756d449f863d16c6d41bb9932d521197b178.abstract: This application relates to an ELR communication method, apparatus and readable storage medium. The method comprises: generating and sending an ELR PPDU. The ELR PPDU comprises a first field, which is generated based on an ELR identification sequence, and the ELR identification sequence is carried on 53 subcarriers whose subcarrier indexes are -26 to 26. The elements of the ELR identification sequence on the subcarriers whose subcarrier indexes are {-24,-20,-16,-12,-8,-4,4,8,12,16,20,24} are all 0. This application can improve the accuracy of packet detection. This application supports IEEE protocols such as 802.11bn/UHR/Wi-Fi 8, integrated millimeter wave/IMMW, UWB, or Sensing. This application also supports the spark link/spark link/nearlink standard protocol, etc.

ebf5a233c3acfb17d857d452cb0f1fcd04ef5701.title: Thermal runaway test system with ignition capability and thermal runaway test method for lithium battery wherein the system comprises a machine body, a test chamber, a cover, a battery test trough, a thermal runaway triggering device, an igniter, and a control device
ebf5a233c3acfb17d857d452cb0f1fcd04ef5701.abstract: This invention relates to a thermal runaway test system and thermal runaway test method for lithium batteries. The thermal runaway test system includes a machine body, a test chamber, a cover, a battery test trough, a thermal runaway triggering device, an igniter, and a control device. The test chamber is disposed in the machine body and has a chamber and an opening. The cover is movable between a closed position and an open position. The battery test trough is located in the chamber and is used for placing a lithium battery. The thermal runaway triggering device is controllable to apply at least one trigger to the lithium battery. An ignition end of the igniter extends into the chamber. The control device is electrically connected to the thermal runaway triggering device and the igniter. The control device controls the thermal runaway triggering device to generate the at least one trigger, and controls the ignition end of the igniter to generate a spark in the chamber.

70856c3c39790484a8634fb85d364cd2f628665c.title: SHARED CIRCUITRY CONFIGURATIONS FOR PLASMA GENERATION
70856c3c39790484a8634fb85d364cd2f628665c.abstract: The present disclosure provides shared circuitry configurations that may be implemented in a plasma generation system to improve control over application of electrical energy to a plasma generator, thereby providing improved performance. In some embodiments, shared circuitry configurations described herein may be implemented to improve performance of a traveling spark igniter that is configured to generate and propagate plasma using a Lorentz force and a thermal force, such as by applying electrical energy to electrodes of a plasma generator following breakdown between the electrodes. Other plasma generator configurations may also benefit from the circuitry configurations described herein.

affed87147ee17cfc47eb91dd9eb9e3cfbf6a7b2.title: HYDROPHOBIC FILTER MEDIUM
affed87147ee17cfc47eb91dd9eb9e3cfbf6a7b2.abstract: A filter medium is provided that comprises a nonwoven layer. The nonwoven layer comprises a sizing agent and a hydrophobic, stiffening binder resin. The nonwoven layer may be corrugated. A method producing a filter medium is also provided. The filter medium may be a fuel filter, oil filter, air filter, or an electric discharge filter. The filter medium, after corrugation, pleating, or embossing, avoids or minimizes water ingress, while still allowing the filter medium to maintain its structural and filtration properties.

fa0cd947aea822ae2220e92f718c150357a1f2c2.title: SUBSTRATE TREATMENT APPARATUS AND SUBSTRATE TREATMENT METHOD
fa0cd947aea822ae2220e92f718c150357a1f2c2.abstract: The present invention provides an apparatus for treating a substrate. The apparatus for treating a substrate may include: a process treatment unit that provides a treatment space in which the substrate is treated; and a plasma generation unit that is provided above the process treatment unit and generates plasma from a process gas. The plasma generation unit includes: a plasma chamber having an electric discharge space formed therein; a shield unit surrounding the exterior of the plasma chamber; an antenna which surrounds the shield unit from the outside of the shield unit and to which high-frequency power is applied; and a connecting unit electrically connecting the shield unit and the antenna.

682fdfa5b936b7f67425b916bd033e9227988e82.title: SYSTEM AND METHOD OF NANOCARBON MATERIALS MANUFACTURING BY PULSE ELECTRIC DISCHARGE IN LIQUID
682fdfa5b936b7f67425b916bd033e9227988e82.abstract: A system for manufacturing a nanomaterial may include a first electrode; a second electrode spaced apart from the first electrode by a gap; and a chamber configured to enclose the first electrode, the second electrode, and a liquid. The system may also include a power supply configured to provide electrical energy to at least one of the first electrode and the second electrode; and a pump configured to cause the liquid to flow through the gap between the first electrode and the second electrode.

c86c5c2860cac06dde6e5ac5c2a999ff40218ec9.title: DISPOSITIF DE COMMANDE POUR MACHINE D'ÉLECTROÉROSION PAR FIL ET PROCÉDÉ DE COMMANDE POUR USINAGE PAR ÉLECTROÉROSION PAR FIL
c86c5c2860cac06dde6e5ac5c2a999ff40218ec9.abstract: This control device for a wire electric discharge machine includes: a movement control unit that causes a wire electrode to move along a machining path; a voltage control unit that controls a machining power supply and applies a machining voltage across poles; and a machining control unit that maintains a non-discharge state in which discharge does not occur between the poles until the wire electrode reaches a first position on the machining path, that, upon the wire electrode reaching the first position, gradually increases the discharge density so that the discharge density of the discharge becomes a set value set as a machining condition, and that, upon the wire electrode reaching the first position again, gradually decreases the discharge density to achieve a non-discharge state.

9a962559e9d30c07ff6125648d325ce04e25786e.title: Electric discharge machine for precision process
9a962559e9d30c07ff6125648d325ce04e25786e.abstract: 본 발명은 전극의 세팅시간을 줄이고 작업능률을 향상시킬 수 있는 정밀 세팅 및 가공을 포함하는 정밀 가공용 방전 가공기에 관한 것으로서, 상측의 헤드부(100)와 하측의 거치부(200)로 구분하면서 헤드부(100)와 거치부(200) 사이가 개방된 형태로 형성된 본체부, 상기 본체부에 구비되며 피가공물(20)이 거치되는 거치부(200), 상기 거치부(200)의 상면에 돌출 형성되어 상기 피가공물(20)이 지지되며 전류가 흐르는 음극전극부, 상기 거치부(200)의 상면을 마주하도록 배치되며 전류가 흐르는 양극전극부(180) 및, 상기 양극전극부(180)를 고정하면서 높이 및 좌우이동을 제어하는 지그이동부(100a)를 구성하며, 상기 지그이동부(100a)는, 동력부(110)와 상기 동력부(110) 하측에 위치한 높이조절부(120)와 상기 높이조절부(120) 하측에 위치한 연결체(140)와 상기 연결체(140) 하측에 위치한 지그회전체(150)와 상기 지그회전체(150)의 하측에 위치한 전극지그(160)와 상기 전극지그(160) 하측에 위치한 소정의 수직길이로 형성된 전극(170)과 상기 전극(170)의 하측에 위치하여 피가공물의 가공부위에 접촉하는 제1전극팁(183)으로 구성된 양극전극부(180)를 포함하며, 상기 양극전극부(180)는, 전극(170) 하단에 연결되는 수직형 제1몸체(181-1)와 상기 제1몸체(181-1)의 일측면 하단에서 수평으로 연결되면서 상면 중앙에서 하면 중앙으로 관통된 제1체결공(181-3)이 형성된 제2몸체(181-2)로 구성된 제1지지부(181)와, 상기 제1지지부(181)의 제2몸체(181-2) 하부에 배치되어 제1체결공(181-3)의 위치에 대응된 제2체결공(182-1)이 형성되면서 하면 중앙에 제1전극팁(183)의 상부를 결속하는 제1삽입공이 형성된 전극연결체(182)를 포함하는 것을 특징으로 한다.

eb94df87382c4ace19f72525b79ae3d62c640526.abstract: 본 발명은 전극의 세팅시간을 줄이고 작업능률을 향상시킬 수 있는 정밀 세팅 및 가공을 포함하는 방전 가공 시스템에 관한 것으로서, 외관을 형성하는 본체부, 상기 본체부에 구비되며 피가공물이 거치되는 거치부(200), 상기 거치부(200)의 상면에 돌출 형성되어 상기 피가공물이 지지되며 전류가 흐르는 음극전극부, 상기 거치부(200)의 상면을 마주하도록 배치되며 전류가 흐르는 양극전극부(180), 상기 양극전극부(180)를 고정하면서 높이 및 좌우이동을 제어하는 지그이동부(100a) 및, 상기 피가공물의 방전가공을 제어하는 방전제어모듈을 포함하는 방전가공기가 구비되며, 상기 방전제어모듈은, 피가공물의 3D 도면을 이용하여 상기 피가공물의 방전 가공을 자동으로 수행하는 방전가공프로그램과, 상기 피가공물의 방전 가공시 상기 방전가공기에 설치된 센서들의 측정값을 화면에 표시하고 동작 상태를 실시간으로 화면에 표시하는 모니터와, 상기 방전가공기의 동작을 제어하는 신호를 입력하는 동작스위치 입력부와, 상기 방전가공프로그램을 저장하고, 상기 피가공물의 방전 가공 측정값을 시간대별로 저장하는 메모리 및, 상기 동작스위치 입력부의 입력 신호와 상기 방전가공프로그램에 따라 방전 가공을 자동 수행을 제어하는 제어부로 구성되며, 상기 지그이동부(100a)는, 동력부(110)와 상기 동력부(110) 하측에 위치한 높이조절부(120)와 상기 높이조절부(120) 하측에 위치한 연결체(140)와 상기 연결체(140) 하측에 위치한 지그회전체(150)와 상기 지그회전체(150)의 하측에 위치한 전극지그(160)와 상기 전극지그(160) 하측에 위치한 소정의 수직길이로 형성된 전극(170)과 상기 전극(170)의 하측에 위치하여 피가공물의 가공부위에 접촉하는 제1전극팁(183)으로 구성된 양극전극부(180)를 포함하는 것을 특징으로 한다.

4e81459718c10ab96a44e71ce89819bc3da63ccb.title: ELECTROSTATIC CHUCK
4e81459718c10ab96a44e71ce89819bc3da63ccb.abstract: An electrostatic chuck 10 includes a dielectric substrate 100, an internal electrode 140 provided inside the dielectric substrate 100, a base plate 200 in which a through hole 230 is formed, a power supply member 400 that is a member for supplying power to the internal electrode 140 and is inserted through the through hole 230, and an insulating member 500 arranged between an inner surface of the through hole 230 and the power supply member 400. The insulating member 500 includes a tubular first insulating member 510, and a tubular second insulating member 520 covering a part of the first insulating member 510 on an outer peripheral side. The electrostatic chuck 10 further includes an annular member 530 for preventing an electric discharge along a path from the power supply member 400 to the inner surface of the through hole 230 passing between the first insulating member 510 and the second insulating member 520.

027d33897f4c8b9a6cc37514bf97d9c41db6d2c8.title: DISPOSITIF DE LEVAGE DE RÉSERVOIR D'USINAGE POUR MACHINE À DÉCHARGE ÉLECTRIQUE
027d33897f4c8b9a6cc37514bf97d9c41db6d2c8.abstract: This machining tank lifting device of an electric discharge machine lifts a machining tank (4) in which a machining liquid is stored. The machining tank lifting device of the electric discharge machine includes: a drive source (1) and a rack pinion (2) for lifting the machining tank (4) on the depth side of the machining tank (4); and a cylinder (5), having the function of preventing the front side of the machining tank (4) from dropping down in relation to the depth side, on the front side of the machining tank (4).

d67a16d179b6dd6783170bcdba3887da751c58d3.title: Co shift unit for the conversion of solid waste into syngas
d67a16d179b6dd6783170bcdba3887da751c58d3.abstract: According to the invention, solid recovered fuel pellets are torrefied to charred pellets, producing torrefaction gas that is converted into a torrefaction syngas containing hydrogen and carbon monoxide. A syngas stream comprising the torrefaction syngas is supplied to a CO shift unit, where carbon monoxide reacts with water steam to carbon dioxide and hydrogen, generating shifted syngas. The invention provides that the shifted syngas is passed through a low temperature heat recovery unit, where its heat energy is transferred to at least two process water streams that are used as process water during the production of the product gas stream. By utilizing this heat, waste heat losses are reduced, and the overall energy efficiency of the process is improved. Further, an increased hydrogen content of the product gas is achieved.

b86d49091639e3f70c5e88cce7d46c2b1cad78ec.title: TRAITEMENT DE CHARGES D'ALIMENTATION MONOCOTYLÉDONES POUR DÉPULPAGE
b86d49091639e3f70c5e88cce7d46c2b1cad78ec.abstract: Feedstock including an amphiphilic lignocellulosic biomass can be processed using enzymes prior to pulping. The enzymes break down the biomass by disrupting the surface or cell walls or by reducing wax or other components. Such enzymes include cellulases, hemicellulases, laccases, peroxidases, and pectinases. Suitable enzymes can be obtained from secretions of microbes in soil organic matter from soil in which the feedstock was grown. If the pulping process includes steam explosion, such enzy matic processing of a biomass prior to steam explosion will increase absorption of water by the processed feedstock. In steam explosion, due to the increased ability of the processed feedstock to absorb water, steam explosion is more effective in breaking apart the processed feedstock. For other pulping processes, such enzymatic treatments break down the biomass, enabling extraction of the desired components from the processed feedstock through subsequent processing using less energy and fewer chemicals.

d021e2b72ea3109703de3233741656a7b0c1aae2.title: GÉNÉRATEUR DE FUMÉE ET SYSTÈME FOURNISSANT DES PARTICULES DE FUMÉE DANS UNE ARMOIRE À FUMÉE
d021e2b72ea3109703de3233741656a7b0c1aae2.abstract: The present invention relates to a smoke generator (10; 10a; 10b) comprising a housing (15) with a condensate inlet (11) for receiving a smoke condensate and a steam inlet (12) for receiving overheated water steam, wherein the smoke condensate is converted to smoke particles when the smoke condensate interacts with the overheated water steam, and the smoke particles are accessible at a smoke outlet (13). The invention also relates to a system for feeding smoke particles to a smoke cabinet (23).

d46c01a0ab9d67cd602276cbe31ef21e0581cf5b.title: Stable supply system for hydrogen production by clean energy and control method thereof
d46c01a0ab9d67cd602276cbe31ef21e0581cf5b.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of hydrogen production, in particular to a stable supply system for hydrogen production through clean energy and a control method of the stable supply system. The gas mixing chamber is used for mixing methanol steam and desalted water steam to form mixed gas; the heat preservation chamber is arranged outside the gas mixing chamber and is used for preserving heat of the gas mixing chamber through hydrogen mixed gas output by the reaction chamber; the reaction hydrogen production unit is connected with the raw material mixing unit and is used for providing chemical reaction conditions of the mixed gas to generate hydrogen mixed gas of hydrogen and carbon dioxide; the gas separation unit is used for separating the hydrogen mixed gas to output pure hydrogen; the detection unit is used for detecting the internal air pressure of the gas mixing chamber, the air pressure of the gas inlet of the reaction chamber, the air pressure of the gas outlet of the reaction chamber and the vibration frequency of the gas mixing chamber; the hydrogen production stability is improved.

d1081e40a6c48ab0d2fc9cb65f27daac01731f10.title: Steam-water separation device for cooking equipment and cooking equipment
d1081e40a6c48ab0d2fc9cb65f27daac01731f10.abstract: The utility model relates to the technical field of kitchen appliances, in particular to a steam-water separation device for cooking equipment and the cooking equipment, the steam-water separation device for the cooking equipment comprises a separator, the separator comprises a separation pipe and a separation plate, the separation plate is arranged in the separation pipe and divides the separation pipe into a steam inlet side and a steam outlet side, and the steam inlet side is communicated with the steam outlet side. Screen holes are formed in the separation plate, steam flows in from one end of the separation pipe, penetrates through the screen holes in the separation plate and flows out from the other end of the separation pipe, and the separation plate is used for water-steam separation. The steam passes through the separation plate through the sieve holes of the separation plate, and in the process, the separation plate can intercept water drops, so that the water drops can be intercepted more efficiently, water accumulation is reduced, the influence on food nutrition and taste is reduced, and the use effect of the cooking equipment is improved.

bb6903a0962703734c5effb449101f4d1ad30b6b.title: Selective condensation mechanism and wastewater treatment equipment and method with selective condensation function
bb6903a0962703734c5effb449101f4d1ad30b6b.abstract: The invention discloses a selective condensation mechanism and wastewater treatment equipment and method with selective condensation, the selective condensation mechanism is a condensation plate, the condensation plate comprises a main body part and a selective condensation coating covering the main body part, the main body part is internally provided with a cooling cavity used for containing a refrigerant, and the selective condensation coating covers the main body part. The affinity of the selective condensation coating and impurities in waste water steam is greater than that of the main body part and the impurities in the waste water steam; or the selective condensation mechanism is a condensation pipeline, the condensation pipeline comprises an inner pipeline and an outer pipeline which are sleeved with each other, a cooling cavity used for containing a refrigerant is formed between the inner pipeline and the outer pipeline, and the selective condensation coating is arranged on the inner wall of the inner pipeline; the affinity of the selective condensation coating and impurities in waste water steam is greater than that of the condensation plate and the impurities in the waste water steam. The energy consumption in the condensation process can be reduced, and organic components in waste water can be separated and recycled easily.

d5e931b7f8150af7971979e7d1a77830ed99964a.title: Flow control sauna machine
d5e931b7f8150af7971979e7d1a77830ed99964a.abstract: The utility model discloses a flow control sauna machine, and belongs to the technical field of steam sauna machines. A flow control sauna machine comprises a switching box, a water inlet part is arranged at the front end of the switching box, and a bag body is arranged in the rear end of the switching box; a water outlet is formed in the water inlet part, and a connecting pipeline is arranged between the water outlet and the bag body, so that the water inlet part is communicated with the bag body; a flow blocking piece is arranged at the lower end of the water outlet, the flow blocking piece floats on the liquid level, close to the water outlet end, in the connecting pipeline under the normal condition, the density of the flow blocking piece is smaller than that of water, and the flow blocking piece does not have water absorption; the diameter of the flow blocking piece is larger than that of the water outlet. The diameter of the flow blocking piece is smaller than that of the connecting pipeline. Water-steam conversion can be effectively carried out by reducing the water drainage speed, and water backflow is prevented.

4a1f4203a5893bb94381ea4d5280fdeb3baa824c.title: Water-vapor separation box, faucet and multifunctional water dispenser
4a1f4203a5893bb94381ea4d5280fdeb3baa824c.abstract: The water vapor separation box comprises a box body, one side of the box body is provided with a hot water inlet, the other side of the box body is provided with a water outlet nozzle, the water outlet nozzle is provided with a steam exhaust outlet and hot water outlets, the hot water outlets comprise the first hot water outlet and the second hot water outlet, and the steam exhaust outlet is communicated with the steam exhaust outlet. A stop block is arranged above the water outlet nozzle; the bottom wall of the inner cavity of the box body is inclined from the hot water inlet to the stop block to form an inclined surface; by designing the reasonable layout of the hot water inlet, the hot water outlet and the steam exhaust outlet and arranging the stop block and the inclined bottom wall in the box body, steam and water flow can be effectively separated in the flowing process of hot water. Steam is discharged through the steam discharging channel, hot water is discharged through the hot water channels with different heights according to the hydrodynamic law, efficient water vapor separation is achieved, and it is ensured that output hot water is more stable and purer.

d9dd0fcf95bd1b6951ed38c95a23e8c944c4dae4.title: Zero-power-consumption thermal power cold end system vacuum optimization device
d9dd0fcf95bd1b6951ed38c95a23e8c944c4dae4.abstract: The invention discloses a zero-power-consumption thermal power cold end system vacuum optimization device, which belongs to the technical field of vacuum optimization, and comprises a front vacuum absorber, an annular water-gas self-oscillation processing mechanism, a gas-gas-liquid self-separation device and a gas-liquid isolation secondary separation device which are sequentially connected in series, and the output end is connected with a condenser hot well through a gas-liquid isolation secondary separation device. The chemical replenishment water is dynamically mixed with the steam-steam mixture at the outlet of the condenser through jet entrainment, so that water steam is condensed, after the formed steam-steam mixture is separated, non-condensable gas is extracted by vacuumizing equipment, and liquid is recycled to a hot well. The device does not need extra energy consumption, the vacuum degree of the condenser is effectively improved through multi-stage mixing, separation and recovery closed loops, and coal consumption and operation cost are reduced.

dc5350f8552845fb9b34689691d438b8863ffbbc.title: APPAREIL DE FABRICATION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
dc5350f8552845fb9b34689691d438b8863ffbbc.abstract: The present invention relates to an apparatus for manufacturing lithium sulfide. By using the apparatus according to the present invention, when manufacturing lithium sulfide by a reaction between a lithium raw material and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction is performed under relatively mild conditions as compared to the prior art, such that frequent repair or replacement due to corrosion and failure of a reactor and various piping is not required, thereby improving the economic efficiency of the process. In addition, unreacted hydrogen sulfide and a solvent, from which moisture has been removed, are reused, thereby reducing process costs and securing economic feasibility during mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed, thereby preventing a reverse reaction to lithium hydroxide and promoting a forward reaction, thus enabling high-quality lithium sulfide to be produced with high purity and high yield. In addition, particle size can be adjusted in units of ㎛ without a separate pulverization space or a separate pulverization step, thus providing excellent convenience and mass productivity.

07f6e45aa34eeb4385acda3f9819f0bce0c372be.title: PROCÉDÉ DE PRÉPARATION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
07f6e45aa34eeb4385acda3f9819f0bce0c372be.abstract: The present invention relates to a method for preparing lithium sulfide. According to the present invention, when lithium sulfide is prepared by a reaction between a lithium raw material and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction proceeds under relatively mild conditions compared with conventional technologies. Thus, repair or replacement due to corrosion and failure of reactors and various piping components is not frequently required, thereby improving the economic feasibility of the process. In addition, the unreacted hydrogen sulfide and solvent from which moisture has been removed can be reused, thereby reducing process costs and securing economic feasibility in mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed, thereby preventing the reverse reaction to lithium hydroxide and promoting the forward reaction to prepare high-quality lithium sulfide with high purity and high yield.

1ae89601d3f45fed94b34ec915024f6ae82ffd6c.title: PROCÉDÉ DE PRODUCTION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
1ae89601d3f45fed94b34ec915024f6ae82ffd6c.abstract: The present invention relates to a method for producing lithium sulfide. According to the present invention, when producing lithium sulfide by a reaction between a lithium source and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction is performed under relatively mild conditions compared to the prior art, and thus the economic efficiency of the process is improved since frequent repairs or replacements necessitated by corrosion and failure of a reactor and various piping are not required. In addition, since dehydrated, unreacted hydrogen sulfide and solvents are recycled, the process cost is reduced, and thus economic efficiency can be achieved in mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed to prevent a reverse reaction to lithium hydroxide and promote a forward reaction, thereby enabling the production of high-quality lithium sulfide with high purity and high yield. In addition, particle size can be adjusted at a µm level without a separate pulverization space or pulverization step, and thus excellent convenience and mass productivity are achieved.

12a40d6a1eef39de4a94997ac9aaa7b6ccec1c61.title: PROCÉDÉ DE PRÉPARATION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
12a40d6a1eef39de4a94997ac9aaa7b6ccec1c61.abstract: The present invention relates to a method for preparing lithium sulfide. According to the present invention, when preparing lithium sulfide by a reaction between a lithium raw material and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction is carried out under relatively mild conditions as compared to the prior art, and thus frequent repair or replacement due to corrosion and failure of a reactor and various piping is not required, thereby improving the economic feasibility of the process. In addition, by reusing unreacted hydrogen sulfide from which moisture has been removed and a solvent, process costs are reduced, thereby ensuring economic feasibility during mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed, thus preventing a reverse reaction back to lithium hydroxide and promoting a forward reaction, thus enabling the production of high-quality lithium sulfide with high purity and high yield. In addition, particle size adjustment can be achieved in units of μm without a separate pulverization space or pulverization step, thereby providing excellent convenience and mass production.

f2a7053e6d9f3e0aba5c636bc37374e7353ba35d.title: PROCÉDÉ DE PRODUCTION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
f2a7053e6d9f3e0aba5c636bc37374e7353ba35d.abstract: The present invention relates to a method for producing lithium sulfide. According to the present invention, when producing lithium sulfide by a reaction between a lithium source and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction is performed under relatively mild conditions compared to the prior art, and thus the economic efficiency of the process is improved since frequent repairs or replacements necessitated by corrosion and failure of a reactor and various piping are not required. In addition, since dehydrated, unreacted hydrogen sulfide and solvents are recycled, the process cost is reduced, and thus economic efficiency can be achieved in mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed to prevent a reverse reaction to lithium hydroxide and promote a forward reaction, thereby enabling the production of high-quality lithium sulfide with high purity and high yield.

c401a92ba619ab33d0b2ce6b7f8c7ddfcfdeeab2.title: SYSTÈME DE PRODUCTION D'HYDROGÈNE
c401a92ba619ab33d0b2ce6b7f8c7ddfcfdeeab2.abstract: Provided is a hydrogen production system (40) which comprises: an exhaust heat reception unit (41) that receives exhaust heat generated by an external exhaust heat source (11); a water vapor generation unit (42) that generates water vapor by heating water by means of the exhaust heat received by the exhaust heat reception unit (41); a cell stack (43) that electrolyzes the water vapor generated by the water vapor generation unit (42) so as to generate hydrogen; and a replenishment unit (44) that, when the amount of exhaust heat is insufficient with respect to the amount necessary for generating the required amount of water vapor, replenishes water, water vapor, or the water vapor generation unit (42) with heat, or replenishes the cell stack (43) with water vapor from an external water vapor supply source (95).

aa51ad62560c662af2194fd867639464d0ccfd80.title: APPAREIL DE PRODUCTION DE BIOCHARBON POREUX À HAUTE PERFORMANCE
aa51ad62560c662af2194fd867639464d0ccfd80.abstract: Disclosed is an apparatus for manufacturing a high-performance porous biochar, capable of preventing water vapor and gas in a carbonization facility from leaking to the outside, and preventing a coking phenomenon in which livestock manure remaining in a carbonization furnace adheres to the inner circumferential surface of the carbonization furnace. The apparatus for manufacturing a high-performance porous biochar comprises: a livestock manure supply facility for supplying and transferring a large amount of livestock manure containing moisture; and a carbonization facility for, when the livestock manure is input from the livestock manure supply facility, creating an oxygen-blocked atmosphere within the carbonization facility and heating the carbonization facility to a predetermined temperature to carbonize the livestock manure, wherein the livestock manure supply facility is configured to automatically open and close an outlet according to whether the livestock manure is discharged, and seal a connection portion between the livestock manure supply facility and the carbonization facility.
aa51ad62560c662af2194fd867639464d0ccfd80.system_message:

8aa6b0021f63b303feb8e46f24b328f4d908e0a6.title: SPECTROSCOPIE DE POLARISATION À EFFET STARK ET PROCÉDÉS
8aa6b0021f63b303feb8e46f24b328f4d908e0a6.abstract: A method of and system for monitoring the level of hydrogen peroxide gas in a system such as an isolation barrier. Gas is sampled from the system to a gas cell. The sampled gas may include hydrogen peroxide gas and water vapor. A laser beam from a laser source at a known polarization state is passed through the gas cell and the hydrogen peroxide gas and water vapor therein. An electrical field is created in the gas cell to reduce optical interference from water vapor while preserving the ability to more accurately measure the concentration of hydrogen peroxide gas in the gas cell. A change in the polarization state of the laser beam after passage through the gas cell is detected. Based on the detected change in the polarization state of the laser beam, the concentration of the hydrogen peroxide gas in the gas cell is determined.
8aa6b0021f63b303feb8e46f24b328f4d908e0a6.system_message:

ae65c6f44ed7a4b899d0083cf600f33bde97cc42.title: STRUCTURE ORGANOMÉTALLIQUE
ae65c6f44ed7a4b899d0083cf600f33bde97cc42.abstract: This metal organic framework comprises a first ligand that has a benzene ring and has two or more functional groups for coordination, and a second ligand that does not contain a benzene ring and contains one functional group for coordination. The ratio of the water vapor adsorption level per unit mass of the metal organic framework at a relative pressure of 0.95 to the water vapor adsorption level per unit mass of a basic structure MOF at a relative pressure of 0.95 is 84% or greater in a water vapor isotherm measured at 298K when a metal organic framework having only the first ligand as a ligand is identified as the basic structure MOF on the basis of the results of powder XRD analysis of the metal organic framework.

ba8e8fac472b5c01c4ac1b921d14484f4a95f738.title: Ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen storage cabin
ba8e8fac472b5c01c4ac1b921d14484f4a95f738.abstract: An ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen storage cabin is provided with a cylindrical inner cabin, the inner cabin is supported and fixed in an outer cabin through a filling layer, the inner cabin and the outer cabin form a filling layer space, and the filling layer space is filled with low-temperature LNG or low-temperature liquid nitrogen. The inner cabin is composed of an inner cabin outer wall and an inner cabin inner wall, the inner cabin outer wall and the inner cabin inner wall form a vacuum layer, and the vacuum layer is filled with perlite and vacuumized. A double-layer compartment is arranged, an insulating layer is laid on an outer compartment, an inner compartment is of a vacuum double-wall heat insulation structure, and the space between the inner compartment and the outer compartment is filled with LNG or liquid nitrogen with the temperature close to that of liquid hydrogen. According to the scheme, the ultralow-temperature liquid state maintenance of-163 DEG C LNG or-196 DEG C liquid ammonia medium is easily realized through a mature reliquefaction system, so that the liquid state maintenance of the ultralow-temperature-253 DEG C liquid hydrogen medium is indirectly ensured, the heat transfer between the liquid hydrogen cabin and the external environment can be greatly reduced, and the technical difficulty and the technical cost of ultralow-temperature storage of the liquid hydrogen are reduced.

179a7321ffb2922332ada2e23ce44465855df996.title: Liquid hydrogen medium active exhaust cooling test system and method
179a7321ffb2922332ada2e23ce44465855df996.abstract: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen medium active exhaust cooling test system and method. The system comprises a vacuum module, a liquid hydrogen storage box module, a gas replacement and filling module, an exhaust cooling test module, a helium pressurization module, a leakage and safe discharge module, an external heat flow simulation module and a measurement and control module. According to the scheme, on the basis of simulating the external vacuum environment, the test of active exhaust cooling of the liquid hydrogen medium space is achieved through gas replacement, filling, testing and the like, and compared with the prior art, the liquid hydrogen medium space active exhaust cooling device is comprehensive in function.

2d9c74926bdc5bd9724dcaea60c81a4569b86b00.title: Emergency cut-off stop valve for liquid hydrogen
2d9c74926bdc5bd9724dcaea60c81a4569b86b00.abstract: The utility model provides an emergency cut-off stop valve for liquid hydrogen, which comprises a valve body, a valve clack, a fixer and a sealing ring, and the valve clack is arranged in the valve body; the valve clack is suitable for abutting against the side wall of a runner opening in the valve body. The fixer is connected with the bottom of the valve clack; the sealing ring is arranged between the valve clack and the fixator and is configured to protrude out of the circumferential side of the valve clack, and the part, protruding out of the circumferential side of the valve clack, of the sealing ring is suitable for abutting against the side wall of a runner opening in the valve body and sealing the runner opening; the side wall depth of a flow channel opening in the valve body is larger than the width of the sealing ring protruding out of the circumferential side of the valve clack. The depth of the side wall of the flow channel opening in the valve body is larger than the width of the part, protruding out of the circumferential side of the valve clack, of the sealing ring, after the sealing ring loses efficacy due to excessive abrasion, effective sealing can still be formed through tight attaching between the valve clack and the side wall of the flow channel opening in the valve body, and liquid hydrogen medium leakage is prevented.

ffc15dbc3187722c9877d203187de09ec42fd2bc.title: Methane hydrogen regeneration olefin recovery system
ffc15dbc3187722c9877d203187de09ec42fd2bc.abstract: The system is characterized in that the input end of a methane hydrogen heater is communicated with a demethanizer, and the output end of the methane hydrogen heater is communicated with the input end of a liquid phase dryer; the output end of the mixed C4 heater is communicated between the output end of the methane hydrogen heater and the input end of the liquid phase dryer; the output end of the gas-liquid separation tank is communicated with the input end of the regenerated methane hydrogen coalescer; and the output end of the regenerated methane hydrogen coalescer is communicated with the input end of an external fuel pipe network. According to the utility model, a mixed C4 steam stripping process and a regenerated methane hydrogen secondary dehydration process are added, so that the water content in regenerated methane hydrogen gas is ensured to meet the requirements of receiving conditions of a fuel gas pipe network. According to the system for regenerating and recycling olefin by using methane hydrogen, disclosed by the invention, a mixed C4 and methane hydrogen medium is self-produced, so that the purpose of regenerating and recycling ethylene-propylene olefin substances by using the liquid-phase dryer is achieved, the nitrogen consumption and the torch gas emission are reduced, and the ethylene-propylene yield and the resource utilization rate are improved.

8d101d7901bf150ddaa919f0ec5689c32a973085.title: Graphene preparation system and method
8d101d7901bf150ddaa919f0ec5689c32a973085.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of graphene preparation, and provides a graphene preparation system and method.The system comprises a gas supply device, a plasma synthesis device, a gas-solid separation device, a product collection device, a tail gas separation device and a hydrogen storage device. The invention relates to a graphene preparation method, which comprises the following steps: ionizing a medium gas to generate plasma, and introducing a reaction gas to carry out a synthesis reaction; separating the reacted gas from a reaction product; settling and collecting the obtained reaction product; separating the obtained gas into hydrogen, medium gas and reaction gas; the medium gas and the reaction gas are recycled after being compressed, and the separated hydrogen is purified and stored. According to the technical scheme, the production cost is reduced, the material handling capacity is large, the productivity is high, the method is suitable for industrial application, energy consumption is low, pollution is avoided, expandability is high, and the application range is wide.

ae42d4c6a3f7d2469ba56afabe52c3fc7885af8f.title: Normal-pressure storage tank for storing liquid hydrogen
ae42d4c6a3f7d2469ba56afabe52c3fc7885af8f.abstract: The utility model provides a normal-pressure storage tank for storing liquid hydrogen. The normal-pressure storage tank comprises an inner tank made of metal and used for containing a low-temperature liquid hydrogen medium, an outer tank located outside the inner tank and made of metal, a heat insulation interlayer located in an interlayer between the inner tank and the outer tank and playing a heat insulation role, and a cold shield arranged in the heat insulation interlayer. The cold shield comprises a cold shield coil pipe which is made of a metal material and is coiled in the heat insulation interlayer, the inlet end of the cold shield coil pipe is connected with a boil-off gas outlet of the gas phase space at the top of the inner tank, and the outlet end of the cold shield coil pipe penetrates through the outer tank, extends out of the outer tank and is connected with a boil-off gas recovery device. The cold shield medium entering the cold shield is liquid hydrogen evaporated gas in the inner tank, the defect of high daily evaporation rate of a liquid hydrogen low-temperature normal-pressure storage technology can be overcome without introducing an external cold source, and the operation cost of the normal-pressure storage tank is reduced.

cf9d7f4a8973cd5aaca7b86dab0484bc42674cdb.title: Structure and method for improving air tightness of rapid cooling section of continuous annealing furnace in high-hydrogen mode
cf9d7f4a8973cd5aaca7b86dab0484bc42674cdb.abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of plate and strip production and equipment, and particularly relates to a structure and method for improving air tightness of a rapid cooling section of a continuous annealing furnace in a high-hydrogen mode, the structure comprises a sealing roller chamber shell, a roller and sealing roller chamber shell lining refractory bricks, the bottom of the roller is in sealing connection with a graphite sealing gasket, and the bottom and the two ends of the graphite sealing gasket are fixed through castable; back lining plates are arranged between the two ends of the castable and the sealing roller chamber shell lining refractory bricks, the positions between the back lining plates and the sealing roller chamber shell lining refractory bricks are filled with micropore heat insulation plates, and gaps of the upper end, the side wall and the bottom in the sealing roller chamber are filled with ceramic fibers. The invention mainly aims to ensure the stability of the sealing roller chamber structure of the rapid cooling section, improve the sealing performance in the roller chamber, prevent excessive hydrogen medium from overflowing to the slow cooling section and the overaging section, save the consumption of hydrogen energy and ensure the safety of a unit.

ad7f6b100d26c4b9dc3ec99912a8ccf4fe0e232f.title: Medium filtering method and device based on hydrogen purity instrument
ad7f6b100d26c4b9dc3ec99912a8ccf4fe0e232f.abstract: The invention discloses a medium filtering method and device based on a hydrogen purity instrument. The method comprises the following steps: connecting a sampling pipe to a source of a medium to be measured so as to conveniently introduce the medium; the other end of the sampling pipe is connected with the filtering device, so that the medium passes through the sampling pipe before entering the filtering device; the filtered oil mist is adsorbed and sampled through a filter element in the filtering device, and the oil mist is separated from the hydrogen medium; oil gathered in the filtering device is introduced into the oil storage tank through the drainage pipe; a pressure sensing module and an automatic oil drain valve are installed at the bottom of the oil storage tank. According to the medium filtering method and device based on the hydrogen purity instrument, on one hand, the measurement accuracy of hydrogen purity parameters is improved, a reliable basis is provided for operators to monitor and maintain the purity of hydrogen, and the operation economy and safety of a generator are guaranteed; on the other hand, the automatic oil discharging valve is adopted to achieve the automatic sewage discharging function, the daily maintenance workload is reduced, and the automation level of equipment is improved.

59bcdc7005801909d0a4f6a0255fc3855adc1247.title: Storage cabin capable of storing ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen
59bcdc7005801909d0a4f6a0255fc3855adc1247.abstract: A storage cabin capable of storing ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen is provided with a cylindrical inner cabin, the inner cabin is supported and fixed in an outer cabin through a filling layer, the inner cabin and the outer cabin form a filling layer space, and the filling layer space is filled with low-temperature LNG or low-temperature liquid nitrogen. The inner cabin is composed of an inner cabin outer wall and an inner cabin inner wall, the inner cabin outer wall and the inner cabin inner wall form a vacuum layer, and the vacuum layer is filled with perlite and vacuumized. A double-layer compartment is arranged, an insulating layer is laid on an outer compartment, an inner compartment is of a vacuum double-wall heat insulation structure, and the space between the inner compartment and the outer compartment is filled with LNG or liquid nitrogen with the temperature close to that of liquid hydrogen. According to the scheme, the ultralow-temperature liquid state maintenance of-163 DEG C LNG or-196 DEG C liquid ammonia medium is easily realized through a mature reliquefaction system, so that the liquid state maintenance of the ultralow-temperature-253 DEG C liquid hydrogen medium is indirectly ensured, the heat transfer between the liquid hydrogen cabin and the external environment can be greatly reduced, and the technical difficulty and the technical cost of ultralow-temperature storage of the liquid hydrogen are reduced.

fc5a01a70d685138af7674413de647f46c798932.title: High-temperature solid hydrogen storage and SOEC coupling hydrogen production and storage integrated system and method
fc5a01a70d685138af7674413de647f46c798932.abstract: The invention discloses a high-temperature solid hydrogen storage and SOEC coupling hydrogen production and storage integrated system and method. The system comprises a water supply device, and the end of the water supply device is connected with a suction device; one end of the recovery device is connected with the suction device, and the other end is connected with a reaction device; the SOEC electrolytic reactor is connected with the reaction device, the SOEC electrolytic reactor comprises an anode end and a cathode end, and the anode end is connected with the recovery device; one end of the air delivery device is mounted between the reaction device and the SOEC electrolytic reactor, and the other end of the air delivery device is connected with a hydrogen high-temperature heat recovery device; the first end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with the hydrogen high-temperature heat recovery device, the second end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with the reaction device, the third end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with a condenser, the fourth end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with a dryer, and the condenser is connected with the dryer. Medium-temperature and high-temperature heat energy released in the hydrogen storage process of the high-temperature metal hydride is recycled through the heat recycling device and used for producing high-temperature superheated steam needed by SOEC electrolysis, and the good heat and mass synergistic effect is achieved on the whole.

ed2310263ee120e925707db45d4c1e158663d157.title: METHOD AND UNIT FOR PREPARATION AND FINE PROCESSING OF HYDROCARBON STOCK
ed2310263ee120e925707db45d4c1e158663d157.abstract: FIELD: oil and gas production. ^ SUBSTANCE: invention refers to a method of preparing and fine processing of hydrocarbon stock involving heating of stock and hydrogen, preparation of end-products; herewith liquid (oil, black oil, oil refining and petrochemistry remains) charge stock is heated up to the temperature above 20-50C and exposed to thermal and/or thermomechanical (non-catalytic) cracking, molecular hydrogen and/or hydrogen enriched light hydrogenous mediums (natural or accompanying gas, gas and light fractions of oil refining and petrochemistry), if required are heated up separately from charge stock, supplied at greater pressure than that of the heating stage, to the stage of producing active atomic hydrogen and/or light radicals to a reactor or reactor package with a catalyst heated to the required temperature, thereafter produced active hydrogen and/or light radicals are supplied to a stock heating and cracking zone for the reaction; the reaction products are supplied to the separation stage; a portion of gas and light fractions and also unreacted hydrogen and/or light hydrogenous initial mediums after the separation stage are supplied to the start of the process and introduced into the charge stock, light end fractions of reaction after the separation stage mainly with end boiling point to 350-360C, partially or completely supplied on the stage of producing light end commodity products (condensed gas, petrol, kerosene, diesel fuel) and/or partially returned and introduced into charge stock, heavy remains after the separation stage mainly with start boiling point 360C and above, are partially or completely supplied for producing heavy commodity products (bitumen, coke), and, probably, partially or completely supplied for reprocessing by the given method to the start of the process together with charge stock; the stock and/or separation remain cracking and heating stages, hydrogen and/or hydrogenous medium and catalyst heating, production of active atomic hydrogen and/or light radicals and separation into light portion and heavy remains are combined in one device, and the ratio of the surface of the reactor or reactors with the catalyst to volume of the stock heating and/or cracking shall be increased so that maximally increase the interaction (reaction) area of atomic hydrogen and/or light radicals and heated or cracked hydrocarbon stock for effective utilisation of reacting products. The invention also concerns a unit for preparation and fine processing of hydrocarbon stock. ^ EFFECT: higher yield of light end products. ^ 19 cl, 3 tbl, 15 dwg

fff1c65cbee8b151bb48fa961f5c2b2964007644.title: COMPOSITION AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING ETTRINGITE COATED FIBER AND AGGLOMERATE
fff1c65cbee8b151bb48fa961f5c2b2964007644.abstract: PURPOSE: A fiber is provided to sediment an ettringite crystalline on the surface of the fiber or the other disposition in a hydrogenous medium. CONSTITUTION: An ettringite coated agglomerate is manufactured by: generating an ettringite in a hydrogenous slurry while being near a fiber, an agglomerate, or other filling material for forming a mineralized complex material including an ettringite treated fiber, agglomerate, or other filling material; and the ettringite treated fiber, agglomerate, and other filling material reacting in the existence of water for forming the ettringite by adding a reactive material such as a calcium oxide and a sulfuric aluminium being sedimented to the surface of the treated fiber or the other disposition. Therefore, the ettringite treated fiber, agglomerate, and other filling material are added to a hydrogenous hardening material for improving a chemical and a mechanical combinations between the fiber and other dispositions in a concrete material.

52118c0e6e015e1f849ee89e2c437f7b8efa3a8d.title: Bipolarplatte sowie Brennstoffzelle mit einer Bipolarplatte
52118c0e6e015e1f849ee89e2c437f7b8efa3a8d.abstract: The plate (10) has a main surface for a fuel cell stack, where the surface is surrounded by outer edges (14) of the plate. A cathode input and a cathode output are provided at a cathode side, and an anode input and an anode output are provided at an anode side. A hydrogenous medium is fed to the anode side and a medium containing oxygen is fed to the cathode side. An outer edge of the stack is freely accessible, where the plate is coated at its outer edges by a sealant (15) and the sealant forms a frame (16) around the plate. A polymer material is provided as the sealant.

e182d69bec2d2c0d55d0a85f9621c5a9c963d7e4.title: ACTIVE INKING SYSTEM FOR SELF-SERVICE BANKING EQUIPMENT
e182d69bec2d2c0d55d0a85f9621c5a9c963d7e4.abstract: The invention relates to an active inking system (1) which is fixed to the paying module (25) of self-service equipment. Said system includes a modification in the upper cover (4) of the cassette (24), where three upper holes (5) and one front hole (6) are made; the upper holes (5) fix the spreader assembly (2) and the front hole (6) receives the male quick coupler (13) through which the ink (29) enters. The system (1) comprises a spark sensor (14), component fixing structure (12), male quick coupler (13), ink cylinders (15), screws (16), ink outlet connections (20), actuating trigger (17), CO2 gas cylinders (18), tubes (19) and connections (21) for compressed gas. The spreader assembly (2) comprises a tank (10) aligned with the front opening (6) of the top cover (4) of the cassette (24), the tank (10) in communication with the spreader tube (8) equipped with holes (9) directed to the notes (7) through which the ink (29) is ejected for marking them. The sparks (27) activate the spark sensor (14) that activates the trigger (17), breaks the seal (28) of the CO2 cylinder (18), pressurizes the tubes for compressed gas (19), moves the front (22) and rear (23) pistons and pushes the ink (29).

6364c2656a70b0531de8ce4f803633945c35608a.title: CONFIGURATIONS DE CIRCUITERIE PARTAGÉE POUR LA GÉNÉRATION DE PLASMA
6364c2656a70b0531de8ce4f803633945c35608a.abstract: The present disclosure provides shared circuitry configurations that may be implemented in a plasma generation system to improve control over application of electrical energy to a plasma generator, thereby providing improved performance. In some embodiments, shared circuitry configurations described herein may be implemented to improve performance of a traveling spark igniter that is configured to generate and propagate plasma using a Lorentz force and a thermal force, such as by applying electrical energy to electrodes of a plasma generator following breakdown between the electrodes. Other plasma generator configurations may also benefit from the circuitry configurations described herein.

37f75d3e65bcc818cb09718d4c3cd71ef2ecfec5.title: Enhanced electrostatic discharge trap for microphones
37f75d3e65bcc818cb09718d4c3cd71ef2ecfec5.abstract: An electrostatic discharge trap device for protecting a water-resistant microphone from electrostatic discharge may include a conductive material positioned between a microphone port and a microphone venting stack-up to prevent liquid entry into the microphone, wherein the electrostatic discharge trap device is configured to receive an electric spark from the microphone port and conduct the electric spark away from the microphone venting stack-up to a conductive layer.

a2596a0f913ec2c1d0abb09070b79c7e23d843d9.title: INTRAVASCULAR LITHOTRIPSY CATHETER WITH OMNI-DIRECTIONAL SHOCK WAVE EMITTERS
a2596a0f913ec2c1d0abb09070b79c7e23d843d9.abstract: An exemplary catheter for generating shock waves includes a catheter body; an enclosure mounted to the catheter body; an emitter band positioned at least partially around the catheter body and within the enclosure; and at least three electrodes positioned adjacent to the emitter band and spaced apart from the emitter band by respective spark gaps, the at least three electrodes together with the emitter band forming electrode pairs of at least three shock wave emitters of the emitter band, wherein at least one of the at least three shock wave emitters can be driven separately from at least one other of the at least three shock wave emitters.
a2596a0f913ec2c1d0abb09070b79c7e23d843d9.system_message:

0464c2a4cd8abc6cfa9aac4167b7cc218c70a0a6.title: PROCÉDÉ DE COMMUNICATION ET APPAREIL DE COMMUNICATION
0464c2a4cd8abc6cfa9aac4167b7cc218c70a0a6.abstract: The present application provides a communication method and a communication apparatus, applied to the field of communications. The technical solution of the present application can support IEEE protocols, such as IEEE 802.11be/Wi-Fi 7/EHT protocol, IEEE 802.11bn/UHR/Wi-Fi 8 protocol, Integrated mmWave/integrated millimeter wave/IMMW protocol, IEEE 802.15/UWB protocol, IEEE 802.11bf/sensing protocol, or spark link/nearlink standard protocol. In the technical solution of the present application, sensing devices indicate relative position acquisition related information, thereby facilitating acquisition of the relative position between the sensing devices, improvement of the accuracy of a sensing result and the flexibility of sensing device deployment, and broadening of the range of application scenarios of sensing measurement.

ee8776d70df7fa943855612ebdd7ab15b32c8e8f.title: An ELR communication method, apparatus and readable storage medium
ee8776d70df7fa943855612ebdd7ab15b32c8e8f.abstract: This application relates to an ELR communication method, apparatus and readable storage medium. The method comprises: generating and sending an ELR PPDU. The ELR PPDU comprises a first field, which is generated based on an ELR identification sequence, and the ELR identification sequence is carried on 53 subcarriers whose subcarrier indexes are -26 to 26. The elements of the ELR identification sequence on the subcarriers whose subcarrier indexes are {-24,-20,-16,-12,-8,-4,4,8,12,16,20,24} are all 0. This application can improve the accuracy of packet detection. This application supports IEEE protocols such as 802.11bn/UHR/Wi-Fi 8, integrated millimeter wave/IMMW, UWB, or Sensing. This application also supports the spark link/spark link/nearlink standard protocol, etc.

8fa2c3df87eb342d1caaba2fb0226b6fdcd60ed5.title: Thermal runaway test system with ignition capability and thermal runaway test method for lithium battery wherein the system comprises a machine body, a test chamber, a cover, a battery test trough, a thermal runaway triggering device, an igniter, and a control device
8fa2c3df87eb342d1caaba2fb0226b6fdcd60ed5.abstract: This invention relates to a thermal runaway test system and thermal runaway test method for lithium batteries. The thermal runaway test system includes a machine body, a test chamber, a cover, a battery test trough, a thermal runaway triggering device, an igniter, and a control device. The test chamber is disposed in the machine body and has a chamber and an opening. The cover is movable between a closed position and an open position. The battery test trough is located in the chamber and is used for placing a lithium battery. The thermal runaway triggering device is controllable to apply at least one trigger to the lithium battery. An ignition end of the igniter extends into the chamber. The control device is electrically connected to the thermal runaway triggering device and the igniter. The control device controls the thermal runaway triggering device to generate the at least one trigger, and controls the ignition end of the igniter to generate a spark in the chamber.

81c567cc3d92780de66ec78edfad71e6b744f350.title: SHARED CIRCUITRY CONFIGURATIONS FOR PLASMA GENERATION
81c567cc3d92780de66ec78edfad71e6b744f350.abstract: The present disclosure provides shared circuitry configurations that may be implemented in a plasma generation system to improve control over application of electrical energy to a plasma generator, thereby providing improved performance. In some embodiments, shared circuitry configurations described herein may be implemented to improve performance of a traveling spark igniter that is configured to generate and propagate plasma using a Lorentz force and a thermal force, such as by applying electrical energy to electrodes of a plasma generator following breakdown between the electrodes. Other plasma generator configurations may also benefit from the circuitry configurations described herein.

8a36722cb162f5051d3494a3e169fc56fdb81b9e.title: HYDROPHOBIC FILTER MEDIUM
8a36722cb162f5051d3494a3e169fc56fdb81b9e.abstract: A filter medium is provided that comprises a nonwoven layer. The nonwoven layer comprises a sizing agent and a hydrophobic, stiffening binder resin. The nonwoven layer may be corrugated. A method producing a filter medium is also provided. The filter medium may be a fuel filter, oil filter, air filter, or an electric discharge filter. The filter medium, after corrugation, pleating, or embossing, avoids or minimizes water ingress, while still allowing the filter medium to maintain its structural and filtration properties.

5a87e0de96bb0821fc5ba173af42615c3f8d9ea2.title: SUBSTRATE TREATMENT APPARATUS AND SUBSTRATE TREATMENT METHOD
5a87e0de96bb0821fc5ba173af42615c3f8d9ea2.abstract: The present invention provides an apparatus for treating a substrate. The apparatus for treating a substrate may include: a process treatment unit that provides a treatment space in which the substrate is treated; and a plasma generation unit that is provided above the process treatment unit and generates plasma from a process gas. The plasma generation unit includes: a plasma chamber having an electric discharge space formed therein; a shield unit surrounding the exterior of the plasma chamber; an antenna which surrounds the shield unit from the outside of the shield unit and to which high-frequency power is applied; and a connecting unit electrically connecting the shield unit and the antenna.
5a87e0de96bb0821fc5ba173af42615c3f8d9ea2.system_message:

bdfdea85160980c3cf8a7f708e3c2c047818a225.title: SYSTEM AND METHOD OF NANOCARBON MATERIALS MANUFACTURING BY PULSE ELECTRIC DISCHARGE IN LIQUID
bdfdea85160980c3cf8a7f708e3c2c047818a225.abstract: A system for manufacturing a nanomaterial may include a first electrode; a second electrode spaced apart from the first electrode by a gap; and a chamber configured to enclose the first electrode, the second electrode, and a liquid. The system may also include a power supply configured to provide electrical energy to at least one of the first electrode and the second electrode; and a pump configured to cause the liquid to flow through the gap between the first electrode and the second electrode.

735a6e7427cd00a664c0ebf4883b1ec4b15ed9e6.title: DISPOSITIF DE COMMANDE POUR MACHINE D'ÉLECTROÉROSION PAR FIL ET PROCÉDÉ DE COMMANDE POUR USINAGE PAR ÉLECTROÉROSION PAR FIL
735a6e7427cd00a664c0ebf4883b1ec4b15ed9e6.abstract: This control device for a wire electric discharge machine includes: a movement control unit that causes a wire electrode to move along a machining path; a voltage control unit that controls a machining power supply and applies a machining voltage across poles; and a machining control unit that maintains a non-discharge state in which discharge does not occur between the poles until the wire electrode reaches a first position on the machining path, that, upon the wire electrode reaching the first position, gradually increases the discharge density so that the discharge density of the discharge becomes a set value set as a machining condition, and that, upon the wire electrode reaching the first position again, gradually decreases the discharge density to achieve a non-discharge state.

e5a42159e8961a873e0b1f257f97f1d2029417f4.title: Electric discharge machining system for precision setting and process
e5a42159e8961a873e0b1f257f97f1d2029417f4.abstract: 본 발명은 전극의 세팅시간을 줄이고 작업능률을 향상시킬 수 있는 정밀 세팅 및 가공을 포함하는 방전 가공 시스템에 관한 것으로서, 외관을 형성하는 본체부, 상기 본체부에 구비되며 피가공물이 거치되는 거치부(200), 상기 거치부(200)의 상면에 돌출 형성되어 상기 피가공물이 지지되며 전류가 흐르는 음극전극부, 상기 거치부(200)의 상면을 마주하도록 배치되며 전류가 흐르는 양극전극부(180), 상기 양극전극부(180)를 고정하면서 높이 및 좌우이동을 제어하는 지그이동부(100a) 및, 상기 피가공물의 방전가공을 제어하는 방전제어모듈을 포함하는 방전가공기가 구비되며, 상기 방전제어모듈은, 피가공물의 3D 도면을 이용하여 상기 피가공물의 방전 가공을 자동으로 수행하는 방전가공프로그램과, 상기 피가공물의 방전 가공시 상기 방전가공기에 설치된 센서들의 측정값을 화면에 표시하고 동작 상태를 실시간으로 화면에 표시하는 모니터와, 상기 방전가공기의 동작을 제어하는 신호를 입력하는 동작스위치 입력부와, 상기 방전가공프로그램을 저장하고, 상기 피가공물의 방전 가공 측정값을 시간대별로 저장하는 메모리 및, 상기 동작스위치 입력부의 입력 신호와 상기 방전가공프로그램에 따라 방전 가공을 자동 수행을 제어하는 제어부로 구성되며, 상기 지그이동부(100a)는, 동력부(110)와 상기 동력부(110) 하측에 위치한 높이조절부(120)와 상기 높이조절부(120) 하측에 위치한 연결체(140)와 상기 연결체(140) 하측에 위치한 지그회전체(150)와 상기 지그회전체(150)의 하측에 위치한 전극지그(160)와 상기 전극지그(160) 하측에 위치한 소정의 수직길이로 형성된 전극(170)과 상기 전극(170)의 하측에 위치하여 피가공물의 가공부위에 접촉하는 제1전극팁(183)으로 구성된 양극전극부(180)를 포함하는 것을 특징으로 한다.

a442feba08142ba4ae48cdeb3bd3fd23bd0af5fe.title: ELECTROSTATIC CHUCK
a442feba08142ba4ae48cdeb3bd3fd23bd0af5fe.abstract: An electrostatic chuck 10 includes a dielectric substrate 100, an internal electrode 140 provided inside the dielectric substrate 100, a base plate 200 in which a through hole 230 is formed, a power supply member 400 that is a member for supplying power to the internal electrode 140 and is inserted through the through hole 230, and an insulating member 500 arranged between an inner surface of the through hole 230 and the power supply member 400. The insulating member 500 includes a tubular first insulating member 510, and a tubular second insulating member 520 covering a part of the first insulating member 510 on an outer peripheral side. The electrostatic chuck 10 further includes an annular member 530 for preventing an electric discharge along a path from the power supply member 400 to the inner surface of the through hole 230 passing between the first insulating member 510 and the second insulating member 520.

671e3a4ad6d0cfa9d22dffa91ecb2cf272468fa3.title: DISPOSITIF DE LEVAGE DE RÉSERVOIR D'USINAGE POUR MACHINE À DÉCHARGE ÉLECTRIQUE
671e3a4ad6d0cfa9d22dffa91ecb2cf272468fa3.abstract: This machining tank lifting device of an electric discharge machine lifts a machining tank (4) in which a machining liquid is stored. The machining tank lifting device of the electric discharge machine includes: a drive source (1) and a rack pinion (2) for lifting the machining tank (4) on the depth side of the machining tank (4); and a cylinder (5), having the function of preventing the front side of the machining tank (4) from dropping down in relation to the depth side, on the front side of the machining tank (4).

aa63663ff9fe32173add27e08506399b0ca23788.title: Co shift unit for the conversion of solid waste into syngas
aa63663ff9fe32173add27e08506399b0ca23788.abstract: According to the invention, solid recovered fuel pellets are torrefied to charred pellets, producing torrefaction gas that is converted into a torrefaction syngas containing hydrogen and carbon monoxide. A syngas stream comprising the torrefaction syngas is supplied to a CO shift unit, where carbon monoxide reacts with water steam to carbon dioxide and hydrogen, generating shifted syngas. The invention provides that the shifted syngas is passed through a low temperature heat recovery unit, where its heat energy is transferred to at least two process water streams that are used as process water during the production of the product gas stream. By utilizing this heat, waste heat losses are reduced, and the overall energy efficiency of the process is improved. Further, an increased hydrogen content of the product gas is achieved.

7dbd7cae664b3ab6e5ff2e8315d98acfd9657138.title: TRAITEMENT DE CHARGES D'ALIMENTATION MONOCOTYLÉDONES POUR DÉPULPAGE
7dbd7cae664b3ab6e5ff2e8315d98acfd9657138.abstract: Feedstock including an amphiphilic lignocellulosic biomass can be processed using enzymes prior to pulping. The enzymes break down the biomass by disrupting the surface or cell walls or by reducing wax or other components. Such enzymes include cellulases, hemicellulases, laccases, peroxidases, and pectinases. Suitable enzymes can be obtained from secretions of microbes in soil organic matter from soil in which the feedstock was grown. If the pulping process includes steam explosion, such enzy matic processing of a biomass prior to steam explosion will increase absorption of water by the processed feedstock. In steam explosion, due to the increased ability of the processed feedstock to absorb water, steam explosion is more effective in breaking apart the processed feedstock. For other pulping processes, such enzymatic treatments break down the biomass, enabling extraction of the desired components from the processed feedstock through subsequent processing using less energy and fewer chemicals.

55b15e9676dc303ecdf9e93b3c29843bfc0ee24e.title: GÉNÉRATEUR DE FUMÉE ET SYSTÈME FOURNISSANT DES PARTICULES DE FUMÉE DANS UNE ARMOIRE À FUMÉE
55b15e9676dc303ecdf9e93b3c29843bfc0ee24e.abstract: The present invention relates to a smoke generator (10; 10a; 10b) comprising a housing (15) with a condensate inlet (11) for receiving a smoke condensate and a steam inlet (12) for receiving overheated water steam, wherein the smoke condensate is converted to smoke particles when the smoke condensate interacts with the overheated water steam, and the smoke particles are accessible at a smoke outlet (13). The invention also relates to a system for feeding smoke particles to a smoke cabinet (23).

a50b66172e995c6208bc48fb33f1d98f8023e518.title: Stable supply system for hydrogen production by clean energy and control method thereof
a50b66172e995c6208bc48fb33f1d98f8023e518.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of hydrogen production, in particular to a stable supply system for hydrogen production through clean energy and a control method of the stable supply system. The gas mixing chamber is used for mixing methanol steam and desalted water steam to form mixed gas; the heat preservation chamber is arranged outside the gas mixing chamber and is used for preserving heat of the gas mixing chamber through hydrogen mixed gas output by the reaction chamber; the reaction hydrogen production unit is connected with the raw material mixing unit and is used for providing chemical reaction conditions of the mixed gas to generate hydrogen mixed gas of hydrogen and carbon dioxide; the gas separation unit is used for separating the hydrogen mixed gas to output pure hydrogen; the detection unit is used for detecting the internal air pressure of the gas mixing chamber, the air pressure of the gas inlet of the reaction chamber, the air pressure of the gas outlet of the reaction chamber and the vibration frequency of the gas mixing chamber; the hydrogen production stability is improved.

b3f76fd1a2feb1e2031ee0936c9a1493f3c61918.title: Steam-water separation device for cooking equipment and cooking equipment
b3f76fd1a2feb1e2031ee0936c9a1493f3c61918.abstract: The utility model relates to the technical field of kitchen appliances, in particular to a steam-water separation device for cooking equipment and the cooking equipment, the steam-water separation device for the cooking equipment comprises a separator, the separator comprises a separation pipe and a separation plate, the separation plate is arranged in the separation pipe and divides the separation pipe into a steam inlet side and a steam outlet side, and the steam inlet side is communicated with the steam outlet side. Screen holes are formed in the separation plate, steam flows in from one end of the separation pipe, penetrates through the screen holes in the separation plate and flows out from the other end of the separation pipe, and the separation plate is used for water-steam separation. The steam passes through the separation plate through the sieve holes of the separation plate, and in the process, the separation plate can intercept water drops, so that the water drops can be intercepted more efficiently, water accumulation is reduced, the influence on food nutrition and taste is reduced, and the use effect of the cooking equipment is improved.

ba8bfd7d13a80f82365e6879dd68a81dbc305447.title: Selective condensation mechanism and wastewater treatment equipment and method with selective condensation function
ba8bfd7d13a80f82365e6879dd68a81dbc305447.abstract: The invention discloses a selective condensation mechanism and wastewater treatment equipment and method with selective condensation, the selective condensation mechanism is a condensation plate, the condensation plate comprises a main body part and a selective condensation coating covering the main body part, the main body part is internally provided with a cooling cavity used for containing a refrigerant, and the selective condensation coating covers the main body part. The affinity of the selective condensation coating and impurities in waste water steam is greater than that of the main body part and the impurities in the waste water steam; or the selective condensation mechanism is a condensation pipeline, the condensation pipeline comprises an inner pipeline and an outer pipeline which are sleeved with each other, a cooling cavity used for containing a refrigerant is formed between the inner pipeline and the outer pipeline, and the selective condensation coating is arranged on the inner wall of the inner pipeline; the affinity of the selective condensation coating and impurities in waste water steam is greater than that of the condensation plate and the impurities in the waste water steam. The energy consumption in the condensation process can be reduced, and organic components in waste water can be separated and recycled easily.

56b5dad25493d1a97525de5a7624be32f7dfbd2d.title: Flow control sauna machine
56b5dad25493d1a97525de5a7624be32f7dfbd2d.abstract: The utility model discloses a flow control sauna machine, and belongs to the technical field of steam sauna machines. A flow control sauna machine comprises a switching box, a water inlet part is arranged at the front end of the switching box, and a bag body is arranged in the rear end of the switching box; a water outlet is formed in the water inlet part, and a connecting pipeline is arranged between the water outlet and the bag body, so that the water inlet part is communicated with the bag body; a flow blocking piece is arranged at the lower end of the water outlet, the flow blocking piece floats on the liquid level, close to the water outlet end, in the connecting pipeline under the normal condition, the density of the flow blocking piece is smaller than that of water, and the flow blocking piece does not have water absorption; the diameter of the flow blocking piece is larger than that of the water outlet. The diameter of the flow blocking piece is smaller than that of the connecting pipeline. Water-steam conversion can be effectively carried out by reducing the water drainage speed, and water backflow is prevented.

34581d6e584597fb00b9a0ac39bf7412c1253343.title: Water-vapor separation box, faucet and multifunctional water dispenser
34581d6e584597fb00b9a0ac39bf7412c1253343.abstract: The water vapor separation box comprises a box body, one side of the box body is provided with a hot water inlet, the other side of the box body is provided with a water outlet nozzle, the water outlet nozzle is provided with a steam exhaust outlet and hot water outlets, the hot water outlets comprise the first hot water outlet and the second hot water outlet, and the steam exhaust outlet is communicated with the steam exhaust outlet. A stop block is arranged above the water outlet nozzle; the bottom wall of the inner cavity of the box body is inclined from the hot water inlet to the stop block to form an inclined surface; by designing the reasonable layout of the hot water inlet, the hot water outlet and the steam exhaust outlet and arranging the stop block and the inclined bottom wall in the box body, steam and water flow can be effectively separated in the flowing process of hot water. Steam is discharged through the steam discharging channel, hot water is discharged through the hot water channels with different heights according to the hydrodynamic law, efficient water vapor separation is achieved, and it is ensured that output hot water is more stable and purer.

d859c75be53c74b812fc81bbf97bc32d8a513bd2.title: Zero-power-consumption thermal power cold end system vacuum optimization device
d859c75be53c74b812fc81bbf97bc32d8a513bd2.abstract: The invention discloses a zero-power-consumption thermal power cold end system vacuum optimization device, which belongs to the technical field of vacuum optimization, and comprises a front vacuum absorber, an annular water-gas self-oscillation processing mechanism, a gas-gas-liquid self-separation device and a gas-liquid isolation secondary separation device which are sequentially connected in series, and the output end is connected with a condenser hot well through a gas-liquid isolation secondary separation device. The chemical replenishment water is dynamically mixed with the steam-steam mixture at the outlet of the condenser through jet entrainment, so that water steam is condensed, after the formed steam-steam mixture is separated, non-condensable gas is extracted by vacuumizing equipment, and liquid is recycled to a hot well. The device does not need extra energy consumption, the vacuum degree of the condenser is effectively improved through multi-stage mixing, separation and recovery closed loops, and coal consumption and operation cost are reduced.

75e5d8b11626c6bf198c52dbbc5ca3e080ede610.title: APPAREIL DE FABRICATION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
75e5d8b11626c6bf198c52dbbc5ca3e080ede610.abstract: The present invention relates to an apparatus for manufacturing lithium sulfide. By using the apparatus according to the present invention, when manufacturing lithium sulfide by a reaction between a lithium raw material and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction is performed under relatively mild conditions as compared to the prior art, such that frequent repair or replacement due to corrosion and failure of a reactor and various piping is not required, thereby improving the economic efficiency of the process. In addition, unreacted hydrogen sulfide and a solvent, from which moisture has been removed, are reused, thereby reducing process costs and securing economic feasibility during mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed, thereby preventing a reverse reaction to lithium hydroxide and promoting a forward reaction, thus enabling high-quality lithium sulfide to be produced with high purity and high yield. In addition, particle size can be adjusted in units of ㎛ without a separate pulverization space or a separate pulverization step, thus providing excellent convenience and mass productivity.

266f82feaf34c354a3dda9e01d5b5c4bf416dcac.title: PROCÉDÉ DE PRÉPARATION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
266f82feaf34c354a3dda9e01d5b5c4bf416dcac.abstract: The present invention relates to a method for preparing lithium sulfide. According to the present invention, when lithium sulfide is prepared by a reaction between a lithium raw material and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction proceeds under relatively mild conditions compared with conventional technologies. Thus, repair or replacement due to corrosion and failure of reactors and various piping components is not frequently required, thereby improving the economic feasibility of the process. In addition, the unreacted hydrogen sulfide and solvent from which moisture has been removed can be reused, thereby reducing process costs and securing economic feasibility in mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed, thereby preventing the reverse reaction to lithium hydroxide and promoting the forward reaction to prepare high-quality lithium sulfide with high purity and high yield.

ffad28eccb5575cceb4ffbdb73422656462ca940.title: PROCÉDÉ DE PRODUCTION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
ffad28eccb5575cceb4ffbdb73422656462ca940.abstract: The present invention relates to a method for producing lithium sulfide. According to the present invention, when producing lithium sulfide by a reaction between a lithium source and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction is performed under relatively mild conditions compared to the prior art, and thus the economic efficiency of the process is improved since frequent repairs or replacements necessitated by corrosion and failure of a reactor and various piping are not required. In addition, since dehydrated, unreacted hydrogen sulfide and solvents are recycled, the process cost is reduced, and thus economic efficiency can be achieved in mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed to prevent a reverse reaction to lithium hydroxide and promote a forward reaction, thereby enabling the production of high-quality lithium sulfide with high purity and high yield. In addition, particle size can be adjusted at a µm level without a separate pulverization space or pulverization step, and thus excellent convenience and mass productivity are achieved.
