b8cb9c23b425f36bdebdf7c02b3fc96148df7ae1.title: PROCÉDÉ DE PRÉPARATION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
b8cb9c23b425f36bdebdf7c02b3fc96148df7ae1.abstract: The present invention relates to a method for preparing lithium sulfide. According to the present invention, when preparing lithium sulfide by a reaction between a lithium raw material and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction is carried out under relatively mild conditions as compared to the prior art, and thus frequent repair or replacement due to corrosion and failure of a reactor and various piping is not required, thereby improving the economic feasibility of the process. In addition, by reusing unreacted hydrogen sulfide from which moisture has been removed and a solvent, process costs are reduced, thereby ensuring economic feasibility during mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed, thus preventing a reverse reaction back to lithium hydroxide and promoting a forward reaction, thus enabling the production of high-quality lithium sulfide with high purity and high yield. In addition, particle size adjustment can be achieved in units of μm without a separate pulverization space or pulverization step, thereby providing excellent convenience and mass production.

9bae5829ec878bbfee07aeb213cb7a384b0abaa7.title: PROCÉDÉ DE PRODUCTION DE SULFURE DE LITHIUM
9bae5829ec878bbfee07aeb213cb7a384b0abaa7.abstract: The present invention relates to a method for producing lithium sulfide. According to the present invention, when producing lithium sulfide by a reaction between a lithium source and hydrogen sulfide, the reaction is performed under relatively mild conditions compared to the prior art, and thus the economic efficiency of the process is improved since frequent repairs or replacements necessitated by corrosion and failure of a reactor and various piping are not required. In addition, since dehydrated, unreacted hydrogen sulfide and solvents are recycled, the process cost is reduced, and thus economic efficiency can be achieved in mass production. Furthermore, moisture and water vapor generated by the lithium sulfide production reaction are effectively removed to prevent a reverse reaction to lithium hydroxide and promote a forward reaction, thereby enabling the production of high-quality lithium sulfide with high purity and high yield.

a807803e927fb908325e8f5078cf3ad30ebefda5.title: SYSTÈME DE PRODUCTION D'HYDROGÈNE
a807803e927fb908325e8f5078cf3ad30ebefda5.abstract: Provided is a hydrogen production system (40) which comprises: an exhaust heat reception unit (41) that receives exhaust heat generated by an external exhaust heat source (11); a water vapor generation unit (42) that generates water vapor by heating water by means of the exhaust heat received by the exhaust heat reception unit (41); a cell stack (43) that electrolyzes the water vapor generated by the water vapor generation unit (42) so as to generate hydrogen; and a replenishment unit (44) that, when the amount of exhaust heat is insufficient with respect to the amount necessary for generating the required amount of water vapor, replenishes water, water vapor, or the water vapor generation unit (42) with heat, or replenishes the cell stack (43) with water vapor from an external water vapor supply source (95).

5628274c3a01aa71915490aef851ff6b15068442.title: APPAREIL DE PRODUCTION DE BIOCHARBON POREUX À HAUTE PERFORMANCE
5628274c3a01aa71915490aef851ff6b15068442.abstract: Disclosed is an apparatus for manufacturing a high-performance porous biochar, capable of preventing water vapor and gas in a carbonization facility from leaking to the outside, and preventing a coking phenomenon in which livestock manure remaining in a carbonization furnace adheres to the inner circumferential surface of the carbonization furnace. The apparatus for manufacturing a high-performance porous biochar comprises: a livestock manure supply facility for supplying and transferring a large amount of livestock manure containing moisture; and a carbonization facility for, when the livestock manure is input from the livestock manure supply facility, creating an oxygen-blocked atmosphere within the carbonization facility and heating the carbonization facility to a predetermined temperature to carbonize the livestock manure, wherein the livestock manure supply facility is configured to automatically open and close an outlet according to whether the livestock manure is discharged, and seal a connection portion between the livestock manure supply facility and the carbonization facility.
5628274c3a01aa71915490aef851ff6b15068442.system_message:

00d7c1b6fff02bc64c54897f8c9067d5115329ae.title: SPECTROSCOPIE DE POLARISATION À EFFET STARK ET PROCÉDÉS
00d7c1b6fff02bc64c54897f8c9067d5115329ae.abstract: A method of and system for monitoring the level of hydrogen peroxide gas in a system such as an isolation barrier. Gas is sampled from the system to a gas cell. The sampled gas may include hydrogen peroxide gas and water vapor. A laser beam from a laser source at a known polarization state is passed through the gas cell and the hydrogen peroxide gas and water vapor therein. An electrical field is created in the gas cell to reduce optical interference from water vapor while preserving the ability to more accurately measure the concentration of hydrogen peroxide gas in the gas cell. A change in the polarization state of the laser beam after passage through the gas cell is detected. Based on the detected change in the polarization state of the laser beam, the concentration of the hydrogen peroxide gas in the gas cell is determined.

dbd2276853f367b0cd75dbc2170c5d37b4d557a7.title: STRUCTURE ORGANOMÉTALLIQUE
dbd2276853f367b0cd75dbc2170c5d37b4d557a7.abstract: This metal organic framework comprises a first ligand that has a benzene ring and has two or more functional groups for coordination, and a second ligand that does not contain a benzene ring and contains one functional group for coordination. The ratio of the water vapor adsorption level per unit mass of the metal organic framework at a relative pressure of 0.95 to the water vapor adsorption level per unit mass of a basic structure MOF at a relative pressure of 0.95 is 84% or greater in a water vapor isotherm measured at 298K when a metal organic framework having only the first ligand as a ligand is identified as the basic structure MOF on the basis of the results of powder XRD analysis of the metal organic framework.

0124d22f9c81e324c6803ba3e02a4c7d4a367b12.title: Ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen storage cabin
0124d22f9c81e324c6803ba3e02a4c7d4a367b12.abstract: An ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen storage cabin is provided with a cylindrical inner cabin, the inner cabin is supported and fixed in an outer cabin through a filling layer, the inner cabin and the outer cabin form a filling layer space, and the filling layer space is filled with low-temperature LNG or low-temperature liquid nitrogen. The inner cabin is composed of an inner cabin outer wall and an inner cabin inner wall, the inner cabin outer wall and the inner cabin inner wall form a vacuum layer, and the vacuum layer is filled with perlite and vacuumized. A double-layer compartment is arranged, an insulating layer is laid on an outer compartment, an inner compartment is of a vacuum double-wall heat insulation structure, and the space between the inner compartment and the outer compartment is filled with LNG or liquid nitrogen with the temperature close to that of liquid hydrogen. According to the scheme, the ultralow-temperature liquid state maintenance of-163 DEG C LNG or-196 DEG C liquid ammonia medium is easily realized through a mature reliquefaction system, so that the liquid state maintenance of the ultralow-temperature-253 DEG C liquid hydrogen medium is indirectly ensured, the heat transfer between the liquid hydrogen cabin and the external environment can be greatly reduced, and the technical difficulty and the technical cost of ultralow-temperature storage of the liquid hydrogen are reduced.

44d8d00f7b74c9ba4a7897dcb9015b9d5415be47.title: Liquid hydrogen medium active exhaust cooling test system and method
44d8d00f7b74c9ba4a7897dcb9015b9d5415be47.abstract: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen medium active exhaust cooling test system and method. The system comprises a vacuum module, a liquid hydrogen storage box module, a gas replacement and filling module, an exhaust cooling test module, a helium pressurization module, a leakage and safe discharge module, an external heat flow simulation module and a measurement and control module. According to the scheme, on the basis of simulating the external vacuum environment, the test of active exhaust cooling of the liquid hydrogen medium space is achieved through gas replacement, filling, testing and the like, and compared with the prior art, the liquid hydrogen medium space active exhaust cooling device is comprehensive in function.

06a53ca3744ae7dbfc32d7008d1e02f3c86057c1.title: Emergency cut-off stop valve for liquid hydrogen
06a53ca3744ae7dbfc32d7008d1e02f3c86057c1.abstract: The utility model provides an emergency cut-off stop valve for liquid hydrogen, which comprises a valve body, a valve clack, a fixer and a sealing ring, and the valve clack is arranged in the valve body; the valve clack is suitable for abutting against the side wall of a runner opening in the valve body. The fixer is connected with the bottom of the valve clack; the sealing ring is arranged between the valve clack and the fixator and is configured to protrude out of the circumferential side of the valve clack, and the part, protruding out of the circumferential side of the valve clack, of the sealing ring is suitable for abutting against the side wall of a runner opening in the valve body and sealing the runner opening; the side wall depth of a flow channel opening in the valve body is larger than the width of the sealing ring protruding out of the circumferential side of the valve clack. The depth of the side wall of the flow channel opening in the valve body is larger than the width of the part, protruding out of the circumferential side of the valve clack, of the sealing ring, after the sealing ring loses efficacy due to excessive abrasion, effective sealing can still be formed through tight attaching between the valve clack and the side wall of the flow channel opening in the valve body, and liquid hydrogen medium leakage is prevented.

0f4a68cdeff8d063c59d9d90f2a3e2c68f440ecb.title: Methane hydrogen regeneration olefin recovery system
0f4a68cdeff8d063c59d9d90f2a3e2c68f440ecb.abstract: The system is characterized in that the input end of a methane hydrogen heater is communicated with a demethanizer, and the output end of the methane hydrogen heater is communicated with the input end of a liquid phase dryer; the output end of the mixed C4 heater is communicated between the output end of the methane hydrogen heater and the input end of the liquid phase dryer; the output end of the gas-liquid separation tank is communicated with the input end of the regenerated methane hydrogen coalescer; and the output end of the regenerated methane hydrogen coalescer is communicated with the input end of an external fuel pipe network. According to the utility model, a mixed C4 steam stripping process and a regenerated methane hydrogen secondary dehydration process are added, so that the water content in regenerated methane hydrogen gas is ensured to meet the requirements of receiving conditions of a fuel gas pipe network. According to the system for regenerating and recycling olefin by using methane hydrogen, disclosed by the invention, a mixed C4 and methane hydrogen medium is self-produced, so that the purpose of regenerating and recycling ethylene-propylene olefin substances by using the liquid-phase dryer is achieved, the nitrogen consumption and the torch gas emission are reduced, and the ethylene-propylene yield and the resource utilization rate are improved.

bb37d29862401fd90e564dc1f109eac7164dfd40.title: Normal-pressure storage tank for storing liquid hydrogen
bb37d29862401fd90e564dc1f109eac7164dfd40.abstract: The utility model provides a normal-pressure storage tank for storing liquid hydrogen. The normal-pressure storage tank comprises an inner tank made of metal and used for containing a low-temperature liquid hydrogen medium, an outer tank located outside the inner tank and made of metal, a heat insulation interlayer located in an interlayer between the inner tank and the outer tank and playing a heat insulation role, and a cold shield arranged in the heat insulation interlayer. The cold shield comprises a cold shield coil pipe which is made of a metal material and is coiled in the heat insulation interlayer, the inlet end of the cold shield coil pipe is connected with a boil-off gas outlet of the gas phase space at the top of the inner tank, and the outlet end of the cold shield coil pipe penetrates through the outer tank, extends out of the outer tank and is connected with a boil-off gas recovery device. The cold shield medium entering the cold shield is liquid hydrogen evaporated gas in the inner tank, the defect of high daily evaporation rate of a liquid hydrogen low-temperature normal-pressure storage technology can be overcome without introducing an external cold source, and the operation cost of the normal-pressure storage tank is reduced.

16f723ebaf51e5d73cd9cc54692ccd0cf9ee4b25.title: Structure and method for improving air tightness of rapid cooling section of continuous annealing furnace in high-hydrogen mode
16f723ebaf51e5d73cd9cc54692ccd0cf9ee4b25.abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of plate and strip production and equipment, and particularly relates to a structure and method for improving air tightness of a rapid cooling section of a continuous annealing furnace in a high-hydrogen mode, the structure comprises a sealing roller chamber shell, a roller and sealing roller chamber shell lining refractory bricks, the bottom of the roller is in sealing connection with a graphite sealing gasket, and the bottom and the two ends of the graphite sealing gasket are fixed through castable; back lining plates are arranged between the two ends of the castable and the sealing roller chamber shell lining refractory bricks, the positions between the back lining plates and the sealing roller chamber shell lining refractory bricks are filled with micropore heat insulation plates, and gaps of the upper end, the side wall and the bottom in the sealing roller chamber are filled with ceramic fibers. The invention mainly aims to ensure the stability of the sealing roller chamber structure of the rapid cooling section, improve the sealing performance in the roller chamber, prevent excessive hydrogen medium from overflowing to the slow cooling section and the overaging section, save the consumption of hydrogen energy and ensure the safety of a unit.

3ddd1f8f79fceea83f86276a7c930a014b1391f7.title: Medium filtering method and device based on hydrogen purity instrument
3ddd1f8f79fceea83f86276a7c930a014b1391f7.abstract: The invention discloses a medium filtering method and device based on a hydrogen purity instrument. The method comprises the following steps: connecting a sampling pipe to a source of a medium to be measured so as to conveniently introduce the medium; the other end of the sampling pipe is connected with the filtering device, so that the medium passes through the sampling pipe before entering the filtering device; the filtered oil mist is adsorbed and sampled through a filter element in the filtering device, and the oil mist is separated from the hydrogen medium; oil gathered in the filtering device is introduced into the oil storage tank through the drainage pipe; a pressure sensing module and an automatic oil drain valve are installed at the bottom of the oil storage tank. According to the medium filtering method and device based on the hydrogen purity instrument, on one hand, the measurement accuracy of hydrogen purity parameters is improved, a reliable basis is provided for operators to monitor and maintain the purity of hydrogen, and the operation economy and safety of a generator are guaranteed; on the other hand, the automatic oil discharging valve is adopted to achieve the automatic sewage discharging function, the daily maintenance workload is reduced, and the automation level of equipment is improved.

83cd6f53a1125ea8c418ce104cec3eb961d93930.title: Storage cabin capable of storing ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen
83cd6f53a1125ea8c418ce104cec3eb961d93930.abstract: A storage cabin capable of storing ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen is provided with a cylindrical inner cabin, the inner cabin is supported and fixed in an outer cabin through a filling layer, the inner cabin and the outer cabin form a filling layer space, and the filling layer space is filled with low-temperature LNG or low-temperature liquid nitrogen. The inner cabin is composed of an inner cabin outer wall and an inner cabin inner wall, the inner cabin outer wall and the inner cabin inner wall form a vacuum layer, and the vacuum layer is filled with perlite and vacuumized. A double-layer compartment is arranged, an insulating layer is laid on an outer compartment, an inner compartment is of a vacuum double-wall heat insulation structure, and the space between the inner compartment and the outer compartment is filled with LNG or liquid nitrogen with the temperature close to that of liquid hydrogen. According to the scheme, the ultralow-temperature liquid state maintenance of-163 DEG C LNG or-196 DEG C liquid ammonia medium is easily realized through a mature reliquefaction system, so that the liquid state maintenance of the ultralow-temperature-253 DEG C liquid hydrogen medium is indirectly ensured, the heat transfer between the liquid hydrogen cabin and the external environment can be greatly reduced, and the technical difficulty and the technical cost of ultralow-temperature storage of the liquid hydrogen are reduced.

04ab52550633a1a9c9906632c4847729ce687e7f.title: High-temperature solid hydrogen storage and SOEC coupling hydrogen production and storage integrated system and method
04ab52550633a1a9c9906632c4847729ce687e7f.abstract: The invention discloses a high-temperature solid hydrogen storage and SOEC coupling hydrogen production and storage integrated system and method. The system comprises a water supply device, and the end of the water supply device is connected with a suction device; one end of the recovery device is connected with the suction device, and the other end is connected with a reaction device; the SOEC electrolytic reactor is connected with the reaction device, the SOEC electrolytic reactor comprises an anode end and a cathode end, and the anode end is connected with the recovery device; one end of the air delivery device is mounted between the reaction device and the SOEC electrolytic reactor, and the other end of the air delivery device is connected with a hydrogen high-temperature heat recovery device; the first end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with the hydrogen high-temperature heat recovery device, the second end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with the reaction device, the third end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with a condenser, the fourth end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with a dryer, and the condenser is connected with the dryer. Medium-temperature and high-temperature heat energy released in the hydrogen storage process of the high-temperature metal hydride is recycled through the heat recycling device and used for producing high-temperature superheated steam needed by SOEC electrolysis, and the good heat and mass synergistic effect is achieved on the whole.

9f503a7f4eac3f8f7f063ca35139af7e4c89cc02.title: METHOD AND UNIT FOR PREPARATION AND FINE PROCESSING OF HYDROCARBON STOCK
9f503a7f4eac3f8f7f063ca35139af7e4c89cc02.abstract: FIELD: oil and gas production. ^ SUBSTANCE: invention refers to a method of preparing and fine processing of hydrocarbon stock involving heating of stock and hydrogen, preparation of end-products; herewith liquid (oil, black oil, oil refining and petrochemistry remains) charge stock is heated up to the temperature above 20-50C and exposed to thermal and/or thermomechanical (non-catalytic) cracking, molecular hydrogen and/or hydrogen enriched light hydrogenous mediums (natural or accompanying gas, gas and light fractions of oil refining and petrochemistry), if required are heated up separately from charge stock, supplied at greater pressure than that of the heating stage, to the stage of producing active atomic hydrogen and/or light radicals to a reactor or reactor package with a catalyst heated to the required temperature, thereafter produced active hydrogen and/or light radicals are supplied to a stock heating and cracking zone for the reaction; the reaction products are supplied to the separation stage; a portion of gas and light fractions and also unreacted hydrogen and/or light hydrogenous initial mediums after the separation stage are supplied to the start of the process and introduced into the charge stock, light end fractions of reaction after the separation stage mainly with end boiling point to 350-360C, partially or completely supplied on the stage of producing light end commodity products (condensed gas, petrol, kerosene, diesel fuel) and/or partially returned and introduced into charge stock, heavy remains after the separation stage mainly with start boiling point 360C and above, are partially or completely supplied for producing heavy commodity products (bitumen, coke), and, probably, partially or completely supplied for reprocessing by the given method to the start of the process together with charge stock; the stock and/or separation remain cracking and heating stages, hydrogen and/or hydrogenous medium and catalyst heating, production of active atomic hydrogen and/or light radicals and separation into light portion and heavy remains are combined in one device, and the ratio of the surface of the reactor or reactors with the catalyst to volume of the stock heating and/or cracking shall be increased so that maximally increase the interaction (reaction) area of atomic hydrogen and/or light radicals and heated or cracked hydrocarbon stock for effective utilisation of reacting products. The invention also concerns a unit for preparation and fine processing of hydrocarbon stock. ^ EFFECT: higher yield of light end products. ^ 19 cl, 3 tbl, 15 dwg

e5a1a58c06f77720593003a517c5f72a38ba81ca.title: COMPOSITION AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING ETTRINGITE COATED FIBER AND AGGLOMERATE
e5a1a58c06f77720593003a517c5f72a38ba81ca.abstract: PURPOSE: A fiber is provided to sediment an ettringite crystalline on the surface of the fiber or the other disposition in a hydrogenous medium. CONSTITUTION: An ettringite coated agglomerate is manufactured by: generating an ettringite in a hydrogenous slurry while being near a fiber, an agglomerate, or other filling material for forming a mineralized complex material including an ettringite treated fiber, agglomerate, or other filling material; and the ettringite treated fiber, agglomerate, and other filling material reacting in the existence of water for forming the ettringite by adding a reactive material such as a calcium oxide and a sulfuric aluminium being sedimented to the surface of the treated fiber or the other disposition. Therefore, the ettringite treated fiber, agglomerate, and other filling material are added to a hydrogenous hardening material for improving a chemical and a mechanical combinations between the fiber and other dispositions in a concrete material.
e5a1a58c06f77720593003a517c5f72a38ba81ca.system_message:

c8d57b30e8e1540d48c8fcf6ad7713bf3bfce1f1.title: Bipolarplatte sowie Brennstoffzelle mit einer Bipolarplatte
c8d57b30e8e1540d48c8fcf6ad7713bf3bfce1f1.abstract: The plate (10) has a main surface for a fuel cell stack, where the surface is surrounded by outer edges (14) of the plate. A cathode input and a cathode output are provided at a cathode side, and an anode input and an anode output are provided at an anode side. A hydrogenous medium is fed to the anode side and a medium containing oxygen is fed to the cathode side. An outer edge of the stack is freely accessible, where the plate is coated at its outer edges by a sealant (15) and the sealant forms a frame (16) around the plate. A polymer material is provided as the sealant.

e1d94330844f8d75f35c121cec78dd6d59b98f85.title: MATÉRIAU D'ACIER INOXYDABLE AUSTÉNITIQUE
e1d94330844f8d75f35c121cec78dd6d59b98f85.abstract: Provided is an austenitic stainless steel material that has high strength and excellent fatigue crack propagation resistance in a hydrogen environment. The chemical composition of the austenitic stainless steel material of the present disclosure, as defined in the description, satisfies formula (1); the elemental content and grain size number (GSN) in μm satisfy formula (2); and the tensile strength (TS), which is 730 MPa or more, the number density of inclusions (NDI) having an equivalent circle diameter of 2.0 μm or more per 4.0 mm2, and the number density of carbonitrides (NDC) having an equivalent circle diameter of 1.0 μm or more per mm2 satisfy formula (3).　(1) Nb + V ≤ 0.55; (2) 10FnA - 0.2FnB + 4.5GSN ≥ 39.0, where FnA and FnB in formula (2) are defined by formulas (A) and (B);　(A) FnA = 2N + C; (B) FnB = -7.1 + 2.8Ni + 0.49Cr + 2Mo - 2Si + 0.75Mn - 5.7C - 24N; (3) 0.5NDI + NDC + 0.02TS ≤ 30.0.

f959922448e90eb63bd67f7158d7e0add925e548.title: Method and system for synergistically testing and evaluating fatigue and fracture of metal material in hydrogen environment
f959922448e90eb63bd67f7158d7e0add925e548.abstract: The invention relates to a hydrogen environment metal material fatigue and fracture cooperative test and evaluation method and system, and belongs to the field of metal material hydrogen environment compatibility. The method comprises the following steps: performing a fatigue crack propagation test and a fracture toughness test on a fatigue and fracture synergistic test sample in a hydrogen environment with preset pressure and preset temperature; based on the obtained fatigue crack propagation curve and the obtained crack propagation resistance curve, obtaining a fatigue crack propagation fitting curve and a fracture toughness characteristic value in the hydrogen environment with the preset pressure and the preset temperature; and based on the fatigue crack propagation fitting curve and the fracture toughness characteristic value in the hydrogen environment with the preset pressure and the preset temperature, safety evaluation of the metal material simulated hydrogen conveying pipeline under the fatigue load working condition is completed. The fatigue crack test is replaced by the fracture toughness test according to the defect length, the fatigue and fracture cooperative test is realized, the sample replacement is not needed, the test material is saved, the test preparation time for the sample replacement and cooling process is reduced, and the test efficiency is improved.

28d282717c0e8603683e5b9bbbe560c7d1c45be2.title: Full-size PE pipeline hydrogen permeation and aging test integrated equipment
28d282717c0e8603683e5b9bbbe560c7d1c45be2.abstract: The utility model discloses full-size PE pipeline hydrogen permeation and aging test integrated equipment which comprises a high-temperature aging oven, supporting plates are fixedly installed at the two ends of the bottom of an inner cavity of the high-temperature aging oven, a sealing mechanism used for testing is arranged at the tops of the supporting plates, and a PE pipe body is arranged on the inner side wall of the sealing mechanism; according to the utility model, the high-temperature aging oven, the sealing mechanism, the air intake and exhaust mechanism, the pressure reading instrument and the gas chromatograph are arranged in a matched manner, so that the hydrogen permeability of the full-size PE pipeline can be tested, and meanwhile, an aging test can be carried out in a hydrogen environment, thereby improving the test effect; the hydrogen permeability coefficient of hydrogen-doped natural gas in a PE pipeline can be measured through gas chromatography, so that the requirements of people are met, sealing operation during testing is achieved through the sealing mechanism, the gas inlet and outlet mechanism is used for achieving gas inlet and outlet operation during testing, and the pressure reading instrument and the gas chromatograph are used for analyzing and recording obtained data.

723cc3ddd4a54c6ca7bddc4b1ec91aba872856fd.title: Salt rock creep experiment device in high-pressure hydrogen environment
723cc3ddd4a54c6ca7bddc4b1ec91aba872856fd.abstract: The invention provides a rock salt creep experiment device in a high-pressure hydrogen environment, and belongs to the technical field of rock experiments, the rock salt creep experiment device comprises a cavity, the top and the side of the cavity are provided with openings, a top cover and a side cover, the top cover and the side cover are used for sealing the two openings respectively, and the side cover is provided with an observation window; an air injection hole and an exhaust hole are formed in one side, deviating from the side cover, of the side wall of the cavity, and the air injection hole is higher than the exhaust hole; the experiment assembling structure is arranged in the cavity, and the experiment assembling structure comprises a sample placing table, a limiting assembly and a loading rod; the gas injection and recovery system is arranged on one side of the cavity and used for injecting high-pressure hydrogen into the cavity and recovering the high-pressure hydrogen in the cavity; and the shooting system is arranged on one side where the side cover of the cavity is located and comprises a shooting device and a light source. By means of the salt rock creep experiment device in the high-pressure hydrogen environment, the safety of the experiment device can be improved, and potential safety hazards caused by the circuit and air tightness problems are reduced.

0eb19cbac8d2e4b63cbc1996a36fd318b124e279.title: MATÉRIAU D'ACIER D'ALLIAGE AUSTÉNITIQUE DE TYPE À DURCISSEMENT PAR PRÉCIPITATION ET SON PROCÉDÉ DE FABRICATION, ET MATÉRIAU D'ACIER TRAITÉ THERMIQUEMENT EN ALLIAGE AUSTÉNITIQUE DE TYPE À DURCISSEMENT PAR PRÉCIPITATION ET SON PROCÉDÉ DE FABRICATION
0eb19cbac8d2e4b63cbc1996a36fd318b124e279.abstract: Provided is a method for manufacturing an austenitic alloy steel material that can improve mechanical properties even without improving a composition of a steel material and 5 an increase in the service life of a component in a high-pressure hydrogen environment can be expected. A method for manufacturing a precipitation-hardening austenitic alloy steel material, the method including: a hot forging step of providing a material for forging having a composition of the precipitation-hardening austenitic alloy steel material, and performing hot forging several times so that a total forging forming ratio is 30 or more, to form a forged 10 material. The method preferably includes a heat treatment step of additionally subjecting the forged material to a solution treatment and an aging treatment, to obtain a heat-treated steel material.

1ea4fa32f74627c05fedb7f7a82e68d7ab93639a.title: High-performance material combination for ultrahigh-speed permanent magnet motor driven hydrogen circulating pump and application process
1ea4fa32f74627c05fedb7f7a82e68d7ab93639a.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of ultrahigh-speed motor materials and hydrogen energy equipment, in particular to a high-performance material combination for an ultrahigh-speed permanent magnet motor driven hydrogen circulating pump, which comprises a permanent magnet material: a neodymium iron boron 42SH magnet is adopted and subjected to Dy-Cu co-doping treatment, and the surface of the magnet is coated with a nickel-phosphorus alloy coating of 10-15 microns; the rotor sheath is made of TC11 titanium alloy (containing 3.5%-4.5% of Mo), and the hardness of the TC11 titanium alloy reaches 38-42 HRC after beta heat treatment; a pump body and an impeller are made of a combined structure of Hastelloy C276 and a SiC particle reinforced aluminum matrix composite (the volume fraction of SiC is 15%-20%), and the inner wall of the pump body is sprayed with a 50-80-micron diamond-like carbon (DLC) coating; hydrogen embrittlement resistance and stability are enhanced, the hydrogen embrittlement critical value of a key material is increased to 200 MPa.m < 1/2 > or above, and the continuous operation life under the 1.5 MPa hydrogen environment is longer than or equal to 8000 h and is prolonged by two times compared with a traditional material; the high-temperature magnetic performance attenuation rate of the permanent magnet is smaller than or equal to 5%, the fatigue strength of the rotor sheath is improved by 25%, and the requirement for long-term operation at the speed of 200000r/min is met.

e3ed053e1e6b07955909db0ed8e034b4ffd0b8e9.title: Hydrogen circulating pump stator core structure adopting 0.05 mm silicon steel sheets
e3ed053e1e6b07955909db0ed8e034b4ffd0b8e9.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of motor iron core structures, in particular to a hydrogen circulating pump stator iron core structure adopting 0.05 mm silicon steel sheets. The hydrogen circulating pump stator iron core structure adopting 0.05 mm silicon steel sheets comprises an iron core body which is formed by laminating a plurality of silicon steel sheets with the thickness of 0.05 mm in the axial direction, and the surfaces of the silicon steel sheets are provided with insulating coatings; the stator yoke part is located on the periphery of the iron core body and is of an annular structure, and the thickness of the yoke part is 15-20 mm; the stator tooth parts are uniformly distributed along the inner circumference of the stator yoke part, the number of the stator tooth parts is 12-24, the width of each tooth part is 5-8mm, and a wire slot is formed between every two adjacent tooth parts; the eddy current path is shortened by the ultra-thin silicon steel sheets of 0.05 mm, and the high-frequency iron loss is reduced by more than 40% and the motor efficiency is improved by 5-8% by combining high-frequency low-loss materials; and the heat dissipation grooves and the graphene heat-conducting fins have a synergistic effect, so that the temperature rise of the iron core is reduced by 15-20 DEG C, and high-temperature potential safety hazards in a hydrogen environment are avoided.

1cb68443a9b1339854760601db3e24bc135f4c18.title: High-pressure piston type hydrogen compressor cylinder surface PVD coating and preparation process thereof
1cb68443a9b1339854760601db3e24bc135f4c18.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of compressor cylinder body surface coating, and discloses a high-pressure piston type hydrogen compressor cylinder body surface PVD preparation process which comprises the following steps: step 1, matrix laser microtexturing and plasma activation: machining micro-pit arrays on the surfaces of a cylinder sleeve and a piston by adopting a pulse fiber laser; and the oxide layer is removed through Ar < + >/H2 mixed plasma etching, and a nanoscale activated surface is generated. According to the method, the film-substrate binding force is remarkably enhanced through laser microtexture and plasma activation, and the coating is prevented from being peeled off; by utilizing a multi-layer composite structure and a rare earth doping technology, the coating structure is extremely densified, a hydrogen permeation path is effectively blocked, and hydrogen embrittlement is fundamentally inhibited; gradient design and fluorinated hydrophobic treatment are adopted, so that the surface is endowed with low friction coefficient and super-hydrophobicity, and abrasion and corrosion are reduced; meanwhile, high hardness, high toughness and excellent corrosion resistance are considered, and the reliability, durability and safety of the cylinder body in the high-pressure hydrogen environment are comprehensively improved.

bdde720aae4b7b4f219e3b5f9a61d7d585d17f71.title: Multiphase preparation method of aniline derivative
bdde720aae4b7b4f219e3b5f9a61d7d585d17f71.abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of fine chemicals and related chemistry, and provides a heterogeneous preparation method of an aniline derivative, which comprises the following steps: taking a nitrobenzene derivative as a raw material, and reacting in an organic solvent at 60-100 DEG C for 24 hours in a hydrogen environment under the action of a high-entropy alloy catalyst to obtain the corresponding aniline derivative. According to the method, the high-entropy alloy is used as the catalyst, the reaction selectivity is high, the reaction system is simple, the substrate compatibility is good, the highest yield can reach 97% or above, and the catalyst is good in stability and can be recycled. The aniline derivative prepared by the invention has a wide range of applications, and has an extremely important position in drug design and drug synthesis.

bcaf9bd2417d31e73ddbbe34397815afc1f38387.title: Intelligent agent test equipment for intelligently and efficiently evaluating fatigue crack growth rate of hydrogen pipeline steel and use method of intelligent agent test equipment
bcaf9bd2417d31e73ddbbe34397815afc1f38387.abstract: The invention relates to intelligent agent test equipment for intelligently and efficiently evaluating the fatigue crack growth rate of hydrogen pipeline steel and a use method of the intelligent agent test equipment. The problem that the fatigue crack growth rate test efficiency of a material is low under the gaseous hydrogen environment and the fatigue coupling effect is solved. The equipment mainly comprises a high-purity N2 gas cylinder, a high-purity H2 gas cylinder, a hydrogen-doped gas cylinder I, a hydrogen-doped gas cylinder II, an electromagnetic valve I, an electromagnetic valve II, an electromagnetic valve III, an electromagnetic valve IV, a gas inlet pipeline, a vacuum pump, a vacuum gauge, a pressure gauge, a high-pressure hydrogen environment fatigue crack growth rate performance test system and an artificial intelligence decision and control system. Multi-field coupling conditions such as stress amplitude, frequency, pressure and hydrogen doping ratio can be integrated, and the crack propagation behavior of a pipeline steel material in an actual hydrogen service environment can be simulated. A direct-current potential drop device is used for monitoring the fatigue crack propagation state in real time, an artificial intelligence model is embedded at the same time, and load, environment and crack data collected in real time are subjected to online analysis.

8cfacf83e2f17be21c84d6e082a69f8ca6b2f7c6.title: A Low-Temperature Sintering Preparation Process for Fine-Grained Molybdenum Alloy
8cfacf83e2f17be21c84d6e082a69f8ca6b2f7c6.abstract: The invention discloses a low-temperature sintering preparation process for fine-grained molybdenum alloy. A hydrothermal method is adopted to prepare MoO3 and ZrC precursors respectively. The two suspensions after hydrothermal treatment are mixed and fully stirred by liquid-liquid doping. The precursors of micron-grade MoO3 and nano-grade ZrC are obtained by filtering and freeze-drying. The preparation process adopts a hydrothermal method. The molybdenum alloy prepared by this process can be sintered at a relatively low temperature to obtain relatively fine grains. Compared with the traditional high-temperature sintering process, spark plasma sintering has a low temperature and a short time, which can reduce energy consumption and improve the economy and sustainability of the preparation. At the same time, liquid-liquid doping can make the MoO3 and ZrC precursors uniformly dispersed in the aqueous solution, realize the uniform distribution of the second phase in the fine-grained molybdenum alloy, and then improve the consistency and stability of the material performance. In addition, the prepared molybdenum alloy has a smaller grain size, usually at the nanometer to micrometer level, which can improve the overall mechanical properties of the material.

8ed4822cfe6660c0bdeab6f96aca39b04a932a31.title: Methods for Forming Parts by Spark Plasma Sintering and Additive Manufacturing
8ed4822cfe6660c0bdeab6f96aca39b04a932a31.abstract: Methods and apparatus for manufacturing a sintered powder manufactured item having an inhomogeneous internal and/or external geometry is provided. Processes and apparatus may comprise fabricating a sacrificial mold to be placed in a sintering die to create a sintering assembly, where the sintering assembly has a geometrically uniform external contour and defines an inner volume having at least one fillable space that is geometrically inhomogeneous. The part material is selected to have a lower sintering temperature than the at least one mold material such that when sintering the filled sintering assembly at a sintering temperature the at least one mold material remains un-sintered and at least one powder part material sinters to form a sinter manufactured item having a shape defined by the inner volume of the sintering assembly.

7705899be3847b81d9cb998e8dbf45bc7bca17c3.title: IN-LINE SEPARATOR
7705899be3847b81d9cb998e8dbf45bc7bca17c3.abstract: An in-line separator for reducing sparks from grinding, welding, cutting, and other industrial applications. The in-line separator provides spark reduction, reduces damage to filter media, has minimal pressure drop, zero footprint, easy installation, and operates in a vertical or horizontal position. The in-line separator removes filter media and other elements in airflow by using cyclonic motion to cause the filter media and other airflow elements to drop out of the airflow.

9f859f1fd3f84495f39168edfa681d50a7c697e7.abstract: A device for use in cleaning fuel tanks that are used for fuel storage, while simultaneously preventing an electrical charge or spark from being created while in the process of cleaning. An apparatus that is manufactured with an anti-static additive or agent to reduce the accumulation of static electricity in order to safely extract and remove particulates and impurities from a fuel tank.

a0fc97d1f06c6788bc90b4f510b98b637a21548e.title: PLASMA GENERATION TECHNIQUES FOR ENHANCED PLASMA COHERENCE AND LONGEVITY
a0fc97d1f06c6788bc90b4f510b98b637a21548e.abstract: The present disclosure provides plasma generation techniques that may be implemented to maintain plasma coherence, resulting in high performance and long useful life of components, and which are suitable for use in a low-pressure environment (e.g., as in some aerospace applications) but are not limited thereto. In some embodiments, plasma generation and coherence maintaining techniques may be implemented to improve construction and/or operation of a traveling spark igniter that is configured to generate and propagate plasma using a Lorentz force and thermal force.

9e98457591652922d1cea19ee10a4ce349f48ac5.title: THE INVENTION RELATES TO A SYSTEM FOR STABILIZING TEMPERATURE IN AN OVEN FOR THE HARDENING OF ELECTROSTATIC POWDER PAINT FOR LP GAS CYLINDERS
9e98457591652922d1cea19ee10a4ce349f48ac5.abstract: The invention relates to a furnace made from structural carbon steel and stainless steel designed for the curing of electrostatic paint in gas cylinders of 20 kg and 30 kg. It is conditioned to work continuously using an overhead conveyor rail (3) to feed and translate the gas cylinders. It has 24 infrared panels (18) of metal fibres to LP or natural gas in addition to programmable temperature control, flame control, spark for ignition and flame modulation system.

71f9f6cdd15d8d2b169f304535cfb531a85f4e60.title: CARTOUCHE POUR MOYEN DE JET D'ENTRAVES
71f9f6cdd15d8d2b169f304535cfb531a85f4e60.abstract: The invention relates to a cartridge for an entangling projectile. The technical result is the creation of a firing cartridge structure that has smaller dimensions by comparison with the prior art, can be more easily reloaded with a charge and projectiles, does not require a casing with a launching device, can be used with the most effective non-lethal remote electroshock weapon and makes it possible to obtain a synergistic effect with the action of the non-lethal weapon. The claimed cartridge comprises a casing with internal barrel channels which are arranged at a horizontal angle to one another and are vertically offset from one another, probes with barbed hooks, and a tether connecting the probes and being packed into an internal cavity of the casing. The cartridge further comprises a cover or a rupture disc. The barrel channels contain electrically activated pyrotechnic propellant charges arranged in the body of the probes or in the barrel channels themselves. The casing has a point for attachment to an electroshock weapon or to an adapter of an electroshock weapon, with contact points of the electrically activated pyrotechnic propellant charges of the probes or barrel channels being externalized on the outside surface of the casing. The probe or barrel channel charges are activated by bridge-type, conduction-type or spark-type electrical ignition.

fa2c504d25301c0a900beb5c513242b979be820a.title: BLOC-BATTERIE COMPOSITE, PROCÉDÉ DE CONNEXION DE BATTERIE ASSOCIÉ ET BLOC-BATTERIE COMPOSITE DE TYPE MIXTE À BATTERIES DIFFÉRENTES
fa2c504d25301c0a900beb5c513242b979be820a.abstract: Provided is a long-life composite battery pack in which spark countermeasures at the time of opening/closing a switch are taken into consideration. A composite battery pack 10 comprises a plurality of battery packs 12, an integrated battery management system 14, and a lead storage battery pack 16. Each of the plurality of battery packs 12 incorporates a plurality of lithium-ion batteries 12a, and further comprises a contactor switch 12c. The lead storage battery pack 16 is connected in parallel to the plurality of battery packs 12. The integrated battery management system 14 performs control to open the contactor switch 12c of a first battery pack when the voltage of the first battery pack deviates from a predetermined operation voltage range, and to close the contactor switch 12c of a second battery pack when a relationship between a voltage difference ΔV between the second battery pack and the lead storage battery pack 16, a maximum electric current Imax that can flow through the second battery pack, and an internal resistance R of the second battery pack satisfy formula (1).

d9b9c6f6e02b99a907ab0f55c301a40a34d8c6bf.title: BLOC-BATTERIE COMPOSITE ET BLOC-BATTERIE COMPOSITE DE TYPE À MÉLANGE DE BATTERIE HÉTÉROGÈNE
d9b9c6f6e02b99a907ab0f55c301a40a34d8c6bf.abstract: Provided is a long-life composite battery pack in which a spark countermeasure at the time of opening a switch is taken into consideration. A composite battery pack 10 comprises a plurality of battery packs 12, an integrated battery management system 14, and a lead storage battery pack 16. Each of the plurality of battery packs 12 incorporates a plurality of lithium-ion batteries 12a and further includes a contactor switch 12c. The lead storage battery pack 16 is connected in parallel with the plurality of battery packs 12. The integrated battery management system 14 performs control so as to open the contactor switch 12c of a specific battery pack 12 when the voltage of the specific battery pack 12 deviates from a predetermined operation voltage range, and performs control so as to close the contactor switch 12c when the voltage difference ΔV between the plurality of battery packs 12 and the lead storage battery pack 16 is a voltage difference less than the product value of the maximum current I which can be made to flow by each battery pack 12 and the internal resistance R of each battery pack 12.

297217b394b413de1324c3dc3ef441ffb2f64540.title: SPARK GAP STRUCTURES AND METHODS IN AN INTEGRATED CIRCUIT DEVICE
297217b394b413de1324c3dc3ef441ffb2f64540.abstract: Apparatus includes a substrate, a metal layer over the substrate, and a passivation layer over the metal layer. The metal layer includes a first metal portion coupled to a first bond pad and having a first terminal end and a second metal portion coupled to a second bond pad and having a second terminal end spaced from the first terminal end by a gap configured to form a spark gap between the first terminal end and the second terminal end. The apparatus may additionally or alternatively include a first die having a first ground contact and a first Through Silicon Via (TSV) and a second die having a second ground contact that is galvanically isolated from the first ground contact and a second TSV with the first TSV and the second TSV vertically aligned to form a second spark gap between the first die and the second die.

e9b2dae113b87bfd47df65d6a4a598690883c579.title: EMBALLAGE DE CHAUFFAGE AU FOUR À MICRO-ONDES COMPRENANT DE L'ENCRE DE GÉNÉRATION DE CHALEUR ET DE L'ENCRE À HAUTE LUMINANCE, ET PROCÉDÉ DE FABRICATION DE CELUI-CI
e9b2dae113b87bfd47df65d6a4a598690883c579.abstract: Provided is a microwave oven heating package which is provided with a high-luminance ink layer and an electroconductive heat-generating layer, and in which a steam passage port can be formed through dielectric breakdown and heat generation during microwave oven cooking.　A microwave oven heating package (100) comprises a first sheet member (11) in which a base material layer (12), a sealant layer (13), and an automatic steam-passing mechanism (5) are formed. A high-luminance ink layer (15) and an electroconductive heat-generating layer (16) are formed on the automatic steam-passing mechanism (5) in a superimposed manner. The high-luminance ink layer (15) is made of an ink composition containing a thin-plate flake-like vapor-deposited aluminum pigment in which the aspect ratio of thickness and length is 100-3000. The high-luminance ink layer (15) has formed therein a plurality of non-spark parts configured from island parts, and a spark part configured from a gap part separating the non-spark parts from each other or a bridge part narrower than the island parts. The electroconductive heat-generating layer (16) contains an electroconductive material comprising an organic compound and is layered on at least one of the upper and lower sides of the high-luminance ink layer (15) so as to cover the spark part in plan view.

5d0ad7f23980d560210a8984c580b113ce7d3e6f.title: PROCÉDÉ ET APPAREIL D'ÉTABLISSEMENT DE LIAISON "TERMINAL-TO-TERMINAL"
5d0ad7f23980d560210a8984c580b113ce7d3e6f.abstract: The present application relates to the technical field of communications, and specifically to a T-T link establishment method and apparatus. The present application can support IEEE protocols such as IEEE 802.11be/Wi-Fi 7/EHT protocol, IEEE 802.11bn/UHR/Wi-Fi 8 protocol, IEEE 802.15/UWB protocol, IEEE 802.11bf/sensing protocol, integrated millimeter wave (IMMW) protocol or spark link protocol. In the method, a T node may initiate a T-T link establishment request, wherein the T-T link establishment request may be used for requesting a G node to initiate establishment of a T-T link; upon receiving the T-T link establishment request, the G node may send a T-T link establishment indication to the T node, or may send a T-T link establishment response to the T node. The method can effectively improve the flexibility of T-T link establishment and improve the success rate of T-T link establishment.

378ef28a3599579f78e60c0ad9cff71baca622ac.title: PROCÉDÉ DE PRÉPARATION DE FRITTAGE À BASSE TEMPÉRATURE POUR ALLIAGE DE MOLYBDÈNE À GRAINS FINS
378ef28a3599579f78e60c0ad9cff71baca622ac.abstract: A low-temperature sintering preparation process for a fine-grain molybdenum alloy. The process comprises: preparing a MoO3 precursor and a ZrC precursor respectively by using a hydrothermal method; in a liquid-liquid doping mode, mixing and thoroughly stirring two suspensions, which have been subjected to a hydrothermal treatment; and performing filtration and freeze-drying, so as to obtain a micron-level MoO3 precursor and a nano-level ZrC precursor. The sintering of a molybdenum alloy prepared by means of the preparation process can be implemented at a relatively low temperature, so as to obtain relatively fine grains. Spark plasma sintering involves a low temperature and takes a short time, such that the energy consumption can be reduced, thereby improving the economy and sustainability of the preparation. In addition, liquid-liquid doping enables the MoO3 precursor and the ZrC precursor to be uniformly dispersed in an aqueous solution, thereby realizing the uniform distribution of a second phase in a fine-grain molybdenum alloy, and further improving the consistency and stability of the material performance. Moreover, the prepared molybdenum alloy has a relatively small grain size, which is generally at the nano to micron level, such that the overall mechanical properties of the material can be improved.

124dda11bde95d0efc1a199bf1dccfdad00a2eb5.title: SENSOR-BASED REMOTE FLAME PROPAGATION SYSTEM
124dda11bde95d0efc1a199bf1dccfdad00a2eb5.abstract: The present utility model will find application in systems for a sensor-based approach for remote flame propagation, providing encrypted two-way communication and galvanic separation between control and power circuits. The created system for sensor-based remote flame propagation includes a temperature sensor (1), connected to a first single-board computer (2), which via a Wi-Fi module (3) is connected to a proxy server (4). The proxy server (4) via a second Wi-Fi module (6) is connected to a second single-board computer (5), controlling a relay module (7), activating a solenoid valve (8), connected to a high-voltage generator (9), creating an electric spark. The Wi-Fi modules (3 and 6) used for connecting to the global Internet network are Wi-Fi tethering modules.

fceb4981f3f0ae208421abb551a4b2a79eb7d1fc.title: GAS-FILLED SPARK GAP
fceb4981f3f0ae208421abb551a4b2a79eb7d1fc.abstract: A gas-filled spark gap for the protection of an electric installation has an electrically-insulating body, two electrodes fixed to the electrical-insulating body and spaced from one another in a main direction, an inter-electrode space formed in the electrically-insulating body between the two electrodes, two connecting terminals intended to enable electrical connection of the gas-filled spark gap to the electric installation being electrically-connected to a respective one of the two electrodes, an inter-electrode space including a diverter channel defining a propagation trajectory for an electric arc, and a gas trapped in the inter-electrode space, the gas being selected from argon Ar, neon Ne, nitrogen N2, hydrogen H2, helium He and mixtures thereof.

b7bc16e3ac99c32db882f9ab35df766050ee16b9.title: ELECTRICAL POWER LINE MOUNTED FIRE WARNING SYSTEM
b7bc16e3ac99c32db882f9ab35df766050ee16b9.abstract: An electrical power line mounted fire warning system and a method of monitoring and providing a fire warning using the same are provided. An electrical power line mounted fire warning system includes: a plurality of sensor nodes, each including a housing mountable on an electrical power line, a plurality of sensors supported by the housing and including an IR sensor and/or a bolometer to detect a fire, and optionally including an electromagnetic sensor to detect at least one of a spark, a current surge of the electrical power line, or a line short of the electrical power line, a microcontroller configured to determine existence of a fire or a fire risk based on one or more parameters detected by the plurality of sensors, and a communication device.

6cd3263f957719323f0a2915f6b8ae2e8300cdf0.title: INDOOR AIR IONIZER
6cd3263f957719323f0a2915f6b8ae2e8300cdf0.abstract: An ionizer comprises a case 4 equipped with air flow inlet 12 having the shape of triangular prism dividing incoming air flow into two flows 1, two ionized air flow emitters 9 and 10, and mesh electrodes are placed in the channels 5 and 6 formed between them, and grounded grid componentry 7 and 8 in conjunction with electrodes to produce ions of uniform concentration, furthermore, mesh electrodes are covered with conductive carbon nanofibers, and power converter is designed to provide different voltage modes on each grid electrode to charge the nanofibers with static electric charge, and produce positive ions on one side and negative ions on another. The device operates in two modes, namely, low voltage, ion generation, spark discharge mode, and high voltage, ozone generation, spark discharge mode. At that, the coating of conductive nanofiber powder on metal mesh is executed with sintering it in inert gas at 1095-1110°C under the pressure of 35-45 atm. Or by spot welding using welding machine or by spraying nanofibers onto thin layer of conductive monomer preapplied to the surface of metal mesh, and by orienting the surface of the fibers in a direction using an electrostatic field and fixing them in this position until polymerization is complete.

75f7322f46ce30b6fa429e021be09096f08cc3eb.title: PROCÉDÉ ET APPAREIL DE COMMUNICATION DANS UN RÉSEAU LOCAL SANS FIL, ET SUPPORT DE STOCKAGE LISIBLE
75f7322f46ce30b6fa429e021be09096f08cc3eb.abstract: The present application relates to a method and apparatus for communication in a wireless local area network, and a readable storage medium. The method comprises: a station receiving a trigger frame, wherein a resource allocation subfield in a user information field of the trigger frame is used for indicating a DRU allocated to the station, and a spatial stream subfield is used for indicating the number M of spatial streams of the station; on the basis of the location of a user information field of the station in a user information list field and the number M of spatial streams, the station determining CSD values of the M spatial streams; and then transmitting a PPDU on the basis of the CSD values of the M spatial streams and the allocated DRU. The present application can reduce the correlation between transmitted signals of different devices and improve the system performance. The present application supports IEEE protocols, such as 802.11bn/UHR/Wi-Fi 8 protocols, integrated millimeter wave/IMMW protocols, UWB protocols or sensing protocols. The present application further supports spark link/nearlink standard protocols, etc.

b3b1afabeabc7f5f8dc3b673a0466568f3c29dcc.title: WATER HEATER WITH INTERMITTENT PILOT AND DAMPER CONTROL
b3b1afabeabc7f5f8dc3b673a0466568f3c29dcc.abstract: A water heater includes a gas burner, a thermoelectric element, a pilot, a main valve, a damper, and a controller that actuates an intermittent spark generator to ignite a pilot flame of the pilot after a first predetermined condition is satisfied, moves the damper toward the open position when the energy generated by the thermoelectric element exceeds a threshold value, and opens the main valve to permit flow of gas to the gas burner after the damper is in the open position and after a second predetermined condition is satisfied. The first predetermined condition is different from the second predetermined condition and the first predetermined condition is selected to be satisfied before the second predetermined condition is satisfied.

4c8a3fd4270003dca79bb47a8a67e786c0e6f6b3.title: SURGE PROTECTIVE DEVICES
4c8a3fd4270003dca79bb47a8a67e786c0e6f6b3.abstract: A surge protective device includes a first electrical terminal, a second electrical terminal, and an overvoltage protection circuit connected between the first electrical terminal and the second electrical terminal. The overvoltage protection circuit includes a spark gap assembly between the first electrical terminal and the second electrical terminal. The spark gap assembly includes a first spark gap (SG) electrode and a second SG electrode defining a spark gap therebetween, and a trigger circuit operative to ignite a main electric arc between the first and second SG electrodes across the spark gap. The trigger circuit includes a groove defined in the second SG electrode, and a trigger member disposed in the groove. The trigger member is operative to assist formation of a trigger arc.

5c7e4800c47daea2f57809cc97ca1eb2a3560470.title: Spark prevention cloth
5c7e4800c47daea2f57809cc97ca1eb2a3560470.abstract: 본 발명은 불티 방지포에 관한 것으로, 더욱 상세하게는 용접이나 그라인딩 및 고속 절단 등의 작업과정에서 발생하여 비산되는 불티를 차단하여 화재 및 주변 피해를 방지하지 위한 불티 방지포를 투명 또는 반투명하게 구비하여 불티 방지포 내부 작업자의 작업상태를 수시로 확인할 수 있으며, 불티의 비산시 주변에 화재 위험이 있는 적재물을 덮어 불티에 의한 화재를 방지하고 적재물을 바로 확인할 수 있는 불티 방지포에 관한 것이다. 이를 위하여 본 발명은 방염 기능을 이루는 원사에 의해 직조되어 투명 또는 반투명 상태를 이루는 방염원단과; 상기 방염원단에 방염 기능을 이루며 코팅되는 투명 코팅층과; 상기 투명 코팅층에 방염기능을 이루며 접착되는 투명 시트지;로 구비됨을 특징으로 한다.

708c04f0ce1b433228b150898343f3af49e6ad04.title: COARSE GRAIN CEMENTED CARBIDE AND PREPARATION METHOD THEREOF
708c04f0ce1b433228b150898343f3af49e6ad04.abstract: The present disclosure relates to the technical field of powder metallurgy, especially to a coarse grain cemented carbide and a preparation method thereof. Pseudo particles in coarse grain tungsten carbide are removed by pretreating process. Broken of the coarse grain tungsten carbide in traditional wet milling is avoid by solid-liquid stirring, spay granulating and surface covering, which also guarantee the uniform distribution of PEG and cobalt salt. Transformation from cobalt salt to cobalt is safely and effectively guaranteed by performing two sintering stages with different atmosphere and temperature to obtain a WC—Co mixture material. By performing spark plasma sintering process, the precipitation of nano fine grain tungsten carbide guarantees regrowth of defect occurred in pretreating process. The coarse grain cemented carbide with the average grain size of WC above 10 μm, the uniform cobalt phase distribution and he bending strength not less than 2200 MPa is prepared.
708c04f0ce1b433228b150898343f3af49e6ad04.system_message:

d23e6a9475c80d8acff6b9d650103b3781317a0e.title: SYSTEMS, DEVICES, AND METHODS FOR SHOCK WAVE GENERATION UTILIZING CATHETERS WITH MULTI-METAL JOINTS
d23e6a9475c80d8acff6b9d650103b3781317a0e.abstract: An exemplary catheter includes a catheter body, a first conductive member comprising a first material positioned on the catheter body, a second conductive member comprising a second material different from the first material positioned on the catheter body, one or more electrical joints configured to electrically couple the first conductive member to the second conductive member, and one or more shock wave emitters. Each shock wave emitter is configured to generate a shock wave, and at least one shock wave emitter of the one or more shock wave emitters comprises electrodes separated by a spark gap, wherein at least one of the electrodes is formed from the second conductive member.

8d3d7176d4c786079606667b5dc29be870eebc0c.title: PROCÉDÉ ET APPAREIL DE RÉUTILISATION SPATIALE COORDONNÉE
8d3d7176d4c786079606667b5dc29be870eebc0c.abstract: A coordinated spatial reuse (co-SR) method and apparatus, applicable to the technical field of communications. The present application supports IEEE protocols, such as the IEEE 802.11be/Wi-Fi 7/EHT protocol, the IEEE 802.11bn/UHR/Wi-Fi 8 protocol, the integrated millimeter wave (IMMW) protocol, the IEEE 802.15/UWB protocol, or the IEEE 802.11bf/sensing protocol, or the spark link protocol. A first station acquires a TXOP and then transmits a first control frame, so that a second station can know that the second station is allowed to contend for a channel within the TXOP acquired by the first station. Therefore, the first station can interact with other stations in this BSS, and once the channel has been successfully obtained, the second station also can interact with other stations in the BSS, thereby effectively realizing the purpose of co-SR, and improving the flexibility of co-SR.

c9a3450b969522dc0f24e5955b9a8c62ae40743e.title: CATHÉTER D'ABLATION PAR CHAMP ÉLECTRIQUE PULSÉ ET PROCÉDÉ DE REFROIDISSEMENT
c9a3450b969522dc0f24e5955b9a8c62ae40743e.abstract: The present application is applicable to the technical field of pulsed electric field ablation catheters, and provides a pulsed electric field ablation catheter. The pulsed electric field ablation catheter comprises: a tube body part and an expansion part. The tube body part comprises a main body tube and a push-pull tube, and the push-pull tube movably penetrates through the main body tube and at least partially extends out from a distal end of the main body tube. The expansion part comprises an expansion tube, and a plurality of branch tubes are formed between a proximal end and a distal end of the expansion tube. At least one treatment electrode is provided on the branch tube, and a cooling gap in communication with the external environment is provided between the branch tube and the treatment electrode. A first perfusion channel is provided on the main body tube, and a second perfusion channel is provided on the branch tube. The first perfusion channel is in communication with the second perfusion channel, and the second perfusion channel is in communication with the cooling gap. The pulsed electric field ablation catheter provided by the present application does not require a perfusion hole to be formed on the surface of the treatment electrode, which can effectively avoid the phenomenon of spark discharge on the treatment electrode, offering high reliability.

b83c0a8f3fe3282347a0ebcf34a8e178241bc527.title: High power electrostatic chuck with features preventing he hole light-up/arcing
b83c0a8f3fe3282347a0ebcf34a8e178241bc527.abstract: A spark suppression apparatus for a helium line in an electrostatic chuck in a plasma processing chamber is provided. The spark suppression apparatus comprises a dielectric multilumen plug in the helium line, wherein the dielectric multilumen plug has a plurality of lumens, wherein the plurality of lumens are numbered between 30 to 100,000 lumens and have a width of between 1 micron and 200 microns.

afe06da8f8e514bf1d600883b7077bd6426a0e54.title: PROCÉDÉ ET APPAREIL DE COMMUNICATION, ET SUPPORT DE STOCKAGE LISIBLE
afe06da8f8e514bf1d600883b7077bd6426a0e54.abstract: The present application relates to a communication method and apparatus, and a readable storage medium. The method comprises: a sending end acquiring an information bit sequence, and using a generator matrix corresponding to a parity-check matrix of an LDPC code to encode the information bit sequence to obtain a codeword sequence, wherein the code length of the LDPC code is less than or equal to 36, and the girth of a Tanner graph corresponding to the parity-check matrix of the LDPC code is greater than or equal to 6; and sending the codeword sequence. By using the present application, the decoding success rate of the system can be improved, and thus the decoding performance and the transmission reliability are improved. The present application supports IEEE series protocols, such as IEEE 802.11bn/UHR protocol, IEEE 802.15/UWB protocol, IEEE 802.11bf/sensing protocol or integrated millimeter wave/IMMW protocol. The present application can also support a spark link/nearlink standard protocol.

931e2fca4b4824b45f5f8d95c76cdf6b10054396.title: PURIFICATEUR D'AIR ÉLECTROSTATIQUE
931e2fca4b4824b45f5f8d95c76cdf6b10054396.abstract: The present invention relates to the field of air purification devices, and provides an electrostatic air purifier. The electrostatic air purifier comprises a housing, a high-voltage circuit control module, an electrostatic generation module and a collection module, the high-voltage circuit control module being fixed on the outer side wall of the housing; three fixing holes are formed in the housing, the high-voltage circuit control module comprises three conductive assemblies, and the three conductive assemblies respectively extend into the housing via the fixing holes; the conductive assemblies are each sleeved with an insulating sleeve, the insulating sleeves abutting against the hole walls of the fixing holes; one conductive assembly is connected to the electrostatic generation module, and the other two conductive assemblies are connected to the collection module. In the electrostatic air purifier of the present disclosure, the conductive assemblies are sleeved with the insulating sleeves, and the insulating sleeves abut against the hole walls of the fixing holes, thus achieving isolation between the housing and the conductive assemblies. In this way, the formation of electric spark patterns on housings caused by electric leakage of conductive assemblies can be avoided, thus further preventing the problem of short circuit caused by high-voltage breakdown of housings.

c27ff9f082cd139bdd17debb09213919a5f5c4b9.title: Welding gun water cooling device of electric spark surfacing repair machine
c27ff9f082cd139bdd17debb09213919a5f5c4b9.abstract: The utility model relates to the technical field of material repair, and discloses a welding gun water cooling device of an electric spark surfacing repair machine, which comprises a repair machine main machine and a welding gun, the repair machine main machine is connected with the welding gun through a connecting line, and the side wall of the welding gun is respectively provided with a liquid outlet and a liquid inlet. One side of the repairing machine main machine is sequentially provided with a guiding and returning water pump, a cooling box and a guiding-out water pump, the input end of the guiding-out water pump is connected with the welding gun through flow guiding pipes, and the two flow guiding pipes are connected with the liquid outlet and the liquid inlet through hoops. According to the utility model, the heat dissipation area is increased through the annular spiral cooling channel, and the cooling efficiency is improved; the flexible pipeline is in buckle type surrounding clamping connection, rapid disassembly and assembly are facilitated, the operation flexibility is improved, and the burden of a welding gun is relieved; a filtering device is additionally arranged in a cooling liquid circulation path, blocking is effectively prevented, and the stability and durability of the system are improved.

9996e002848c4de5490633e1ac2f05b4476f94cf.title: Smoke purification device
9996e002848c4de5490633e1ac2f05b4476f94cf.abstract: The utility model discloses a smoke purification device, which belongs to the technical field of electric spark machining and comprises an installation device, an air inlet device and a purification and recovery device, the air inlet device used for air inlet and the purification and recovery device used for sucking and recovering and purifying smoke are installed on the installation device, the purification and recovery device comprises a recovery assembly used for recovering waste oil in smoke, a filtering and sucking assembly used for providing negative pressure environment suction and filtering and purifying, and a driving assembly used for providing driving force. The recycling assembly, the filtering and sucking assembly and the driving assembly are all mounted in the mounting device, the driving assembly is connected with the recycling assembly and the filtering and sucking assembly, and the recycling assembly comprises a mounting frame, a rotating shaft, a plurality of rotating plates, a filter cartridge, a collecting tank, an oil collecting box and a supporting plate. By means of the mode, oil molecules in smoke can be collected through the arrangement of the rotating plate and the filter cylinder so that follow-up secondary utilization can be facilitated, meanwhile, the filtering difficulty of the filtering and sucking assembly is reduced, and follow-up cleaning is facilitated.

a07f6de5c8f0561790cce5e10a4ce28d0b93bc5c.title: Grinding machine with rotating housing
a07f6de5c8f0561790cce5e10a4ce28d0b93bc5c.abstract: The utility model discloses a grinding machine with a rotary housing, which comprises a main body, a grinding wheel component and a dust filtering component are arranged in the main body, the main body is further provided with the housing, the housing covers the periphery of the grinding wheel component and is movably connected with the main body, and a lighting device is arranged in the housing. The housing capable of rotating in a hinged mode is arranged at the position, corresponding to the working position of the grinding wheel, of the grinding machine shell with the rotating housing, and the light source is arranged in the housing, so that the problems of dust splashing, spark splashing and too dark operation light are solved.

2c25966ee0ebc85af579babff21fda89e6aef29e.title: Component machining jig based on non-standard automation equipment
2c25966ee0ebc85af579babff21fda89e6aef29e.abstract: The utility model discloses a part processing jig based on non-standard automation equipment, which comprises a jig base, a clamping component used for clamping a processing part is arranged at the top of the jig base, a positioning plate is arranged on the upper surface of the jig base, and a positioning plate is arranged on the upper surface of the jig base. A restraining assembly used for restraining spark generation and splashing is installed on one side of the upper surface of the jig base, and a collecting assembly used for limiting spark collection is installed on the surface of the jig base. Through the synergistic effect of all structures of the suppression assembly, the fire suppression agent can be sprayed in time when sparks are generated, splashing of the sparks is effectively suppressed, personal safety threats to operators are reduced, potential risks such as skin burns and eye injuries are avoided, and the safety of the operators is improved. Splashing sparks are guided in and collected into the collecting tank filled with the fire extinguishing medium through the guide plate, and therefore production efficiency reduction and enterprise safety cost and maintenance cost increase caused by fire disasters are avoided.

dafed2bd12032c0a1fe73a8a3b5a370a3fbcbb20.title: Electromagnetic lens, scanning electron microscope, and electron beam inspection apparatus
dafed2bd12032c0a1fe73a8a3b5a370a3fbcbb20.abstract: Embodiments provide an electromagnetic lens, a scanning electron microscope, and an electron beam inspection apparatus, which are capable of suppressing an electric discharge between an objective lens and a target object. An electromagnetic lens includes a coil; a yoke including an upper wall on the upstream side along the advancing direction of a primary electron beam passing, outer and inner peripheral walls, and a lower wall where a gap is formed on the downstream side along the primary-electron-beam advancing direction or an inclined wall where a gap is formed on the downstream side along the primary-electron-beam advancing direction, letting the primary electron beam pass through a space surrounded by the inner peripheral wall, and surrounding the coil by the upper wall, the outer and inner peripheral walls, and the lower wall or the inclined wall; and a cover contacting and covering an end surface of the yoke on the downstream side along the primary-electron-beam advancing direction, the end surface including a corner portion on the inner peripheral side, wherein the cover corner portion is formed having a curved surface.

3f105b45a2b38fda225afdefd60e9674e765a37e.title: SOLUTION PROCESSING APPARATUS AND SOLUTION PROCESSING METHOD
3f105b45a2b38fda225afdefd60e9674e765a37e.abstract: A solution processing apparatus (1) includes a main body portion (20A) having a gas flow channel (30) through which a gas flows, an electric discharge section (40) for generating plasma discharge within the gas flow channel (30), and a power supply section (9) for applying voltage between a first electrode (42) and the second electrode (44) of the electric discharge section (40). The power supply section (9) periodically applying AC voltage between the first electrode (42) and the second electrode (44), thereby causing the electric discharge section (40) to perform a discharge operation in such a manner that current flowing through a solution (90) has a waveform composed of waveforms which are alternately repeated and represent positive current values and negative current values, respectively, the average of the current values becomes substantially 0 in each period, and the absolute value of a positive peak current value becomes larger than the absolute value of a negative peak current value in each period.

083996620ff7d2a036434b094db6899e3e8da4b2.title: Deep vulcanization treatment device for silica gel tube
083996620ff7d2a036434b094db6899e3e8da4b2.abstract: The utility model provides a deep vulcanization treatment device for a silica gel tube. The deep vulcanization treatment device for the silica gel tube comprises a barrel body, an electric discharge hopper, an air inlet pipe, a first cross, a transmission column and the like, the interior of the barrel body is hollow; an electric discharge hopper is arranged at the bottom of the barrel; an air inlet pipe is arranged at the lower part of the outer ring surface of the barrel; a first cross is arranged at the lower part of the inner ring surface of the barrel body, and the first cross is hollow; a transmission column is rotationally connected to the first cross. By means of the mode that the packing auger conveys the silicone tubes, the silicone tubes are more dispersed, and therefore the situation that in the prior art, an existing vulcanization drying tunnel furnace adopts a conveying belt for conveying, the silicone tubes are prone to accumulation in the conveying process, vulcanization of the silicone tubes is not uniform, and the optimal performance of the silicone tubes is affected is avoided.

8fa18791609194586718767a7dfecb16fed78af9.title: Graphite electrode mechanism for deep curved surface machining
8fa18791609194586718767a7dfecb16fed78af9.abstract: The utility model provides a graphite electrode mechanism for deep curved surface machining, which relates to the technical field of graphite electrode machining equipment and comprises a quick clamping component, the quick clamping component is used for clamping a graphite electrode, and the graphite electrode is used for performing electric discharge machining on parts; the upper end of the connecting assembly is connected with the horizontal adjusting table, the upper end of the horizontal adjusting table is connected with the rotary adjusting table, and the upper end of the rotary adjusting table is connected with the machine tool. The device has the beneficial effects that the rotary adjusting table and the horizontal adjusting table are arranged, so that the circumference angle of the graphite electrode on an XY plane can be adjusted, and the angle of the graphite electrode on an XYZ space can be adjusted; according to the multi-angle fine adjustment graphite electrode, fine adjustment of multiple angles can be carried out when the graphite electrode carries out electric discharge machining on a product, so that more accurate positioning can be achieved when the product with a deep curved surface is machined, and the machining quality and the size precision of the product are guaranteed.
