3bc2982f7c81b41bcbf40b65f1602f22f5387169.title: Cooling device of numerical control electric discharge machine
3bc2982f7c81b41bcbf40b65f1602f22f5387169.abstract: The utility model discloses a numerical control electric discharge machine cooling device in the technical field of electric discharge machines, which comprises a machine frame, a cooling device, a cooling device, a cooling device and an electric discharge machine, and is characterized in that the machine frame is provided with a processing machine head and a blocking frame, and a bearing seat is arranged in the blocking frame; the cooling mechanism comprises an annular pipe shell arranged in the blocking frame, an annular opening is formed in the inner circumferential side of the annular pipe shell, an annular sealing plate is rotationally arranged in the annular opening, a plurality of spraying pipes communicate with the inner circumferential side of the annular sealing plate in an array mode, and a plurality of supporting plates are arranged on the side, located on the annular pipe shell, of the annular sealing plate in an array mode; a water tank is arranged on the machine frame, a water drainage pipe is communicated between the blocking frame and the water tank, a water inlet pipe is communicated between the water tank and the annular pipe shell, and the water inlet pipe is communicated with a water pump arranged on the machine frame.

83cc59bc9c27e29fe677eeaccca4911b6153a5c4.title: Machining method of supercharger turbine shell runner mold
83cc59bc9c27e29fe677eeaccca4911b6153a5c4.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of die machining, in particular to a machining method of a supercharger turbine shell runner die, which comprises the following steps of: roughly machining an inner cavity of a die blank by adopting a low-speed fast feeding machining method and a cavity milling machining method; a machining strategy combining streamline machining and equal-height machining is adopted, and a high-speed cutting machining mode is adopted for semi-finish machining; an equal-height machining method is adopted for the side wall of the mold, a streamline machining method is adopted for the bottom and the runner face of the mold, 45-degree oblique angle streamline machining is adopted, and bottom back gouging is conducted on right-angle sides through a milling cutter; in the tongue area of the runner mold and the area where the machining precision cannot be guaranteed, the tail end and the sharp corner of the runner are subjected to electric discharge machining treatment through an electrode; performing deburring treatment on the parting surface of the mold; and a blue-light 3D scanner is used for detecting the molding surface of the mold. The machining method combining streamline machining, equal-height machining and electric spark machining is adopted, the partition finish machining technology is adopted, and the machining precision is improved.

40cccbc5e1f1a00f3d7233b5b593ede430978750.title: Die machining process optimization method based on CNC (computer numerical control) engraving
40cccbc5e1f1a00f3d7233b5b593ede430978750.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of mold manufacturing, in particular to a CNC engraving-based mold machining process optimization method. Comprising the following steps that CNC rough machining is conducted on a mold core; a secondary grinding forming cutter is adopted, and a mesh structure and a hot-pressing column structure on the mold core are directly machined through the CNC engraving and milling technology; wherein the distance between the mesh structures is smaller than or equal to 1.6 mm, the diameter of each hot-pressing column structure is 1.5 mm +/-0.05 mm, and the height of each hot-pressing column structure is 0.5 mm +/-0.02 mm; and electrode design, electric discharge machining and mold saving procedures are omitted, and integrated forming of the mold core from roughing to finish machining is achieved. Defects in the prior art cause a die enterprise to fall into difficulty in cost and quality balance: a high-price strategy loses order competitiveness, and a low-price strategy faces a cost upside-down risk. Therefore, the invention provides an innovative processing method which can simplify the process, reduce the cost and guarantee the precision.

640baac3a223824a1944b31f26e13a6b9cbf4bff.title: Arrangement method of electrode jig for arranging electrical discharge machining
640baac3a223824a1944b31f26e13a6b9cbf4bff.abstract: The invention discloses an arrangement method for arranging electrode jigs for electric discharge machining. The arrangement method comprises the following steps: respectively establishing electrode jig information according to electric discharge machining conditions of a plurality of electrode jigs; the electric discharge machining machine divides the multiple pieces of electrode jig information into a rough machining category, a finish machining category and a pouring gate machining category; next, the electric discharge machine not only arranges the above three categories into a rough machining category, a finish machining category and a pouring gate machining category in sequence, but also arranges information of a plurality of electrode jigs of each category from large to small according to the size of the area where the electrode jigs conduct electric discharge machining, and therefore the electric discharge machining accuracy is improved. According to the machining sequence arrangement method, the use sequence of the multiple electrode jigs can be correctly arranged, so that the use sequence of the multiple electrode jigs cannot be wrongly ranked due to practical experience of operators, and the selected electrode jigs can be used at opposite time points relative to an electric discharge machining machine.

c9e95788485fbf42db49edffa2d9191d09a551f9.title: Replacing mechanism for electric discharge machine
c9e95788485fbf42db49edffa2d9191d09a551f9.abstract: The utility model discloses a replacement mechanism for an electric discharge machine, which relates to the field of electric discharge machines, and has the technical scheme that the replacement mechanism comprises an electric discharge machining head, a base and a horizontally arranged turntable, the turntable is rotationally connected to the top of the base through a motor, and a plurality of clamping components for clamping the electric discharge machining head are mounted on the turntable. When the electric spark machining head is damaged and needs to be disassembled, the damaged electric spark machining head is disassembled to one of the clamping assemblies and is clamped, and the motor is started to drive the rotating disc to rotate and drive the other clamping assemblies to rotate. The electric spark machining heads damaged in the using process can be detached to other unused clamping assemblies, so that the multiple clamping assemblies can clamp the multiple electric spark machining heads detached from the electric spark machine for multiple times, and an operator can detach and replace the electric spark machining heads on the multiple clamping assemblies in a centralized mode; and the treatment times and frequency after an operator disassembles the electric spark machining head are reduced.

923325a283f889e4d1c2b89f015fd228d7447f0e.title: Waste liquid treatment device for electric discharge machine
923325a283f889e4d1c2b89f015fd228d7447f0e.abstract: The utility model discloses a waste liquid treatment device for an electric discharge machine, which relates to the field of electric discharge machines and is characterized by comprising a base, a storage tray and a collecting frame arranged on the base, and a push plate is slidably connected in the collecting frame along the horizontal direction. According to the electric discharge machine, when working liquid is used for carrying out electric corrosion on materials on the storage disc, chippings removed from the materials through corrosion and the working liquid can be stored in the collecting frame, then the push plate is moved to move in the direction close to the filtering frame, and when the push plate moves, the chippings and the working liquid are pushed to move respectively; the working liquid flows into the containing opening and the water outlet groove in sequence through the filtering holes, the working liquid flows into the liquid collecting frame through the water outlet pipe, the chippings are stored in the filtering frame, and then the chippings in the filtering frame and the working liquid in the liquid collecting frame are treated; and the situation that the working solution cannot be repeatedly used due to the fact that the chippings are mixed in the working solution is avoided.

f9485d88c1dea6f8ae95f012a246112dace9384f.title: Electric discharge machine adjusting device
f9485d88c1dea6f8ae95f012a246112dace9384f.abstract: The utility model discloses an electric discharge machine adjusting device, which relates to the field of electric discharge machines, and is characterized by comprising an electric discharge machining head, a storage tray, a working table and a mounting frame fixedly connected to the top of the working table. The moving frame is moved to move back and forth on the mounting frame, the moving pile, the connecting arm, the rotating arm and the electric spark machining head can be driven to move back and forth when the moving frame moves, the moving pile is moved to move left and right on the moving frame, and the connecting arm, the rotating arm and the electric spark machining head are driven to move when the moving pile moves. The connecting arm is moved to move up and down on the moving pile, the connecting arm drives the rotating arm and the electric spark machining head to move up and down when moving, and the rotating arm is rotated to drive the electric spark machining head to rotate so that the inclination angle of the electric spark machining head can be adjusted. And therefore, the position of the electric spark machining head on the workbench can be conveniently adjusted to machine different positions of materials on the storage disc.

e3d6ad48149361cf57b62a9d3076305b4a30880a.title: Vehicle-mounted high-voltage battery pack charging and discharging power supply system and control method thereof
e3d6ad48149361cf57b62a9d3076305b4a30880a.abstract: The invention discloses a vehicle-mounted high-voltage battery pack charging and discharging power supply system and a control method thereof, and relates to the technical field of vehicle-mounted high-voltage energy storage, and the method comprises the steps: a system wakes up a request for low voltage, and obtains working parameters; monitoring the voltage value of the storage battery, part faults and CAN (Controller Area Network) communication; if the voltage of the storage battery is normal, the system works normally and parts do not have faults, low-voltage standby is prompted; the system normally requests high voltage or requests charging; monitoring high-voltage interlocking, fault conditions and bus voltage during pre-charging; when the high-voltage state of the system is normal and high voltage is normally increased, pure electric discharge is prompted; after high voltage is applied, the system normally requests direct current charging, alternating current charging or inversion discharging. The high-voltage battery pack is adopted to meet the high-voltage direct-current electricity utilization requirement of the system and the load requirement, various charging and discharging application scenes such as direct-current charging and alternating-current discharging and direct-current discharging and alternating-current discharging are supported, the discharging or charging mode is flexibly recognized, and double-gun charging and discharging can be effectively controlled according to the real-time working condition.

92797bc05f01f9ee741d31cd88a33edb1e634344.title: Electrical discharge machine tool and machining method
92797bc05f01f9ee741d31cd88a33edb1e634344.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of numerical control machine tools, in particular to an electric discharge machining tool and a machining method. The stand column is fixed to the base; the X-axis moving platform is connected to the base and can move along the X axis relative to the base; the Y-axis moving platform is connected to the X-axis moving platform and can move along the Y axis relative to the X-axis moving platform, and the Y-axis moving platform is provided with a cutter and a workpiece station; the Z-axis moving assembly is connected to the stand column and can move along the Z axis relative to the stand column; the rotary electrode is connected to the lower end of the Z-axis moving assembly and can rotate around the Z axis relative to the Z-axis moving assembly; wherein during any two adjacent machining procedures, the Y-axis moving platform and the Z-axis moving assembly are actuated, and the rotary electrode rotates, so that the tool machines the rotary surface of the rotary electrode. Through the configuration, the rotary electrode is cut to ideal surface precision, and a feasible machining process is provided for machining an object which is difficult to mechanically cut.

cc75170e10ec6990a6cd0c1b947d666e6c983486.title: Guide mechanism of medium-speed wire cut electric discharge machine
cc75170e10ec6990a6cd0c1b947d666e6c983486.abstract: The utility model provides a guide mechanism of a medium-speed wire cut electrical discharge machine, which belongs to the technical field of medium-speed wire cut electrical discharge, and comprises a lower processing arm, a wire feeding mechanism, a guide wheel and a guide wheel cover, a mounting cavity for the guide wheel to rotate is formed between the guide wheel cover and the tail end of the lower processing arm, and the guide wheel is positioned below the wire feeding mechanism. A groove is formed in the side wall of the guide wheel in the circumferential direction of the guide wheel, the groove comprises a slag discharging groove part and a guide groove part which are arranged from inside to outside, the width of the slag discharging groove part is smaller than the diameter of a molybdenum wire, the width of the guide groove part is matched with the molybdenum wire, and the molybdenum wire is conveyed along the guide groove part; a guide wire channel communicated with the guide groove part is arranged on the upper end surface of the guide groove part towards the guide groove part; according to the molybdenum wire conveying device, the rotatable guide wheel is adopted to replace a traditional wire guide pipe, during continuous rotation of the guide wheel, the molybdenum wire conveying efficiency can be improved, deslagging is facilitated, the molybdenum wire can be well protected, and the service life of the molybdenum wire can be prolonged.

ced4009be74a23f5bc13d00eae40a477374a412a.title: ELECTRIC DISCHARGE MACHINE AND METHOD OF THE SAME
ced4009be74a23f5bc13d00eae40a477374a412a.abstract: To provide an electric discharge machine and a method of the same.SOLUTION: An electric discharge machine and a method of the same perform a discharge processing procedure on an object to be machined. The electric discharge machine includes a mounting base, and an electric discharge unit. The mounting base mounts the object to be machined. The object to be machined has a machining target area. The electric discharge unit performs an electric discharge procedure on the machining target area of the object to be machined, by a machining parameter, through a discharge electrode. The electric discharge unit adjusts an actual output energy value according to a state of change of a discharge frequency or discharge energy during the process of discharge of the discharge processing procedure, and thereby can maintain the discharge processing procedure in a target processing state. The electric discharge machine and the method assists in removing a residue remaining in a working groove by external force to be provided, by using a slag discharge unit, while an insulating sleeve covers the discharge electrode, which can reduce Kerf loss.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

4d26380cedc3434a0ad1c820f1f45aff9c121576.title: ELECTRIC DISCHARGE MACHINE AND ELECTRIC DISCHARGE METHOD
4d26380cedc3434a0ad1c820f1f45aff9c121576.abstract: To provide a wire electric discharge machine that can extend a service life of a filter 32, even when subjecting an aluminum-based material to electric discharge machining.SOLUTION: A wire electric discharge machine (10) according to an embodiment in the disclosure subjects an aluminum-based material to electric discharge machining. A processing liquid used for electric discharge machining in the wire electric discharge machine includes one or more cations selected from potassium ions, calcium ions, sodium ions, and magnesium ions, and one or more anions selected from sulfate ions, sulfite ions, disulfite ions, hydrogen sulfite ions, hydroxide ions, nitrate ions, and nitrite ions.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

d207439cb6542663e6108dba55e2c11d6e437f6e.title: PROCÉDÉ D'ÉVALUATION DE LA RÉSISTANCE À LA CORROSION ÉLECTROLYTIQUE DE PALIER À ROULEMENT
d207439cb6542663e6108dba55e2c11d6e437f6e.abstract: The method of the present invention employs: a testing step S1 in which a prescribed voltage is applied to a rolling bearing in a state in which the inner ring and the outer ring are rotating relative to one another; an investigation step S2 in which a search is conducted, within a first rolling surface and a second rolling surface that have completed the testing step, for an abnormal surface portion generated when a single electric discharge occurs between the first rolling surface or the second rolling surface and the rolling body; and an evaluation step S4 in which, if an abnormal surface portion comprising an electric discharge mark generated with an uneven shape is found in the investigation step, it is determined that the rolling bearing may generate ridge marks due to electrolytic corrosion on the first rolling surface or the second rolling surface, and if no electric discharge mark is found in the investigation step, it is determined that the rolling bearing does not generate ridge marks.

7594774bc924404fc18d5b9883a5477f15cce38f.title: PROCÉDÉ DE FABRICATION D'UNE ROUE À AUBES FERMÉE
7594774bc924404fc18d5b9883a5477f15cce38f.abstract: In a closed impeller (1) made of an aluminum alloy, a plurality of blades (3) arranged in the circumferential direction connect a hub (2) and a shroud (4). First, electric discharge machining is performed on impeller material to form a plurality of flow passages (5) between the blades (3). Then, a surface of a flow passage that is the inner peripheral surface of each flow passage (5) in the impeller material is polished to remove a modified layer formed on the surface of the flow passage by the electric discharge machining, and then the surface of the flow passage is further polished.

8d1a9fab7cfd402ca8860242786c7104eb35354f.title: Electrical discharge machining apparatus and method
8d1a9fab7cfd402ca8860242786c7104eb35354f.abstract: The invention relates to an electric discharge machining device and method which are used for performing an electric discharge machining program on a to-be-machined object. The electrical discharge machining apparatus includes a stage and an electrical discharge machining unit. The carrying table is used for carrying a to-be-machined object. The to-be-processed object defines a processing target area. The electrical discharge machining unit performs an electrical discharge machining procedure on a machining target area of the to-be-machined object through the discharge electrode according to the machining parameters. The electric discharge machining unit correspondingly adjusts the actual output energy value according to the change state of the discharge frequency or the discharge energy in the discharge process of the electric discharge machining program, so that the electric discharge machining program is maintained in the target machining state. According to the electric discharge machining device and method, a deslagging unit is used for providing external force to assist in removing residues remaining in a machining groove. In addition, the insulation sleeve is used for wrapping the discharge electrode, so that cut loss can be reduced.

6a03617bbe99e0dad96b0f0d7b332224958cc55b.title: Machine tool structure with symmetrical combined machine heads
6a03617bbe99e0dad96b0f0d7b332224958cc55b.abstract: The utility model discloses a machine tool structure with symmetrical combined machine heads. The machine tool structure comprises a base, a first stand column, a second stand column, a first set of electric discharge machining machine heads and a second set of electric discharge machining machine heads. A working groove is formed in the base, the first stand column is arranged on one side of the base, and the second stand column is arranged on the other side of the base. A first X-axis linear module is arranged on the first stand column, and a second X-axis linear module is arranged on the second stand column. The first group of electric discharge machining machine heads is connected with the first X-axis linear module, and the second group of electric discharge machining machine heads is connected with the second X-axis linear module; each of the first group of electric discharge machining machine heads and the second group of electric discharge machining machine heads comprises at least three machine heads; any one of the discharge machining machine heads is provided with an independent Y-axis linear module and an independent Z-axis linear module and is connected with a discharge machining power source. The linkage of the first group and the second group of discharge machining machine heads can machine a plurality of workpieces or machine different parts of the same workpiece at the same time, so that the parallel work is realized, and the efficiency is improved.

13947357551cdd5204fbb4b1eef64b9076baa51f.title: Control rod driving mechanism heat insulation sleeve dismounting process
13947357551cdd5204fbb4b1eef64b9076baa51f.abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of special maintenance of reactor bodies, and particularly relates to a control rod driving mechanism thermal sleeve dismantling process. Comprising the following steps that 1, a dismantling robot walks and is positioned to the position under a to-be-dismantled heat casing pipe; 2, the electric spark machining head is jacked and positioned to the position of the upper end of the to-be-dismantled hot casing pipe; 3, the electric spark machining head conducts electric discharge machining on the upper end of the to-be-dismantled hot sleeve till the upper end is completely cut off; 4, the heat sleeve is moved downwards, and middle cutting is carried out; and 5, the hot sleeve is taken out. The method provided by the invention has the beneficial effects that the method of removing the hot sleeve from the lower part of the top cover is adopted, so that the welding seam of the pressure-resistant shell of the control rod driving mechanism is prevented from being damaged, and the test verification work after the primary loop pressure boundary is damaged is not needed. And an electric spark machining method is adopted, remote automatic machining in a narrow space can be achieved, the reaction of machining does not exist, and the equipment can be light and miniaturized.

80fb9da08dc8320a34b3f42afc9cf8d7edd0f835.title: Four-head bilateral spark machine
80fb9da08dc8320a34b3f42afc9cf8d7edd0f835.abstract: The utility model relates to a four-head double-side electric discharge machine, and belongs to the technical field of electric discharge machines. The device comprises a working table, bases higher than the table top of the working table are arranged on the two sides of the working table, the bases are symmetrically arranged on the two sides of the working table, two sets of spark units are slidably connected to the two sets of bases correspondingly, the four sets of spark units form a four-head structure, and the structures on the two sides of the working table are symmetrical; according to the design of the four-head double-side spark machine in the scheme, the spark units are arranged on the two sides of the workbench, two sets of spark units are arranged on each side, and the total number of the four sets of spark units is four. By means of the design, non-standard point position synchronous electric spark machining of the workpiece is achieved, the machining efficiency is greatly improved, and the device is particularly suitable for processing of non-standard customized products and has the efficient synchronous machining capacity. The spark machine head can freely move on the workbench in a three-dimensional mode and has the precise displacement control capacity. The flexibility ensures that the spark machine head can accurately reach any designated position on the workbench, and the complex machining requirement is met.

810547fae77b6a1346415f7ed1840c684242df30.title: Detection device for data cable processing
810547fae77b6a1346415f7ed1840c684242df30.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of wire and cable manufacturing and detection, and discloses a detection device for data cable processing, which comprises an electric discharge machine device, dust collection stabilizing devices are fixedly connected to two sides of the electric discharge machine device, and tension guide wheel devices are fixedly connected to the bottoms of the dust collection stabilizing devices. The spark machine device is fixedly connected with the integral shell, the spark machine device is fixedly connected with the base, the base is fixedly connected with the integral shell, and the tension guide wheel device is arranged, so that the detection precision is ensured, the missing detection and false alarm rate is reduced, the equipment compatibility is improved, the equipment loss is reduced, and the service life of the equipment is prolonged; the dust collection device is arranged, dust on the cable is cleaned and collected through negative pressure, the influence on subsequent procedures is reduced, the production stability is improved, the shutdown risk is reduced, the stabilizing assembly is arranged, high-speed shaking is restrained through non-contact adsorption of the negative pressure, and the procedure precision is improved.

336f7c8170638db601ca939cfaa33049692a126f.title: Simulation control system for discharge processing in high-radiation boron-containing water environment of nuclear power plant
336f7c8170638db601ca939cfaa33049692a126f.abstract: The invention particularly relates to a discharge machining simulation control system for a nuclear power plant in a high-radiation boron-containing water environment, which belongs to the technical field of special maintenance in the high-radiation environment of the nuclear power plant and comprises a man-machine interaction system, a discharge machining control system and subsystems. Each subsystem comprises a pulse power supply system, a servo power system, a washing system, a purification system, a grounding system and a tool system; the man-machine interaction system is used for man-machine interaction and displaying the discharge machining implementation data fed back by the subsystems; the electric discharge machining control system is used for generating an electric discharge machining instruction according to the man-machine interaction information and controlling the subsystems to cooperate to perform electric discharge machining work; and each subsystem is used for implementing electric discharge machining work according to the electric discharge machining instruction and feeding back electric discharge machining implementation data. According to the invention, simulation control of discharge processing in the high-radiation boron-containing water environment of the nuclear power plant is realized.

51aafcb590efc8159ad51bf3520637d9c8c6edeb.title: EDM cutting device with rotary positioning function
51aafcb590efc8159ad51bf3520637d9c8c6edeb.abstract: The invention belongs to the field of remote underwater maintenance, and particularly relates to an EDM cutting device with a rotary positioning function, which comprises a base, a positioning mechanism, a driving mechanism and an electrode device, the positioning mechanism is mounted on the base, the driving mechanism is mounted on the positioning mechanism, and the electrode device is mounted on the driving mechanism; the positioning mechanism is used for adjusting the electrode device in the circumferential direction, and the driving mechanism is used for vertically moving the electrode device in the axial direction; the electrode device is used for conducting electric discharge machining on the machined part. According to the device, center positioning is conducted through the positioning shaft and the positioning groove of the positioning mechanism, and accurate positioning of the EDM electrode and the machining position is achieved; and circumferential positioning is carried out through the rotating part of the driving mechanism, so that positioning of the EDM electrode in the circumferential direction is realized.

b1d992bae40e6f15e1da7a13fe5d2ed645663037.title: IMAGE FORMING APPARATUS AND TRANSFER CONDITION CONTROL METHOD
b1d992bae40e6f15e1da7a13fe5d2ed645663037.abstract: To prevent the occurrence of an image quality defect caused by electric discharge at a leading end of a sheet, in performing image formation by superimposing toners with different average particle diameters.SOLUTION: An image forming apparatus 1 comprises: a secondary transfer unit 133 that secondarily transfers toner images to a recording material; and a control unit 16 that changes a transfer condition according to the physical property value of the recording material in image formation in which toner layers using toners with different average particle diameters are superimposed with each other.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 11

66998c8968bdd1f7590cb6d2271096aff7308447.title: ELECTRIC DISCHARGE PROCESSING METHOD
66998c8968bdd1f7590cb6d2271096aff7308447.abstract: To provide an electric discharge processing method with which it is possible to efficiently reproduce the battery subject to processing.SOLUTION: The electric discharge processing method comprises: a discharge step in which a depleted lithium-ion secondary battery is discharged, and lithium is moved from the anode to the cathode of the lithium-ion secondary battery; a charge step in which the lithium-ion secondary battery is charged with a low voltage at which the proportion of lithium returning to the anode is small; a measurement step in which the capacity of the lithium-ion secondary battery is measured after being charged with the low voltage for a prescribed duration; and a confirmation step in which the state of health (SOH) is confirmed on the basis of the measured capacity of the lithium-ion secondary battery. Charge processing by the charge step is finished when the SOH of the lithium-ion secondary battery reaches a recovery critical point.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

3a20e45d5e0dabdf14e823204a57c8b7c1e1010e.title: Pulling head of lower coil holder stay wire clamp of wire cut electric discharge machine
3a20e45d5e0dabdf14e823204a57c8b7c1e1010e.abstract: The utility model discloses a pull head of a lower coil holder stay wire clamp of a wire cut electric discharge machine. A left-right moving groove and an up-down moving groove which are communicated with each other are formed in a fixed block; the guide nozzle mounting seat is fixedly mounted at the left end of the top of the fixed block; the guide nozzle is fixedly mounted at the right end of the guide nozzle mounting seat; a wire clamping groove located on the left side of the guide nozzle is formed in the left end of the guide nozzle installation base and located above the up-down moving groove. The left-right moving block is mounted in the left-right moving groove; the up-down moving block is mounted in the up-down moving groove; the top of the up-and-down moving block protrudes upwards to form a wire jacking block; the connecting rod is mounted between the left-right moving block and the up-down moving block, and the left end of the connecting rod is higher than the right end; the bottom sealing plate is fixedly installed on the bottom face of the fixing block, and the left-right moving block, the up-down moving block and the connecting rod are all packaged in the fixing block. The metal wire clamping device can clamp a metal wire and pull the metal wire to move in the left-right direction, and is high in automation degree and high in working efficiency.

05abec4133e8a1d67e1dcadb54001d56149c9c85.title: Tensioning wire discharging device of medium-speed wire cut electric discharge machine
05abec4133e8a1d67e1dcadb54001d56149c9c85.abstract: The utility model provides a tensioning wire outlet device of a medium-speed wire cut electrical discharge machine, and belongs to the technical field of medium-speed wire cut electrical discharge machine.The tensioning wire outlet device comprises a base, a sliding seat and a charging barrel, the charging barrel is used for outputting molybdenum wires wound on the charging barrel through rotation and is arranged on the sliding seat, and a sliding mechanism is arranged between the sliding seat and the base; the sliding mechanism comprises a driving assembly, and a guide rail and a sliding block which are arranged between the first inclined surface and the second inclined surface; compared with a traditional medium-speed wire cut electric discharge machine which adopts a tension adjusting mechanism with a plurality of tensioning wheels, the wire outlet device with the tensioning function has the advantages that the number of the tensioning wheels can be reduced, the structure of the device and the steps of threading and winding molybdenum wires are simplified, and the production efficiency is improved. And meanwhile, the problems that the multiple tensioning wheels vibrate in the working process and the cleaning difficulty of the multiple tensioning wheels is large after long-term machining are solved.

03a0f7b3a8246c48b5e71d57a7c8b486f3741988.title: ULTRAVIOLET LIGHT EMITTING ELEMENT AND ULTRAVIOLET LIGHT IRRADIATION DEVICE PROVIDED WITH THE SAME
03a0f7b3a8246c48b5e71d57a7c8b486f3741988.abstract: The present invention provides a safe ultraviolet light irradiation device that uses ultraviolet light safe to the human body and has a wide range of microorganism elimination and sterilization effects, and also provides an ultraviolet light emitting element provided with: an electrode substrate having a pair of electrodes; at least one cylindrical or flattened cylindrical glass tube disposed on the electrode substrate so as to face both of the electrodes, the glass tube having both end parts sealed; a xenon gas-containing discharge gas enclosed inside the glass tube and generating an electric discharge due to a voltage applied to the electrodes; and a phosphor layer formed on an inner surface of the glass tube and emitting light when excited by the electric discharge, wherein the glass tube is made of borosilicate glass or quartz glass; and the phosphor layer is made of a phosphate-based fluorescent material and has an emission spectrum having a peak half value width within a wavelength range of 50 nm or less with a peak at a wavelength of 203±10 inm on an illuminance basis.

93d6a17b9536bc1a4f96c533765195ec238444e9.title: Electrical discharge machine and electrical discharge machining method
93d6a17b9536bc1a4f96c533765195ec238444e9.abstract: This electric discharge machine is provided with: a discharge machining unit that performs electric discharge machining on a workpiece in a machining fluid; and a filter that removes sludge contained in the machining fluid. When the workpiece is made of an aluminum-based material, electric discharge machining is performed using a machining fluid in which the specific resistivity has been reduced to a prescribed value or less due to addition of a chemical agent, and the prescribed value is equal to or less than 30,000 [[Omega]cm].

d5dd08cdab5b580e4cbcffdcc792134c5a1c34a5.title: CONTROL DEVICE FOR HYBRID VEHICLE
d5dd08cdab5b580e4cbcffdcc792134c5a1c34a5.abstract: To provide a control device for a hybrid vehicle that can suppress electric discharge from a battery when the battery has an SOC equal to or lower than a threshold and an electric motor that functions as a power generator generates electric power of the maximum electric energy.SOLUTION: When a battery has an SOC equal to or lower than a threshold and a first electric motor generates electric power of the maximum electric energy and generates a deviation amount Wdf, at least part of the deviation amount Wdf is subtracted from at least one of the available electric energy and auxiliary power.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 8

4f5bbb7ddc0bea35deb755027580941553155004.title: IMAGE FORMING APPARATUS
4f5bbb7ddc0bea35deb755027580941553155004.abstract: To prevent the occurrence of faulty cleaning in initial rotation for allowing a new process cartridge to perform printing.SOLUTION: An image forming apparatus comprises a control unit 100 that executes an initialization operation for allowing a new photoconductor drum 1 to perform printing, and an image forming operation for forming a toner image on a transfer material P. The control unit 100 controls a transfer voltage power supply 20 to apply, to a transfer roller 4, a constant voltage (-150 V) ((v) example 1 of transfer voltage) different from that during an image forming operation, in a time T11 until immediately before [2] a toner supply period for supplying toner in a developing area 31 from a developing device 3 to the photoconductor drum 1 in the initialization operation, and controls the transfer voltage power supply 20 so as to adjust the constant voltage to be applied to the transfer roller 4 in the time T11 to have a normal electrification polarity of the toner and a voltage value at which electric discharge does not occur between the photoconductor drum 1 and the transfer roller 4.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 4

c8a391f13b4c02f2142809e78964fb2ef9395683.title: IMPULSE TEST SYSTEM AND IMPULSE TEST METHOD
c8a391f13b4c02f2142809e78964fb2ef9395683.abstract: To provide an impulse test system and an impulse test method that make it possible to appropriately grasp an electric discharge point.SOLUTION: An impulse test system 20 tests a test transformer 1 for impulses. The impulse test system 20 comprises: a high-speed camera control device 25 for outputting a recording start command on the basis of the test voltage application timing of an impulse test; a high-speed camera 26 for capturing an image beginning from a timing at which the recording start command is received and installed in the periphery of the test transformer 1 that is the object to be tested; a test data recording server 22 for recording the captured image; and a display unit 21a for displaying an electric discharge point included in the result that is recorded in the test data recording server 22.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

b0afb06bbb46fb14f5f1ab7b610039b1119a92c6.title: Cooling oil filtering device of electric discharge machine
b0afb06bbb46fb14f5f1ab7b610039b1119a92c6.abstract: The invention relates to the field of cooling oil filtering, in particular to a cooling oil filtering device of an electric discharge machine, solves the problems that an existing cooling oil filtering device of the electric discharge machine is inconvenient to clean, single in use and high in use cost, and provides the following scheme. The device comprises an upper barrel, a lower barrel, a motor bin, a chuck, a filter element, a telescopic piece, a circular ring disc, a first circular ring, a guide plate, a scraper and a cleaning brush, a traction assembly is arranged on the circular ring disc, an unfolding assembly is arranged between a vertical plate and the guide plate, a driving assembly is further arranged in the upper barrel and used for driving the first circular ring to rotate, and the lower barrel is provided with a driving assembly. The scraping plate is driven to clean the inner wall of the upper barrel and the cleaning brush is driven to clean the outer side surface of the filter element. The device can be used independently and can also be used in combination with an electric discharge machine, functionality is increased, oil can be fed from multiple pipe openings, the cooling oil filtering efficiency is greatly improved, self-cleaning can be achieved, the cleaning effect is good, and the use cost is low.

4fee9c6243f1285094b564214c5fb267332ff53d.title: ELECTRIC CHARGE SHIELDING DEVICE
4fee9c6243f1285094b564214c5fb267332ff53d.abstract: The present disclosure relates to a shielding device against atmospheric discharges. The device comprises a first conductive element and a second conductive element that passes through the first conductive element, wherein both conductive elements are electrically insulated by means of a first insulating body, and a second insulating body that are connected to the ends of the first conductive element and the second conductive element. Additionally, the device comprises a third conductive element that passes through the second conductive element that is connected to a fourth conductive element. The fourth conductive element is connected to one of the ends of the first and second conductive elements, and the shape of the fourth conductive element prevents the generation of a corona effect in the presence of an electric discharge. In addition, the third conductive element allows the lightning shielding device to be connected to a grounding element, thus concentrating the electric discharge only in the lightning shielding device, acting as an electric capacitor, and producing the flow of electric charge towards the grounding element, preventing the discharge from spreading to structures or people around.

dfb40e763cc643c93e4e521e644d05e1750f18bc.title: Adjusting head of electric discharge machine
dfb40e763cc643c93e4e521e644d05e1750f18bc.abstract: An electric discharge machine adjusting head comprises a combination device, an adjusting device and an electrode base, the combination device is used for being combined with an electric discharge machine head, the electrode base is used for installing an electrode, the adjusting device comprises a top disc, a movable disc and a plurality of deflection adjusting assemblies, and the top disc is provided with a plurality of abutting parts; the movable disc is provided with a plurality of movable grooves, each movable groove comprises a straight groove and a ball hole, the straight grooves are located below the ball holes and communicated with the ball holes, and the ball holes are located below the abutting parts; each deflection adjusting assembly comprises a lifting ball and an adjusting piece, the lifting balls are located in the ball holes, the adjusting pieces are located in the straight grooves, and when the adjusting pieces are screwed into the movable grooves, the adjusting pieces extrude the lifting balls, so that the lifting balls abut against the abutting-against parts, the gap between the top disc and the movable disc is expanded, and the deflection adjusting assemblies are arranged on the top disc. Therefore, the deflection angle is changed.

e84905b50bc624c4773619c33083a7632ceea624.title: Penetrating head of wire penetrating frame of wire feeding frame of wire cut electric discharge machine
e84905b50bc624c4773619c33083a7632ceea624.abstract: The utility model discloses a penetrating head of a wire penetrating frame of a wire feeding frame of a wire cut electric discharge machine. A circular rotating block mounting groove which is through up and down is formed in a fixed block; the rotating block is mounted in the rotating block mounting groove and can rotate in the rotating block mounting groove; a wire clamping rod insertion hole is formed in the center of the rotating block; the front end of the push rod is rotatably pivoted on the rotating block, and the rear end of the push rod is directly or indirectly connected with the push-pull power device; the threading mounting seat is mounted and fixed on the bottom surface of the rotating block; the left wire clamping device and the right wire clamping device are both installed on the wire penetrating installation base. The top of the left wire clamping device and the top of the right wire clamping device are both inserted into wire clamping rod insertion holes of the rotating block. The push-pull power device pushes the push rod, the push rod pushes the rotating block to rotate, and the left wire clamping device, the right wire clamping device and the wire penetrating installation base are driven to rotate synchronously. According to the utility model, the metal wire which is blocked in descending is not blocked after rotating, and can smoothly descend and enter the next working procedure, so that the production efficiency is high.

4ef733b2e2e1ec992d799e4135b267eda107b51b.title: Electric spark machining tool
4ef733b2e2e1ec992d799e4135b267eda107b51b.abstract: The utility model discloses an electric spark machining tool, and relates to the technical field of machining tools. An electric spark machining tool comprises an electrode clamping device and a part positioning device, the electrode clamping device comprises a clamping seat and a plurality of clamping structures arranged on the clamping seat, and each clamping structure comprises a clamping plate hinged to the clamping seat and an elastic jacking assembly arranged in the clamping seat. The elastic jacking assembly is used for jacking one end of the clamping plate so that the other end of the clamping plate can be matched with the clamping base to clamp an electrode. The part positioning device is provided with a plurality of positioning structures corresponding to the clamping structures in a one-to-one mode, and the positioning structures are used for positioning parts to be machined. According to the electric discharge machining tool, the purpose of batch electric discharge machining of parts is achieved, the electric discharge time is saved, and the production efficiency is improved.

1e6807c4258fcf3e5d5dce45e24f497cd5d48b15.title: METHOD OF GENERATING A PRESET PRESSURE WAVE BY A HIGH-VOLTAGE ELECTROCHEMICAL EXPLOSION TO PROVIDE THE REQUIRED FORCE EFFECT ON THE PROCESSED OBJECT
1e6807c4258fcf3e5d5dce45e24f497cd5d48b15.abstract: Method of generating a preset pressure wave by a high-voltage electrochemical explosion to provide the required force effect on the processed object, in which the required total energy of the high-voltage electrochemical explosion is determined, which consists of electrical and chemical energies, an empirical dependence is obtained for an exothermic mixture containing 60% aluminum powder in an aqueous solution of an oxidant, at variable values ​​of the electrical energy and mass of the exothermic mixture, by which the specific electrical energy and the specific combustion efficiency of the exothermic mixture are determined, as the coordinates of the point of contact of the tangent line to the empirical dependence, at which the maximum chemical energy is released at a certain value of the total energy, and the mass of the exothermic mixture is determined. Capsule is filled with exothermic mixture, into which electrodes are installed from opposite sides, and the exothermic mixture is ignited by a discharge current when high-voltage pulses are applied to the electrodes from a pulse current generator with a capacitance. Before determining the required total energy of a high-voltage electrochemical explosion, a preset pressure wave is obtained at a certain point in the wave zone of the technological volume for the required force effect on the processed object, according to which the calculated parameters of the pulse current generator are determined. Required total energy of the electrochemical explosion is determined through the energy of a high-voltage electric discharge in the liquid. After determining the mass of the exothermic mixture, the amount of chemical energy released due to exothermic reactions and the amount of electrical energy are determined based on the calculated total energy. The required capacitance C of the pulse current generator is calculated, which is then installed in the pulse current generator, from which high voltage pulses are supplied to the electrodes installed in the capsule with the exothermic mixture.

443408acf30153023cc3a93b55bb01afa5884a69.title: Large-temperature-difference high-temperature fused salt and water heat exchange steam generation system
443408acf30153023cc3a93b55bb01afa5884a69.abstract: The utility model discloses a large-temperature-difference high-temperature fused salt and water heat exchange steam production system. The system comprises a fused salt storage tank, a high-pressure hot water storage tank, a fused salt-water/steam heat exchanger and a steam pocket, the fused salt-water/steam heat exchanger is of a multi-shell-pass spiral coil pipe type heat exchanger structure. A plurality of limiting inner barrels are arranged in a shell barrel to form annular cavities of different levels, a plurality of heat transfer pipes are connected in parallel and wound around a central pipe or the wall of an upper-level fiber inner barrel to form spiral coil pipes, and a plurality of sets of spiral coil pipes are arranged in the annular cavities respectively. A shell side fused salt liquid inlet, a shell side fused salt liquid outlet, a pipe side water inlet and a pipe side steam outlet are formed in the shell cylinder body; the fused salt-water/steam heat exchanger is connected with an outlet and an inlet of the fused salt storage tank and further connected with a water outlet and an inlet of the high-pressure hot water storage tank. High-temperature thermal shock damage of the heat exchanger and pipeline blockage caused by fused salt solidification can be effectively eliminated, membrane boiling of water is inhibited, the heat transfer efficiency is high, and system operation is safe and reliable.

84a5113c8bbcae00f4b10df14cb2204f97ea17d3.title: Frying and baking machine
84a5113c8bbcae00f4b10df14cb2204f97ea17d3.abstract: The utility model relates to a frying and baking machine which comprises a base assembly and an upper cover assembly capable of covering the base assembly, the base assembly comprises a lower baking tray, the lower baking tray is provided with a cooking groove and a water groove, a water tank is arranged in the water groove, the water tank is provided with a containing cavity and at least one water outlet, the water outlet is communicated with the containing cavity and the water groove, and the water outlet is communicated with the cooking groove. And an air outlet gap for steam circulation is formed between the outer side wall of the water tank and the side wall of the water tank. When the frying and baking machine is used, both the water tank and the water tank are filled with water, steam can be generated only by heating the water in the water tank to boil during heating, and the water does not need to be heated to boil completely, so that the steam can be generated quickly. Meanwhile, after the water in the water tank is consumed, the water in the water tank can flow into the water tank through the water outlet, so that the duration time of the steam is prolonged.

1dd3cbba12b38e43a6c75163e48f8b4c732d3152.title: Black liquor combustion alkali furnace optimization design method based on numerical simulation
1dd3cbba12b38e43a6c75163e48f8b4c732d3152.abstract: The invention discloses a black liquor combustion alkali furnace optimization design method based on numerical simulation, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the geometric modeling of an alkali furnace in a design stage, combining the combustion of the alkali furnace, NOx generation and a flue gas-water/steam heat exchange model, and obtaining the distribution rules of a temperature field, a velocity field and a concentration field in the alkali furnace and the heat efficiency of the alkali furnace through CFD numerical simulation. Therefore, the rationality of the current design can be evaluated, an optimized alkali furnace design scheme can be obtained through iterative optimization, and the later operation and maintenance cost is reduced. In addition to the optimization design stage, the technical method can be adopted for the existing alkali furnace to carry out fault diagnosis and technical transformation scheme effectiveness evaluation.

a82790449654d33f1ebf7abf46cc6ea00a4ac34a.title: Espresso machine with cold brew mode
a82790449654d33f1ebf7abf46cc6ea00a4ac34a.abstract: Abstract An espresso machine for producing an espresso coffee beverage from coffee grounds held by a portafilter, the espresso machine including: a water tank; a group head for receiving the portafilter; a pump between the water tank and the group head for pumping water from the water tank toward the group head; a heater between the pump and the group head; a steam wand for expelling steam produced by the heater heating water received from the pump; a valve between the group head, the steam wand and the heater; a grinder for producing the coffee grounds; a controller for controlling the pump, the heater, and the valve; and a user interface for providing a user signal to the controller, the user interface having: a grind icon that, when actuated, results in the controller operating the grinder for producing coffee grounds; a brew icon that, when actuated, results in the controller operating the pump, the heater, and/or the valve for providing hot water to the group head; and a steam icon that, when actuated, results in the controller operating the pump, the heater, and/or the valve for providing steam to the steam wand, wherein each of the grind icon, brew icon, and steam icon, when actuated multiple times in a short time period, results in the controller operating the grinder, the pump, the heater, and/or the valve for preparing the grind path, the group head, and the steam wand, respectively, for producing the espresso coffee. 134 138 130 136 Water Tank FM Flow Meter Solenoid Pump Over Pressure Valve Low thermal mass flow through heater E-valve E-valve E-valve 2/2 E-valve Group Head Heater Hot/cold water OR Steam Brew Hot/cold water Hot/Cold coffee Coffee Output Air Pump Venturi Steam Hot water Steam Wand Output Steam & Air Mix Hot Water OutputHot water ot w at er te am 134 138 130 136 212 150 Hot/cold Brew Group Head, water OR Hot/cold Heater Steam M water Hot/Cold coffee 2 Coffee GHH Output E-valve 2/2 Water W E-valveFM OPV FTH 180Tank 2 Flow Meter Low thermal Hot water OR Steam Over Pressure 160 Solenoid Valve Air Pump mass flow 170 Pump through 162 heater 2 Venturi Steam Wand 140 Steam OutputSteam & 3/2 Air Mix E-valve 120 Hot 180 164 water M 2 Hot Water Hot water Output E-valve ct c t o t o l d c o f f e e o f f e e a t e r Hot water t e a m l o w e t e r o l e n o i d h e a t e r e n t u r i t e a m a n d t e a m t e a m &amp; 26de1ed4da85c11d68ac9dd3000171c570c7cb42.title: Mixed gas generating device for heavy oil thermal recovery high-pressure gas injection
26de1ed4da85c11d68ac9dd3000171c570c7cb42.abstract: The invention provides a heavy oil thermal recovery high-pressure gas injection mixed gas generation device which comprises a gas mixing generation unit, the mixed gas generation unit is connected to the top of a supporting base, and the mixed gas generation unit is used for manufacturing high-pressure mixed gas; the gas mixing generation unit comprises a gas generation shell, a combustion assembly, a dispersion assembly and a temperature adjusting assembly are arranged in an inner cavity of the gas generation shell, one end of the combustion assembly is fixedly connected with one side of the gas generation shell in a penetrating mode, the other end of the combustion assembly is rotationally connected with one end of the dispersion assembly, and the temperature adjusting assembly is arranged on the outer side of the dispersion assembly. Combustion gas generated by the combustion assembly can be evenly dispersed in the gas generation shell through the dispersion assembly, water can be fully sprayed to an inner cavity of the gas generation shell through the temperature adjusting assembly, the combustion gas can make full contact with the water, steam is generated, and therefore mixed gas can be obtained; and the mixed gas is pressurized and injected into an oil well through the gas storage module, the steam injection module and the like, and heavy oil thermal recovery is carried out.

df10b6aa1bc54c9fe82b24c32d44150f1b48283d.title: Built-in sealed water tank assembly for pipeline machine
df10b6aa1bc54c9fe82b24c32d44150f1b48283d.abstract: The utility model discloses a built-in sealed water tank component for a pipeline machine in the field of drinking water equipment, which comprises a water tank and a water pump, an opening is arranged at the top of the water tank, a water tank cover is arranged at the opening, a water inlet and an air vent which are communicated with the water tank are arranged on the water tank cover, and the air vent is connected with a water-steam separation box through an air pipe. A water outlet is formed in the bottom of the water tank, a three-way pipe is arranged at the water outlet, and the other two connectors of the three-way pipe are connected with the drainage pipe and a water inlet pipe of the water pump respectively. The water inlet and the air vent in the water tank cover are utilized to ensure that water from the water purifier can enter the water tank, and water in the water tank cannot flow into the pipeline machine, so that damage to components caused by water leakage is avoided; the drainage pipe and the water inlet pipe of the water pump are connected with the water outlet at the bottom of the water tank through the three-way pipe, so that water in the water tank can be fully sucked by the water pump, stored water is reduced, and the stored water in the water tank can be drained conveniently when the pipeline machine is not used for a long time.

b3104bf97ebaf641f58fea50790d7c32bf6cb163.title: Plate forming equipment
b3104bf97ebaf641f58fea50790d7c32bf6cb163.abstract: The utility model relates to the technical field of galvanized sheet processing, in particular to sheet forming equipment, which comprises an upper die, a lower die and a water bath system, the upper die comprises an upper die holder and an upper die insert arranged on the upper die holder, and the lower die comprises a lower die holder and a lower die insert arranged on the lower die holder; the water bath system comprises a water tank arranged on the lower die holder and a steam collecting device arranged on the upper die holder; when the upper die and the lower die are closed, the forming surfaces of the upper die insert and the lower die insert are positioned in the water tank; and the steam collecting device is used for discharging water steam formed above the water tank to the outside of the equipment. According to the plate forming equipment, a large amount of water vapor can be discharged through the steam collecting device, the damp condition of a machine tool of the equipment is reduced, the problems that the equipment is affected with damp and corroded due to the water vapor can be solved, and then the probability that the equipment breaks down can be reduced.

90e9ea8675ee5a6bd3d4927f1f7a2b2b0cf9d95d.title: Water dispenser water outlet nozzle capable of stably stopping water outlet
90e9ea8675ee5a6bd3d4927f1f7a2b2b0cf9d95d.abstract: The utility model discloses a water dispenser water outlet nozzle capable of stopping water stably, which comprises a water outlet nozzle body provided with an inner cavity and provided with a water outlet and a water inlet; the partition plate component comprises a first partition plate, a second partition plate and a third partition plate, the first partition plate divides the inner cavity into a first cavity and a second cavity, the water outlet and the water inlet are both communicated with the first cavity, an air outlet is formed in the second cavity and located at the bottom of the water outlet nozzle body, and the second partition plate is located at one end of the water inlet; the third partition plate is located on the side, away from the second partition plate, of the second partition plate, the water outlet is located between the first partition plate and the second partition plate, and a gap is reserved between the first partition plate and the second partition plate. According to the utility model, the problems that hot steam is discharged together with hot water through the water outlet nozzle, water steam in the hot water can cause the phenomena of unstable water outlet, water splashing and the like, and a user is easily scalded can be solved.

72c53022e6f6c63500cdb0a87b32c3949ace7612.title: METHOD FOR REMOVING ORGANIC DISSOLVED SUBSTANCES IN WATER-STEAM CYCLE
72c53022e6f6c63500cdb0a87b32c3949ace7612.abstract: To provide a method for removing organic dissolved substances in water-steam cycle, which simultaneously achieves improved heat exchanger efficiency through the addition of droplet condensation promoters and the removal of organic dissolved substances from the water-steam cycle system excluding the target heat exchanger.SOLUTION: A method for removing organic dissolved substances in a water-steam cycle where organic chemicals are added upstream of a heat exchanger, the method for passing at least a part of the drain water from the heat exchanger through a filtration device to remove organic dissolved substances, in which the filtration device comprises a plurality of devices arranged in parallel, each comprising at least one of an ion exchange device, an activated carbon filtration apparatus, an RO membrane device, and an NF membrane device, arranged in parallel, a part of the drain water is passed through some of these devices, and when the filtration performance is determined to have decreased based on the amount of chemical added or water quality measurements from sensors, the water flow is switched to another device.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

45e9b0abfd7f5f4dbb44559da9c36c84fcc969fd.title: Faucet with heating and water-vapor separation functions and multifunctional water dispenser
45e9b0abfd7f5f4dbb44559da9c36c84fcc969fd.abstract: The utility model relates to a faucet with heating and water-vapor separation functions and a multifunctional water dispenser, which comprise a water heating device for heating water, a main control board, the faucet and a water-vapor separation box, and the water heating device is arranged in the faucet; the water-steam separation box is provided with a hot water inlet and a water outlet nozzle, the water-steam separation box is arranged in the faucet, the water outlet nozzle is provided with a steam exhaust outlet and a hot water outlet, the water outlet nozzle is exposed out of the faucet, the hot water inlet is communicated with a water outlet of the water heating device, and a water inlet of the water heating device is connected with an external water source; the water heating device is electrically connected with the main control board, and the main control board controls the water heating device to start and stop. The water and steam can be effectively separated through the design of the water-steam separation box, it is guaranteed that steam is not carried in the hot water output process, the user experience is improved, and meanwhile the scalding risk caused by steam overflow is avoided.

6b33529f473e6cdef826ea76ad75cc0ba224f485.title: Double-separation double-cooling system air compressor
6b33529f473e6cdef826ea76ad75cc0ba224f485.abstract: The utility model provides an air compressor with double separation and double cooling systems. The air compressor comprises double oil-gas separation systems, double cooling systems and a main machine, an oil-gas mixing outlet of the main machine is respectively communicated with two oil-gas separation barrels in the double oil-gas separation system through gas inlet pipelines; gas outlets of the two oil-gas separation barrels are communicated with each other through a gas outlet pipe, and oil outlets of the two oil-gas separation barrels respectively enter two sets of oil filter systems in the double-cooling system; the air outlet pipe is communicated with an air inlet pipe, the air inlet pipe is respectively communicated to two air coolers in the double-cooling system, and air outlets of the air coolers are communicated with an exhaust pipe through a water-steam separator; and an oil outlet of the oil filter system is communicated with the main machine.

9ca750cc5df8980dfa48df0ac2d3b9fb1dd51d0f.title: Steam generator and cooking equipment
9ca750cc5df8980dfa48df0ac2d3b9fb1dd51d0f.abstract: The utility model discloses a steam generator and cooking equipment, and the steam generator comprises a heating structure which comprises a heated container and a heating part, and the heated container is internally provided with a heating cavity; the water-steam separation structure is used for discharging steam generated by the heating structure; the communication structure can be used for supplying water to the heating structure and the water-vapor separation structure; the water flow control structure can be used for supplying water to the communicating structure; the heating structure further comprises a temperature monitoring structure used for monitoring temperature changes, and water supply of the water flow control structure is controlled through the monitored temperature changes. One side of the temperature monitoring structure is attached to the heated container or the heating piece; water supply of the water flow control structure is controlled by monitoring temperature change detection of the heating structure through the temperature monitoring structure, water supply of the water flow control structure is controlled after the heating structure reaches the preset temperature, a good water supply control effect is guaranteed, excessive dry burning caused by too little water in the heating structure is avoided, and the service life of the heating structure can be prolonged.

388722315f8800dbfac8c4f63635fe598054756d.title: Permanganate index analyzer convenient for collecting water vapor
388722315f8800dbfac8c4f63635fe598054756d.abstract: The utility model discloses a permanganate index analyzer convenient to collect water vapor, and relates to the technical field of permanganate index analyzers, the analyzer comprises a box body, and a digestion position is arranged in the box body; a water steam draining mechanism and a water steam collecting mechanism are arranged on the box body, the water steam draining mechanism comprises an air inlet formed in the left side of the box body, a right air outlet formed in the right side of the box body and an upper air outlet formed in the top of the box body, and exhaust fans are arranged at the right air outlet and the upper air outlet; the digestion position is positioned below the upper exhaust outlet; and the water vapor collecting mechanism is respectively communicated with the right air outlet and the upper air outlet. The water vapor collecting mechanism is mounted at the air outlet of the instrument, so that a large amount of water vapor generated when the instrument works can be collected, and the discharged water vapor is prevented from being attached to other equipment and instruments in a machine room, so that the normal operation of other equipment and instruments is not influenced; meanwhile, when the liquid in the liquid storage tank reaches a certain amount, the water vapor collecting mechanism can also automatically discharge the liquid.

a4d2a637b4723f28b5ff3451c183ba9345ba5003.title: Portable mute invisible power generation device
a4d2a637b4723f28b5ff3451c183ba9345ba5003.abstract: The invention relates to the field of power generation equipment, in particular to a portable mute stealth power generation device which comprises a power generation component and a simulation component. The power generation component comprises a diesel oil combustion unit, and the diesel oil combustion unit is used for improving the combustion utilization rate by atomizing macromolecular diesel oil drop clusters into micromolecular diesel oil gas clusters and fully mixing the micromolecular diesel oil gas clusters with combustion-supporting air; the high-pressure steam generating unit is used for forming a water-steam circulating system without a power device by utilizing a self-circulating steam generating technology; the annular rotor power generation unit realizes power generation through expansion work of high-pressure steam; the condensation latent heat recovery unit is used for preparing drinking water by condensing water vapor and is linked with the infrared simulation component; high-temperature distilled water is injected into the simulation component to simulate an infrared false target, and the device has the advantages of being small in size, high in power generation efficiency, low in noise, high in confusion and the like.

b5edd7f6a8f74e3f7b53f675c6c4560f3239f2fa.title: Ironing equipment and ironing control method
b5edd7f6a8f74e3f7b53f675c6c4560f3239f2fa.abstract: The invention provides ironing equipment and an ironing control method, and relates to the technical field of ironing. The ironing equipment comprises a main machine steam generating device, a secondary steam generating device and a water-steam separating device. The water-steam separation device is enclosed by an upper cover and a shell to form a backflow cavity, and the backflow cavity is communicated with the main machine steam outlet end and the secondary steam inlet end. A baffle structure is arranged in the backflow cavity and used for changing the flow direction of steam and promoting liquid water drops in the steam to be separated, and separated water flows back to the main machine under the action of gravity to be recycled. The dryness of the steam is improved after the steam is subjected to water-vapor separation treatment, and the steam is easier to vaporize after entering the secondary steam generation device, so that the heating burden is relieved, the water spraying phenomenon is avoided, and the use safety and user experience are improved.

c2e229d99ec1a11a4d48f50f0ce490f56ade586d.title: Automatic pressure relief system
c2e229d99ec1a11a4d48f50f0ce490f56ade586d.abstract: The utility model discloses an automatic pressure relief system which comprises a reaction kettle body, a steam conveying pipe, a cooling water feeding pipeline and a cooling water return pipeline, one end of the steam conveying pipe and one end of the cooling water feeding pipeline are jointly connected with a water-steam mixer, one end of the water-steam mixer is connected with a plurality of conveying pipelines, and the conveying pipelines are connected with the cooling water return pipeline. A coil pipe is arranged on the circumferential side wall in the reaction kettle body, one end of the conveying pipeline is connected to the coil pipe, one end of the cooling water return pipeline penetrates through the reaction kettle body and is connected to the coil pipe, a stirring mechanism is arranged on the reaction kettle body, a circulating water pump is installed on the cooling water feeding pipeline, and the cooling water return pipeline is connected to the circulating water pump. And a connecting pipe is connected between the cooling water feeding pipeline and the cooling water return pipeline. According to the utility model, the pressure of the system can be kept within the range required by the process, the stable operation of the whole system is ensured, the risk caused by the operation of workers can be reduced, the safety of the operation is ensured, the operation is simple, and the practicability, rapidity and convenience are enhanced.

0005efaf43e8754e869092ab66d91a3feaede78d.title: SOLIDES EN GRANULÉS POUR STOCKER ET LIBÉRER DE MANIÈRE RÉVERSIBLE DE L'ÉNERGIE THERMOCHIMIQUE, ET COMPOSANTS, SYSTÈMES ET PROCÉDÉS ASSOCIÉS
0005efaf43e8754e869092ab66d91a3feaede78d.abstract: A multiphase pellet comprises a calcium-based material in combination with an aluminum-containing binder or a silicon-containing binder, or both. The multiphase pellet can undergo more than about 300 standard cycles of charging and discharging. The calcium-based material can include one or more of lime, limestone, plaster-of-paris, calcium oxide and calcium carbonate. The binder can include one or more of Portland cement, alumina, aluminum hydroxide, an aluminoslicate, calcium aluminate cement, bauxite, and kaolin. The multiphase pellet can be used to store and to release thermochemical energy. For example, the multiphase pellet can be charged by heating it, e.g., at a temperature of at least about 350 °C, to store energy. The multiphase pellet can be discharged using water, steam, or humidified air, or a combination thereof, to cause the pellets to release heat.

0578028832682c8af706c40b7884da973f1a976c.title: Water-vapor separation box and instant heating water dispenser
0578028832682c8af706c40b7884da973f1a976c.abstract: The water vapor separation box comprises a box body, a water inlet, a water vapor separation flow channel, a water outlet and a steam exhaust flow channel, the water inlet is communicated with the water vapor separation flow channel, the water outlet is communicated with the water vapor separation flow channel, and the inlet end of the steam exhaust flow channel is communicated with the water vapor separation flow channel; and a first water baffle is arranged in the water-steam separation flow channel and used for preventing hot water in the water-steam separation flow channel from entering the steam exhaust flow channel. The first water baffle can be used for preventing hot water in the water-steam separation flow channel from entering the steam exhaust flow channel, complete separation of the hot water and steam is achieved, the hot water is prevented from being discharged through the steam exhaust flow channel, therefore, a user is prevented from being scalded, and the use safety is improved.

f60110a3f8d8db14c4cb187953b60090ecb9b276.title: Steam boiler provided with solar hot water energy-saving system
f60110a3f8d8db14c4cb187953b60090ecb9b276.abstract: The utility model belongs to the field of steam boilers, and provides a steam boiler with a solar hot water energy-saving system, which comprises a boiler, a flue gas waste heat recovery device and a solar heating device, a 1 # tank is arranged at the tail end of a preheating pipe, and a first water supplementing pipe connected with the solar heating device is arranged on the 1 # tank. A second water supplementing pipe is arranged on the solar heating device, a second tank is arranged at the tail end of the second water supplementing pipe, a hot water supply pipe connected with the boiler is arranged on the second tank, a water-steam separation device communicated with the second tank and the first tank is arranged between the second tank and the first tank, and the water-steam separation device comprises a tank body, two steam inlet branch pipes, an exhaust pipe and two condensate water return pipes. According to the utility model, the mode of preheating and then solar heating is adopted, the gas consumption is greatly reduced by about 30%, the design is reasonable, the structure is simple, the cost is reduced, the hot water supply efficiency and the overall workshop production efficiency are ensured, and the device is suitable for large-scale popularization.

9f16afa50a035bebd87345f063bbd0510f95f787.title: Spray type dish washing machine with elbow nozzle
9f16afa50a035bebd87345f063bbd0510f95f787.abstract: The utility model discloses a spray type dish-washing machine with an elbow nozzle. Tap water enters the stainless steel inner container through the water inlet electromagnetic valve. The water discharged from the rotary piston water pump enters the left lower side of the pressurized water tank through a water outlet one-way valve, the compressed air discharged from the rotary piston air compressor enters the left upper side of the pressurized water tank through an electric heating wire and a one-way air valve, the compressed air and a water-steam-water mixing pipe, and the mixture of the compressed air discharged from the water-steam-water mixing pipe and water enters an L-shaped water pipe. And then the water enters a central barrel of a central barrel cover plate of the strip-shaped rotary nozzle from a circle of small holes in the upper section of the L-shaped water pipe. A mixture of compressed air and water from a plurality of centrosymmetric thin pipes on the central barrel of the central barrel cover plate penetrates through the rubber thin pipes and enters the elbow nozzles, and mist water sprayed by the elbow nozzles flushes tableware in the wrist basket. After set time is reached, the motor traction drainage valve is electrified and opened, and water pumped out by the rotary piston water pump is discharged from the drainage pipe through the electrified and opened motor traction drainage valve and the drainage one-way valve.

e05badc9a129e09363a4405d5c0ac2afcb665c47.title: High-speed remote landslide dynamic process prediction method
e05badc9a129e09363a4405d5c0ac2afcb665c47.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of geological disaster prediction, and discloses a high-speed remote landslide dynamic process prediction method, which comprises the following steps: S1, selecting a landslide research area, and obtaining physical and mechanical parameters of solid-phase particles, ice, water, gas, a solid skeleton and a sliding mass of the landslide area; s2, according to the physical and mechanical parameters, establishing a mechanical equilibrium equation, a material conservation equation and an energy conservation equation, and establishing a high-speed remote landslide heat-water-force-steam coupling kinetic model for describing the whole process of ice-water-steam phase change in the cold region; and S3, performing simulation prediction on the dynamic process of the high-speed long-distance landslide through the thermal-water-force-steam coupling dynamic model of the high-speed long-distance landslide to obtain a prediction result. According to the invention, a heat-water-force-steam coupling modeling framework combining solid ice melting and pore water vaporization processes is adopted, the method is suitable for simulating a multi-stage phase change process caused by rapid temperature rise in a landslide shear zone, and transition behaviors among freezing, melting and vaporization stages can be continuously described.
