ee963ff357d452e8ce50ec2ba09c6ee7011b345f.title: Orthohydrogen and parahydrogen conversion test system and method
ee963ff357d452e8ce50ec2ba09c6ee7011b345f.abstract: The invention discloses an ortho-parahydrogen conversion test system and method, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen liquefaction. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen pipeline, a liquid nitrogen pipeline, a test hydrogen pipeline and a standard hydrogen pipeline, the liquid hydrogen pipeline is sequentially connected with a liquid hydrogen storage tank, a liquid hydrogen regulating valve, a liquid hydrogen temperature zone cooler, an intermediate cooler and a hydrogen temperature sensor; the liquid nitrogen pipeline is sequentially connected with a liquid nitrogen storage tank, a liquid nitrogen regulating valve, a liquid nitrogen temperature zone cooler, an intermediate cooler and a liquid nitrogen temperature sensor; the test hydrogen pipeline is sequentially connected with the hydrogen cylinder, the test hydrogen valve, the ortho-parahydrogen conversion tester and the gas chromatograph, the test hydrogen pipeline is further connected with a standard hydrogen pipeline, and the standard hydrogen pipeline is sequentially connected with the standard hydrogen valve and the gas chromatograph. The continuous gradient temperature from the liquid nitrogen temperature zone to the liquid hydrogen temperature zone in the hydrogen liquefaction system is provided through cooperative matching of the liquid nitrogen medium and the liquid hydrogen medium, the true application environment simulation of the ortho-parahydrogen catalyst is achieved, and the device structure and the operation process are simplified.

12f8ef11cc7a701777edc31e3001d105ce984457.title: Liquid hydrogen leakage diffusion safety protection system and method
12f8ef11cc7a701777edc31e3001d105ce984457.abstract: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen leakage diffusion safety protection system and method, and relates to the technical field of liquid hydrogen medium safety utilization. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen plant top, a liquid hydrogen plant wall and a liquid hydrogen plant bottom which are sequentially connected from top to bottom and form a sealed house body structure; a vertical discharge channel is formed in the top of the liquid hydrogen plant; an anti-explosion exhaust fan is arranged at the bottom of the vertical discharge channel, and a heater is arranged in the circumferential The front end of the low-temperature nitrogen pipeline is located outside the sealed room body structure and sequentially connected with a liquid nitrogen storage box, a liquid nitrogen valve and a liquid nitrogen vaporizer, and the rear end of the low-temperature nitrogen pipeline is located below the sealed bottom plate in the sealed room body structure and connected with the array type purging device. Low-temperature nitrogen and a heater are arranged at different heights, the chimney effect is formed in closed or semi-closed spaces such as a liquid hydrogen plant, leaked liquid hydrogen is rapidly treated by comprehensively utilizing the density difference and the temperature difference of liquid hydrogen vaporization, meanwhile, the array type purging device is used for preventing liquid hydrogen from flowing and diffusing, and the influence range of liquid hydrogen leakage is reduced.

4ec4aebe7c076cdcad219dced0971649956ceb74.title: Fast-response liquid hydrogen storage and supply system and method
4ec4aebe7c076cdcad219dced0971649956ceb74.abstract: The invention discloses a fast-response liquid hydrogen storage and supply system and method, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen-air fuel cells. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen storage tank, an air temperature box, a temperature control heat exchanger and a fuel cell. The high-pressure hydrogen cylinder is used as a supplement when the hydrogen elimination amount of the system is sharply increased, the high-pressure hydrogen cylinder is located in the air temperature box, the high-pressure hydrogen cylinder is cooled through gasification heat of low-temperature liquid hydrogen, the hydrogen filling amount can be effectively increased, and the adverse factor of overheating in the high-pressure hydrogen filling process can be overcome. The liquid hydrogen medium is heated step by step through the air temperature box and the temperature control heat exchanger, more evaporation heat is cooled by the air temperature box, less sensible heat is cooled by the temperature control heat exchanger with the adjustable power, and the energy utilization efficiency and the temperature control precision of the system can be effectively improved. In addition, the high-pressure hydrogen pipeline and the liquid hydrogen pipeline are arranged in parallel and are provided with regulating valves for regulating the flow of gaseous hydrogen fuel, so that the regulation dimension of the system can be increased, and the control capability of hydrogen fuel pressure and flow information can be enhanced.

b985b297fc8c11c498488da7897c361d866c3e36.title: Soft cold shield liquid hydrogen filling system and method
b985b297fc8c11c498488da7897c361d866c3e36.abstract: The invention discloses a soft cold shield liquid hydrogen filling system and method, and relates to the technical field of liquid hydrogen. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen supply tank and a liquid hydrogen filling tank, in the liquid hydrogen storage stage, a medium in a cold shield is promoted to be converted into a solid state from a liquid state through the cold capacity of evaporated low-temperature hydrogen, cold energy storage is achieved, and the heat insulation performance of the liquid hydrogen storage tank can be improved; in the filling stage, a liquid hydrogen medium in the liquid hydrogen storage tank is emptied, and the medium in the open type cold shield is gradually converted into a liquid state from a solid state, so that the tank body is always kept in a low-temperature state, and the time required by subsequent pre-cooling operation is shortened; by means of the designed S-shaped capillary connector, a small part of liquefied high-density media and low-density media enter the inner tank to be vaporized under the condition that the heat insulation capacity is not affected, the micro-positive pressure of the inner tank of the liquid hydrogen filling tank is maintained, meanwhile, the low-density media and the high-density media are sequentially arranged from top to bottom, vaporized gas can be layered, and the heat insulation capacity of the liquid hydrogen filling tank is improved. And external air is effectively prevented from entering, and the time required by subsequent replacement operation is shortened.

c465cfa8cdfa6e47b0a670e7b98e6cb9694a5056.title: Liquid hydrogen vaporization system and method
c465cfa8cdfa6e47b0a670e7b98e6cb9694a5056.abstract: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen vaporization system and method, and relates to the technical field of liquid hydrogen. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen pressurization pipeline, a liquid hydrogen tank, a liquid hydrogen supply pipeline, a flat vaporizer, an air pipeline, a water pipeline and a liquid carbon dioxide pipeline. Through a transient pressurization method, a liquid hydrogen medium is in a supercooled state temporarily, the boiling state of liquid hydrogen in the flat vaporizer is eliminated, the metering precision of a liquid level meter is enhanced, and the liquid level regulation and control capacity of the liquid hydrogen is improved; the vertical fins of the flat plate vaporizer are divided into a plurality of groups of heat exchange temperature areas from top to bottom, so that gas components corresponding to different temperature areas are only liquefied and are not solidified, flow channels are not broken under the action of gravity, a liquid film is prevented from being generated, the heat exchange capacity of the vertical fins is greatly improved, and the frosting problem of a conventional liquid hydrogen vaporizer is solved. Meanwhile, the liquid hydrogen medium side and the vertical fin side of the flat vaporizer can maintain a stable heat exchange state; and liquefied liquid water and liquid carbon dioxide are collected, so that the method has relatively high environment-friendly application potential.

ccdfaf2696dcde06ca5b6ef480ba9bad491fdac2.title: Electrolyte for Lithium Secondary Battery and Lithium Secondary Battery Containing the Same
ccdfaf2696dcde06ca5b6ef480ba9bad491fdac2.abstract: An object of the present invention is to provide an electrolyte for a secondary battery capable of improving high-temperature storage characteristics and high-temperature lifespan characteristics of a lithium secondary battery, and a secondary battery including the same. The electrolyte for a lithium secondary battery of the present invention comprises: a lithium salt; an organic solvent; and a sulfonyl-based compound represented by chemical formula 1. In the chemical formula 1, R1 and R2 are independently selected from hydrogen, medium and small hydrogen, and a substituted or non-substituted C1-C4 alkyl group. The present invention can remarkably improve the high-temperature storage characteristics and the high-temperature lifespan characteristics of a battery due to a decrease in a thickness change rate and a decrease in a DCIR change rate when the battery is stored at high temperature. In addition, the electrolyte of the present invention can improve low-temperature output characteristics of the battery.

f58a9bff1869b1e318906c6af866cd9712b52909.title: High-strength pipeline steel plate suitable for hydrogen conveying pipeline and manufacturing method
f58a9bff1869b1e318906c6af866cd9712b52909.abstract: The invention discloses a high-strength pipeline steel plate suitable for a hydrogen conveying pipeline and a manufacturing method, and belongs to the technical field of metal materials. The manufacturing method comprises the following steps: manufacturing a casting blank; the casting blank is subjected to rough rolling and finish rolling, and a finish-rolled steel plate is obtained; the upper surface of the finish-rolled steel plate is cooled through large-flow water spraying, the lower surface of the finish-rolled steel plate is cooled through compressed air or mist spraying or naturally cooled in air, the cooling speed of the upper surface is larger than that of the lower surface, the strength of the upper surface is larger than that of the lower surface, and the high-strength pipeline steel plate is obtained. The strength of the high-strength pipeline steel plate in the thickness direction is different, the upper strength of the steel plate is high, and the pipeline wall thickness is reduced; the lower part of the steel plate is low in strength, so that the influence degree of conveying medium hydrogen on the brittleness and fatigue life of the material is reduced, the loading capacity of the high-strength material is ensured, and the harmfulness of the hydrogen medium is reduced.

dff7b0217ecb4502b8595b74be93cd616837e8cd.title: Hydrogen purification method and purification device for removing carbon monoxide by using molecular sieve
dff7b0217ecb4502b8595b74be93cd616837e8cd.abstract: The invention relates to a hydrogen purification method for removing carbon monoxide by using a molecular sieve, which adopts a purification device to carry out carbon monoxide removal on input hydrogen containing carbon monoxide. The purification method comprises the following steps: S1, nitrogen replacement: when the purity of gas-phase nitrogen is detected to be greater than 99.5% by a gas sampling analyzer AI, opening a valve IV to perform emptying, wherein the purity of the gas-phase nitrogen is detected to be greater than 99.5% by a gas output from an output port of a reactor; s2, starting a heater for heating to activate the molecular sieve; s3, primary purification; and S4, secondary purification: when the gas output from the output port of the reactor detects that the purity of gas-phase hydrogen is greater than 99.99% and the content of carbon monoxide is less than or equal to 0.2 mu mol/mol through a gas sampling analyzer AI, the purified hydrogen is output from a hydrogen output pipeline through a valve II. The device is suitable for deep removal of carbon monoxide in a gas-phase hydrogen medium, and the output hydrogen meets the requirement that the content of impurity carbon monoxide is less than or equal to 0.2 mu mol/mol for hydrogen for a fuel cell.

f4e6ea320480dcb20647810d57195954796f3e85.title: Liquid hydrogen regulating valve testing device and testing method thereof
f4e6ea320480dcb20647810d57195954796f3e85.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of valve testing and performance detection, in particular to a liquid hydrogen regulating valve testing device and a testing method thereof.The liquid hydrogen regulating valve testing device comprises a liquid hydrogen pipeline, a liquid hydrogen storage tank, a first liquid hydrogen valve, a heat insulation box and a testing regulating valve. According to the device, the supercooled liquid hydrogen is prepared through the low-temperature vacuum unit, and the liquid hydrogen passing through the test regulating valve is cooled, so that gas-liquid two-phase flow is prevented from being generated; high-pressure hydrogen generated by vaporization of part of liquid hydrogen is used for regulating and testing internal pressure in front of and behind the regulating valve in a transient state, the liquid hydrogen is converted into a non-equilibrium state from an equilibrium state, and the supercooling degree of the liquid hydrogen is further increased; supercharged gas of the liquid hydrogen storage tank is low-temperature hydrogen subjected to a supercooled liquid hydrogen bath, so that the temperature of the liquid hydrogen in the liquid hydrogen storage tank can be effectively prevented from rising, and the possibility of vaporization of the liquid hydrogen is reduced from the source; the rear end of the device adopts the parallel hydrogen flow meter with high accuracy to indirectly test the liquid hydrogen flow under the working condition of small opening of the test regulating valve, so that the consumption of a liquid hydrogen medium can be effectively reduced, and the overall accuracy of the test is improved.

e4c6d1b5088772bccdb4b022db1c60f503e99cf8.title: Multi-state liquid hydrogen valve testing device and testing method thereof
e4c6d1b5088772bccdb4b022db1c60f503e99cf8.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of valve testing and performance detection, in particular to a multi-state liquid hydrogen valve testing device and a testing method thereof.The multi-state liquid hydrogen valve testing device comprises a helium pressurizing pipeline, a high-pressure helium tank, a helium switching valve, a first helium pressure reducing valve, a first helium stop valve and a first pressure sensor. According to the invention, by regulating and controlling the temperature and pressure parameters of the liquid hydrogen medium before and after the liquid hydrogen medium flows through the test valve, the test of various complex working conditions such as supercritical hydrogen, supercooled hydrogen, transcritical hydrogen and the like can be realized besides a conventional saturated state; by adjusting the flow of liquid hydrogen before and after flowing through the test valve, the test of two working conditions of stable flow and fluctuating flow can be realized; and meanwhile, the helium mass spectrometer, the flowmeter and other devices are arranged, so that the testing contents of inner leakage, outer leakage and the like of the valve can be effectively realized. Generally speaking, the device not only can realize the conventional test of the liquid hydrogen valve, but also can realize various complex content tests, has the advantages of simple structure, convenience in operation and the like, and is beneficial to popularization and application.

3f26f758fc87f35bd62aa40ccca1dac639804b53.title: High-pressure ferrule joint for hydrogen medium
3f26f758fc87f35bd62aa40ccca1dac639804b53.abstract: The utility model discloses a high-pressure ferrule joint for hydrogen medium, which is applied to the field of ferrule joints and comprises a ferrule joint, a medium channel is arranged in the ferrule joint, two limiting blocks are embedded in the medium channel, and flexible parts are bolted on the sides, far away from each other, of the two limiting blocks; through the arrangement of the first threaded seat and the second threaded seat, after the nut is in threaded connection with the clamping head, the first threaded seat is in threaded connection with the clamping head, the second threaded seat is in threaded connection with the nut, and the nut is tightened in the opposite direction of the nut through the first threaded seat and the second threaded seat; the nut is prevented from loosening under high pressure; the strength of the flexible part is improved by arranging the limiting block in the clamping connector, after the flexible part makes contact with the pipeline through the toughness of the flexible part, the pipeline is pushed tightly, the flexible part deforms, the end face of the pipeline which is cut unevenly can be wrapped, and therefore the sealing performance after the pipeline is installed is improved.

315e640de5a32e9e416c190596372d90cd7d0ea6.title: Liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump low-temperature test device and method
315e640de5a32e9e416c190596372d90cd7d0ea6.abstract: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump low-temperature test device and method, and the device comprises a liquid hydrogen storage tank used for storing a liquid hydrogen medium, the liquid hydrogen storage tank is provided with a liquid hydrogen medium input port and a liquid hydrogen medium backflow port, and a gas inlet pipeline of a liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is connected with an inlet adjusting valve, a first thermometer and a first pressure gauge. An outlet pipeline of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is further connected with an outlet one-way regulating valve, a second thermometer, a second pressure gauge and a liquid hydrogen flow meter, and an air return port pipeline of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is connected with an air return stop valve and a fourth thermometer. A pump pool of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is connected with a third thermometer, a third pressure gauge and a power monitoring instrument connected with the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump, one side of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is provided with a test control console position used for monitoring various data in the operation process of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump, and all the instruments are connected with the test control console position. The liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump performance evaluation method has the effect that the performance of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump can be effectively evaluated conveniently.

32460785a6f2584c4bcfac64c9a8d54af1aee998.title: Method for preparing 2-butenol compound through isomerization of liquid-phase 3-butenol compound in hydrogen medium environment
32460785a6f2584c4bcfac64c9a8d54af1aee998.abstract: The invention provides a method for preparing a 2-butenol compound through isomerization of a liquid-phase 3-butenol compound in a hydrogen medium environment, which comprises the following steps: in a hydrogen environment, enabling a mixture flow of inorganic alkali and the 3-butenol compound to pass through a catalyst bed layer, and carrying out isomerization reaction to obtain the 2-butenol compound, the addition amount of the inorganic base is 0.01-1.5% of the mass of the 3-butenol compound; the catalyst is porous silicon oxide loaded with palladium, cerium and selenium. According to the present invention, by adding the additional alkali to the 3-butenol raw material, the unsaturated alcohol can be effectively prevented from being converted into the saturated alcohol during the isomerization process in the presence of the hydrogen, and the hydrogen adsorption capacity of the palladium catalyst can be inhibited by adding the electron accelerator selenium to the catalyst so as to improve the hydrogen adsorption capacity of the 3-butenol; the stability of cations of a palladium compound is maintained while the hydrogenation activity of the catalyst palladium is reduced, the diffusivity of the palladium is improved by the structure accelerant cerium, the active center and coordination of the palladium are increased, and the performance of the palladium catalyst is structurally improved.

a6165c6fd3ac42cb17b9cd654e9949f289e51a77.title: Liquid hydrogen low-temperature stop valve
a6165c6fd3ac42cb17b9cd654e9949f289e51a77.abstract: The liquid hydrogen low-temperature stop valve particularly relates to the field of stop valves and comprises a main body mechanism, the main body mechanism comprises a valve body, a first through groove is formed in the valve body, second through grooves communicated with the first through groove are formed in the two sides of the first through groove, and a valve element is inserted into the first through groove in an up-down sliding state. A valve rod is fixedly installed at the top of the valve element, the valve rod can be arranged in the first through groove in a reciprocating motion state in the axial direction of the valve rod, a valve body lengthening pipe is fixedly installed at the top of the valve body, and the outer wall of the valve rod is sleeved with the valve body lengthening pipe. The valve body extension pipe is arranged on the outer wall of the valve rod, and the guide heat insulation ring is arranged between the valve rod and the valve body extension pipe, so that heat convection of a liquid hydrogen medium in the valve is reduced, liquid hydrogen cold energy is prevented from being conducted to other sealing parts of the sealing corrugated pipe fitting, the sealing performance and the service life of the valve are guaranteed, and the service life of the valve is prolonged. And the liquid hydrogen medium storage and transportation safety can be improved.

206c8c4f61f39fc7be7a56722c5f064231d690bc.title: Liquid hydrogen valve sealing performance testing device
206c8c4f61f39fc7be7a56722c5f064231d690bc.abstract: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen valve sealing performance testing device, and relates to the technical field of ultralow temperature valve performance testing, the liquid hydrogen valve sealing performance testing device comprises a hydrogen supply subsystem, a hydrogen cooling and liquefying subsystem and a valve sealing performance detection subsystem, and an internal cooling method can be adopted to carry out internal leakage detection and external leakage detection on a tested valve in a liquid hydrogen environment; the hydrogen replacement and recovery subsystem switches a gas purging replacement pipeline and a hydrogen recovery pipeline by controlling the flow direction of a cut-off reversing mechanism, and hydrogen which is not liquefied in the pre-cooling stage can be recovered and reused. And the monitoring and control subsystem is used for monitoring and controlling the operation states of the hydrogen supply subsystem, the hydrogen cooling and liquefying subsystem, the valve sealing performance detection subsystem and the hydrogen replacement and recovery subsystem. According to the invention, high-pressure hydrogen can be cooled and liquefied on a test site, and a large amount of liquid hydrogen medium can be continuously obtained, so that the low-temperature sealing performance test can be carried out on the tested valve in a real liquid hydrogen medium environment.

87ddbb758239170241738292f8affc41de68ed26.title: Hydrogen heat conduction measuring device and method
87ddbb758239170241738292f8affc41de68ed26.abstract: The invention discloses a hydrogen heat conduction measuring device and method. A sample cavity used for containing a hydrogen sample to be subjected to heat conduction measurement is formed in an inner cavity of a low-temperature Dewar, a sample cavity pressure sensor and a sample cavity temperature sensor are arranged in the cavity, and an electric heating assembly used for heating the sample cavity and the hydrogen sample in the cavity is installed outside the low-temperature Dewar; a hot wire is fixed in a cavity body of the sample cavity through an insulating support piece, only two ends of the hot wire are fixed with the insulating support piece in an insulating manner, and the rest part is immersed in the hydrogen sample in the sample cavity; the top of a cavity body of the sample cavity is sequentially connected with an electromagnetic valve and a hydrogen emptying valve through a stainless steel capillary tube; and the sample filling pipeline is sequentially connected with a hydrogen source tank. The linear heat source is heated by constant power, the temperature of the linear heat source and the measured hydrogen medium around the linear heat source can rise, the heat conductivity coefficient of the measured hydrogen medium can be obtained according to the temperature rise of the linear heat source, and efficient measurement of multi-state hydrogen heat conduction physical properties such as a liquid state and a supercritical state is achieved.

13746b2a203d36137770bd89a318775949e2b942.title: Lightweight liquid hydrogen storage and supply system and method
13746b2a203d36137770bd89a318775949e2b942.abstract: The invention discloses a lightweight liquid hydrogen storage and supply system and method, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen energy. The magnetocaloric heat exchanger for the liquid hydrogen medium is designed by utilizing the heat flow magnetic field effect and vaporization part pressurization of materials such as Be and Ga, the effective heat exchange area of the magnetocaloric heat exchanger is controlled by adjusting the magnitude of input current, and the magnetocaloric heat exchanger has the advantages of small size, light weight, simple structure and the like; and the application potential on carriers with high weight requirements, such as hydrogen energy aircrafts and the like, is huge. By measuring the air state parameters, the current liquid hydrogen vaporization amount data is indirectly obtained and serves as the basis for changing the liquid hydrogen vaporization amount, accurate regulation and supply of the liquid hydrogen vaporization amount can be achieved, the regulation and control strategy of the whole system is simple, safe and reliable, and large fluctuation generated during flow regulation can be prevented.

c14dfb41f4695692afa38b740ff1e923d61a4f8e.title: Device and method for preparing and testing liquid hydrogen and solid air
c14dfb41f4695692afa38b740ff1e923d61a4f8e.abstract: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen solid air preparation and test device and a method thereof, which can truly realize visualization and component measurement functions of a solid air preparation process under a liquid hydrogen medium immersion working condition, and strengthen the understanding degree of the liquid hydrogen solid air. The cold insulation container and the preparation container are arranged in the visual liquid hydrogen dewar from top to bottom, so that the heat insulation performance of the preparation container is greatly improved, and the influence of a conventional liquid hydrogen emptying method on the solid-air form is effectively avoided. Meanwhile, by adjusting the oxygen and nitrogen concentration in the simulation gas, solid air preparation and testing under various different initial conditions are achieved, and the device has the characteristic of functional diversification.

001608a1689d3ffa4f55ab5679056daac583e1b4.title: Integrated adjusting device and method for liquid hydrogen storage and supply system
001608a1689d3ffa4f55ab5679056daac583e1b4.abstract: The invention discloses an integrated adjusting device and method for a liquid hydrogen storage and supply system, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen energy. The sound velocity nozzle assembly which is simple in structure and easy to machine is adopted to replace existing large-size components such as an adjusting valve and a flow meter, the influence of factors such as a downstream power device and a pipeline is avoided, and coupling and unification of flow adjustment and parameter measurement of a hydrogen medium are achieved; the downstream pressure of the sonic nozzle is reduced to the maximum extent through the characteristic of secondary ortho-hydrogen conversion heat absorption, it is guaranteed that the corresponding sonic nozzle reaches the critical state, and the calculation precision of actual flow parameters is guaranteed; and by utilizing the characteristic that the hydrogen temperature is throttled and heated when being higher than the turning-back temperature and is throttled and cooled when being lower than the turning-back temperature, various coolant circulation modes are designed, and the energy utilization efficiency of the whole system is improved.

32788dc98919a2f3825df517ecea19ac55c823ec.title: Electrolytic bath flushing device
32788dc98919a2f3825df517ecea19ac55c823ec.abstract: The utility model belongs to the technical field of hydrogen production through alkaline water electrolysis, and discloses an electrolytic bath flushing device. According to the electrolytic bath flushing device, through cooperation of the circulating pump, the connecting pipeline and the valves, cleaning liquid is pumped out of the electrolytic bath from the alkali inlet in the bottom of the electrolytic bath and injected into the electrolytic bath again through the hydrogen medium outlet or the oxygen medium outlet to conduct forward cleaning on the electrolytic bath, or through cooperation of the liquid storage tank, the circulating pump, the connecting pipeline and the valves, the electrolytic bath is flushed. Cleaning liquid in the liquid storage box is injected from the alkali inlet in the bottom of the electrolytic bath and pumped out through the hydrogen medium outlet and the oxygen medium outlet in the electrolytic bath to conduct reverse cleaning on the electrolytic bath, the electrolytic bath can be subjected to forward flushing and back flushing through the electrolytic bath flushing device, welding slag, nickel slag, dust and other impurities in the electrolytic bath can be efficiently removed, and the electrolytic bath can be cleaned more efficiently. The service life of the electrolytic bath is effectively prolonged.

188ec747f11630493e7d3dcebb7c32e00caeacff.title: Fixed high-vacuum heat-insulation vertical liquid hydrogen storage tank
188ec747f11630493e7d3dcebb7c32e00caeacff.abstract: The utility model relates to a fixed high-vacuum heat-insulating vertical liquid hydrogen storage tank which can meet the low-temperature performance requirements (including vacuum performance and vacuum heat-insulating performance) of a liquid hydrogen medium, and is economical and practical in structure and simple to manufacture. The inner container is formed by welding a cylindrical barrel, an upper elliptical head and a lower elliptical head, the outer surface of the inner container is sequentially wound with multiple layers of heat insulation materials composed of aluminum foil and glass fibers, the structure of the outer container is similar to that of the inner container, and the inner container and the outer container are connected through three stainless steel lower hanging belts; the pipeline system is located at the bottom of the liquid hydrogen storage tank and communicates with the liquid hydrogen storage tank.

ad6dea8fcf871f0841b7eee5f5373356549ea5f4.title: Method and system for predicting fatigue characteristic of hydrogen storage bottle
ad6dea8fcf871f0841b7eee5f5373356549ea5f4.abstract: The invention discloses a hydrogen storage bottle fatigue characteristic prediction method and system. The prediction method comprises the following steps: carrying out a hydrogen charging and discharging thermodynamic test on the hydrogen storage cylinder under a hydrogen medium condition; establishing a hydrogen storage bottle thermodynamic model; testing thermal stress of the hydrogen storage cylinder; establishing a hydrogen storage cylinder thermal stress finite element simulation model; acquiring characteristics and failure behaviors of a fiber material, characteristics and failure behaviors of a matrix material, characteristics and failure behaviors of a fiber-matrix interface material and interlayer debonding characteristics of a composite material at different temperatures; establishing a composite material microscopic equivalent volume element finite element model; carrying out fatigue failure test on the laminated plate at different temperatures; establishing a fatigue characteristic finite element model of the multi-scale composite laminated plate under thermal-mechanical coupling; establishing a multi-scale multi-failure mode fatigue characteristic finite element model of the hydrogen storage cylinder under hydrogen thermal coupling; performing fatigue test on the hydrogen storage cylinder; and predicting the fatigue characteristic of the hydrogen storage cylinder. According to the method, the fatigue failure behavior of the hydrogen storage cylinder under the hydrogen-heat-force coupling condition can be accurately predicted.

2d04c0a5cd0518fe46cd13628abd38ee3a225616.title: Ball valve
2d04c0a5cd0518fe46cd13628abd38ee3a225616.abstract: The utility model discloses a ball valve which comprises a valve cover, a valve body, a cut-off structure and a blocking structure. Wherein a circulation channel is formed in the valve body; the cut-off structure is mounted in the valve body, and the cut-off structure is connected with the circulation channel so as to open or close the circulation channel; the blocking structure is formed between the valve body and the valve deck, and the blocking structure, the valve body and the valve deck jointly define an isolation cavity. The ball valve has the transportation state that the low-temperature medium is isolated in the circulation channel through the blocking structure. According to the structure, when a low-temperature medium exists in the circulation channel, the low-temperature medium is blocked in the circulation channel, so that the low-temperature medium cannot be close to the sealing piece, and the flange of the valve cover of the valve body is sealed to be far away from the low-temperature liquid hydrogen medium, so that the sealing piece cannot be located in an ultralow-temperature environment for a long time, deformation caused by the ultralow temperature cannot occur, and the service life of the sealing piece is prolonged. Therefore, the service life of the sealing piece is prolonged, and leakage is prevented.

d6577461517bccb3eac473cf9eac40e2900d9ffe.title: Liquid hydrogen storage and supply system with low evaporation rate
d6577461517bccb3eac473cf9eac40e2900d9ffe.abstract: The invention discloses a low-evaporation-rate liquid hydrogen storage and supply system which comprises a first power generation type hydrogen heat exchanger, a second power generation type hydrogen heat exchanger and a liquid hydrogen storage tank, and a hydrogen liquefaction unit and a liquid hydrogen pressurization unit are installed on the liquid hydrogen storage tank. Conventional waste high-quality hydrogen cooling capacity is used for thermoelectric power generation, the advantages of being free of noise, high in reliability, long in service life and the like are achieved, generated electric energy is used for reducing evaporation loss of liquid hydrogen, the storage time of a liquid hydrogen medium is greatly prolonged, and the overall economical efficiency of the system is improved. The novel power generation type hydrogen heat exchanger is designed, efficient integration of multiple processes such as secondary hydrogen conversion, cold and heat source heat exchange and thermoelectric power generation is achieved, the system structure is simplified, the remarkable light weight characteristic is achieved, and in addition, the cold and heat sources at the specific temperature can maintain the stable efficiency of thermoelectric power generation pieces. According to the operation characteristics of the hydrogen storage and supply system and the difference of thermoelectric power generation, multiple operation modes are designed, the electric energy utilization rate is comprehensively improved, and the overall evaporation rate of the system is reduced.

1f121cc4c52cb37f02226bcd2e5dd653133883b2.title: Underground gas storage well inspection method
1f121cc4c52cb37f02226bcd2e5dd653133883b2.abstract: The invention relates to the field of gas storage well detection, and discloses an underground gas storage well detection method which comprises the following steps: making a detection scheme; determining a degreasing cleaning scheme according to the object, and performing degreasing cleaning; performing external macroscopic inspection; performing underground television detection; shaft wall thickness corrosion detection; performance testing; degreasing and accepting; the main failure damage mode of the high-pressure oxygen/hydrogen medium underground gas storage well is confirmed by analyzing the structural form, the main body material, the medium characteristics, the operation condition and the like of the high-pressure oxygen/hydrogen medium underground gas storage well, and a targeted regular inspection scheme is designed for the possible damage mode and failure mode of the high-pressure oxygen/hydrogen medium underground gas storage well. According to the method, the inspection and detection means and the result evaluation method are defined, application verification is achieved in the high-pressure oxygen/hydrogen medium underground gas storage well, the safety condition of the gas storage well is effectively evaluated, and it is ensured that a user can use the gas storage well safely and trustingly according to the given use parameters.

8466c54ffa8e0da55af2f261392f50edd79aee88.title: Floating type display board and use method thereof
8466c54ffa8e0da55af2f261392f50edd79aee88.abstract: The invention discloses a floating type display board and a using method thereof, and belongs to the technical field of display devices.The floating type display board comprises a display board assembly, the display board assembly comprises a display board body, an air bag is arranged in the display board body, the air bag is filled with a hydrogen medium part, and a side board is further connected to the side wall of the display board body; power mechanisms for pulling the display board assembly to move up and down are arranged on the opposite surfaces of the two bottom columns, and pulling rope locking mechanisms are further arranged above the power mechanisms. According to the technical scheme, the floating display board body can be subjected to positioning and anti-shaking treatment through the two telescopic components symmetrically arranged on the floating display board body, the situation that the display board body shakes under the outdoor strong wind condition is avoided, and the display effect of the floating display board can be guaranteed; a connecting rope used for pulling the display board body can be effectively prevented from being wound, and it is guaranteed that the display board body is taken back normally.

64d02135a0f2a8161d8b7cb1725e320b11f83e8a.title: Liquid hydrogen low-temperature stop valve
64d02135a0f2a8161d8b7cb1725e320b11f83e8a.abstract: The liquid hydrogen low-temperature stop valve particularly relates to the field of stop valves and comprises a main body mechanism, the main body mechanism comprises a valve body, a first through groove is formed in the valve body, second through grooves communicating with the first through groove are formed in the two sides of the first through groove, and a valve element is inserted into the first through groove in an up-down sliding state; a valve rod is fixedly installed at the top of the valve element, the valve rod can be arranged in the first through groove in a reciprocating motion state in the axial direction of the valve rod, a valve body lengthening pipe is fixedly installed at the top of the valve body, and the outer wall of the valve rod is sleeved with the valve body lengthening pipe. The valve body extension pipe is arranged on the outer wall of the valve rod, and the guide heat insulation ring is arranged between the valve rod and the valve body extension pipe, so that heat convection of a liquid hydrogen medium in the valve is reduced, liquid hydrogen cold energy is prevented from being conducted to other sealing parts of the sealing corrugated pipe fitting, and the sealing performance and the service life of the valve are guaranteed; and the liquid hydrogen medium storage and transportation safety can be improved.

1142df11f4f1916ec9bb2a2b143aa35271732c7b.title: Rocket liquid hydrogen tank self-pressurization simulation and verification device
1142df11f4f1916ec9bb2a2b143aa35271732c7b.abstract: The invention provides a rocket liquid hydrogen tank self-pressurization simulation and verification device, and belongs to the technical field of rocket part testing. The temperature control pipeline is suitable for adjusting the temperature of liquid hydrogen in the simulated liquid hydrogen tank, and the temperature control pipeline comprises an effective section arranged in the simulated liquid hydrogen tank and an adjusting section arranged outside the simulated liquid hydrogen tank; a hydrogen medium flows in the temperature control pipeline; the first heat exchanger is filled with liquid nitrogen suitable for heat exchange with a pipeline of the adjusting section, and a temperature sensor assembly, a pressure sensor and a flow meter are arranged on the pipeline before the adjusting section enters the simulated liquid hydrogen tank; according to the rocket liquid hydrogen tank self-pressurization simulation and verification device, the vaporization amount in the simulated liquid hydrogen tank can be controlled by changing the temperature and the flow speed of the hydrogen medium in the temperature control pipeline, namely by only controlling the physical property of the hydrogen medium, the pressure of the simulated liquid hydrogen tank within a certain range is obtained, the structure is simple, and operation is convenient.

bf6a13ef431c0dc9fbd4aab07a6a29dea1771037.title: Device and method for preparing supercooled liquid argon
bf6a13ef431c0dc9fbd4aab07a6a29dea1771037.abstract: The invention discloses a device and method for preparing supercooled liquid argon, the device is a device for preparing the supercooled liquid argon, the supercooled low-temperature liquid argon can be prepared, the supercooling degree can be kept, and the device specifically comprises a hydrogen medium interlayer container and an air pressure control chamber. The hydrogen medium interlayer container is communicated with the air pressure control chamber through a capillary tube. Wherein a hydrogen temperature swing adsorption material (MOFs) and a semiconductor temperature control element are contained in the air pressure control chamber, the temperature of the MOFs can be adjusted through the semiconductor temperature control element, the hydrogen adsorption amount of the MOFs is changed, and the interlayer gas pressure intensity is changed, so that the cooling rate is controlled.

7753987c39ba54089dfc0828bfe008ee77001dc7.title: Long-life air valve for high-pressure hydrogen compressor
7753987c39ba54089dfc0828bfe008ee77001dc7.abstract: The invention discloses a long-life air valve for a high-pressure hydrogen compressor, and belongs to the technical field of compressors. Comprising an air inlet valve and an air outlet valve, and each of the air inlet valve and the air outlet valve comprises a guide valve cover, a valve plate, a valve seat and a spring; the guide valve cover comprises a valve cover shell and a non-metal valve cover lining arranged in the valve cover shell; the valve cover shell is made of a hydrogen embrittlement resistant material, and the hydrogen embrittlement resistant material is a 316 stainless steel material subjected to cold deformation strengthening; the valve cover lining is made of any non-metal material of a carbon fiber reinforced PEEK (Polyether Ether Ketone) material, a PTFE (Polytetrafluoroethylene) material and silver-dipped graphite; and the valve plate is made of a GH2132 alloy material. The valve element can be suitable for a hydrogen medium compressor with the high pressure ranging from 45 MPa to 90 MPa, and the valve element has high mechanical strength, high temperature resistance, long fatigue life and hydrogen embrittlement resistance; wear-resisting and self-lubricating properties are achieved, and abrasive particles are not prone to being generated to pollute media; and the situation that the valve plate is jammed or fails due to high temperature generated by friction is avoided.

4b753f0d1abe1ab3ad3ee92e3fdff095ef444d78.title: Two-stage hydrogen medium diaphragm compressor
4b753f0d1abe1ab3ad3ee92e3fdff095ef444d78.abstract: The utility model relates to a diaphragm compressor, in particular to a two-stage hydrogen medium diaphragm compressor, which is different from the prior art in that a first-stage diaphragm head and a second-stage diaphragm head respectively comprise an upper diaphragm head, a lower diaphragm head and a diaphragm positioned between the upper diaphragm head and the lower diaphragm head, the inner surface of the upper diaphragm head is not an arched cambered surface but a plane and is fixedly connected with an air disc, and the outer end of the air disc is also a plane; an arched cambered surface is arranged on the inner surface of the gas disc; the inner surface of the lower film head is provided with an arched cambered surface, and the middle of the lower film head is provided with a circular sinking groove in which an oil distribution disc is fixedly connected; a plurality of upper axial through holes are evenly formed in the circumferential edge close to the upper membrane head, a plurality of lower axial screw holes are formed in the corresponding positions of the lower membrane head, and a plurality of fastening screws penetrate through the upper axial through holes to be in threaded connection with the lower axial screw holes to fixedly connect the upper membrane head, the membrane, the air disc and the lower membrane head together. Compared with the prior art, the utility model breaks through the tradition, so that the diameter of the plunger can be larger than that of the mounting convex ring of the crosshead, and the design and mounting requirements of the high-flow membrane head oil cylinder are met.

616625700a3b7f8fa4f1786f6a5539987b147243.title: Steam shell-and-tube heat exchanger combination device for heating hydrogen medium
616625700a3b7f8fa4f1786f6a5539987b147243.abstract: The utility model provides a steam shell-and-tube heat exchanger combination device for heating a hydrogen medium, which is characterized in that one side of a heat exchanger is connected with a hydrogen inlet pipeline connected with a pneumatic ball valve, and the upper end of the heat exchanger is connected with a hydrogen inlet pipeline connected with an electric gate valve A; the other side of the heat exchanger is connected with a hydrogen outlet pipeline connected with a hydrogen temperature switch and a hydrogen temperature transmitter, a liquid level transmitter is installed on a shell of the heat exchanger, and the lower end of the heat exchanger is sequentially connected with an electric gate valve B, a pneumatic control valve, a drain valve and a return water temperature transmitter through a pipeline. And the upper end of the heat exchanger is also connected with a leak detection device, gas detection equipment and a bleeder of an exhaust valve. And the accuracy and safety of leak detection are improved.

300d5891416a16e5ec71649aac8925430274b438.title: Neutron diffraction testing device and method for hydrogen storage material in liquid hydrogen environment
300d5891416a16e5ec71649aac8925430274b438.abstract: The invention relates to a neutron diffraction testing device and method for a hydrogen storage material in a liquid hydrogen environment, in particular to the technical field of hydrogen storage material testing, and the neutron diffraction testing device comprises a neutron diffraction testing unit and a liquid hydrogen environment providing unit arranged between radial collimators of the neutron diffraction testing unit; the liquid hydrogen environment providing unit comprises a hydrogen end, a liquid helium end, a liquid hydrogen environment end and a gas recovery end; the hydrogen end is connected with the liquid hydrogen environment end through the heat exchanger; the liquid helium end is connected with a cold medium channel of the heat exchanger; and a hydrogen outlet of the liquid hydrogen environment end is connected with the gas recovery end. According to the neutron diffraction testing device for the hydrogen storage material in the liquid hydrogen environment, provided by the invention, the liquid hydrogen environment unit is introduced into the testing device, so that neutron diffraction testing of the hydrogen storage material in the dynamic hydrogen absorption/desorption or service process in the liquid hydrogen environment is realized, and crystal structure evolution information and related information such as material stress and strain are obtained; therefore, the performance characterization accuracy of the hydrogen storage material is improved.

017cfac42200d61bfdc246ce528b3dcd7861cebd.title: Reduction-state catalyst suitable for preparing aniline through nitrobenzene gas-phase hydrogenation as well as preparation and application of reduction-state catalyst
017cfac42200d61bfdc246ce528b3dcd7861cebd.abstract: The invention discloses a reduction-state catalyst suitable for preparing aniline through nitrobenzene gas-phase hydrogenation as well as a preparation method and application of the reduction-state catalyst, and belongs to the technical field of catalysts. The catalyst is used in a reaction for preparing aniline through nitrobenzene gas phase hydrogenation, the induction period is shorter than 3 h, the total amount of by-products in the induction period is lower than 120 ppm, and during stable operation in the induction period, phenol in an aniline product is lower than 40 ppm, and cyclohexanol in the aniline product is lower than 15 ppm; in the reduction process of the catalyst, the catalyst can tolerate rapid reduction of high-concentration hydrogen or pure hydrogen, does not influence the activity and selectivity of an induction period, has the condition that the catalyst is supplemented into a fluidized bed device in production in an oxidation state to be rapidly reduced and put into use in a high-concentration hydrogen environment in the bed, and does not influence the quality of an aniline product.

1cd610821c7c00b3c0a4ecbf82a662e2c4f0069a.title: Method for preparing p-aminobenzoic acid through chlorination, hydrolysis and hydrogenation of p-nitrotoluene
1cd610821c7c00b3c0a4ecbf82a662e2c4f0069a.abstract: The invention provides a method for preparing p-aminobenzoic acid through chlorination, hydrolysis and hydrogenation of p-nitrotoluene, and belongs to the technical field of organic compound preparation. Comprising the following steps: melting p-nitrotoluene, and performing chlorination reaction under the catalysis of azodiisobutyronitrile to generate a chlorinated product containing p-nitrobenzyl chloride; mixing the chlorination product with liquid caustic soda and sodium hypochlorite for hydrolysis reaction, separating liquid after reaction, and acidifying an upper-layer water phase to obtain p-nitrobenzoic acid; the method comprises the following steps: mixing p-nitrobenzoic acid with methanol and a Pd/C catalyst, carrying out hydrogenation reaction in a hydrogen environment, and filtering, distilling, cooling, centrifuging and drying after the reaction to obtain p-aminobenzoic acid. The method is simple in process route, mild in reaction condition, high in product purity, high in yield and suitable for industrial production, raw materials are easy to obtain, hydrogen chloride gas generated in the chlorination reaction and p-nitrotoluene obtained after the hydrolysis reaction are recycled, cyclic utilization of resources is achieved, and the production cost is reduced.

c508262b1161114dfe1f42bef6ea99747c7beb05.title: Integrated equipment for testing hydrogen permeation and pressure regulating performance of full-size pressure regulator
c508262b1161114dfe1f42bef6ea99747c7beb05.abstract: The invention discloses a full-size pressure regulator hydrogen permeation and pressure regulating performance testing integrated device which comprises hydrogen/hydrogen-doped natural gas, a gas source, a valve set, a tee joint, a pressure gauge set, a pipeline, a sealing clamp, a pressure regulator, a gas chromatograph and a vacuum pump. The gas source is connected with the clamp through a pipeline, a sealing area is formed through the sealing clamp and the pipe sleeve, the permeability coefficients of pure hydrogen and hydrogen-doped natural gas in the pressure regulator can be tested by combining a gas chromatograph, a vacuum pump and the like, and meanwhile the pressure regulating performance of the pressure regulator in the hydrogen environment is researched. The hydrogen permeability coefficient of the hydrogen-doped natural gas in the pressure regulator can be measured through gas chromatography; the device can work for a long time, the pressure regulating performance of the pressure regulator in the hydrogen environment can be researched, and the hydrogen permeability of the full-size pressure regulator can be tested while the pressure regulating performance of the pressure regulator can be tested in the hydrogen environment.

f72a3b744e0de8d20807c9e55b6cc9a8b3b22ef7.title: Hydrogen environment metal material constant load testing device and CTOD-based testing method
f72a3b744e0de8d20807c9e55b6cc9a8b3b22ef7.abstract: The invention discloses a hydrogen environment metal material constant load testing device and a CTOD-based testing method.The high-pressure gas storage bin in the device is connected with an upper bin cover and a lower bin cover in a sealed mode, the upper bin cover is provided with a gas inlet pipeline, the lower bin cover is provided with a gas outlet pipeline, the high-pressure gas storage bin is filled with hydrogen, the upper bin cover is provided with an upper loading rod, and the upper loading rod is provided with a lower loading rod; the upper end of the upper loading rod is connected with a mechanical testing machine loading head, the lower end of the loading rod extends into the high-pressure gas storage bin, a load sensor is installed on the upper loading rod in the high-pressure gas storage bin, a lower loading rod is arranged on the lower bin cover, the upper end of the lower loading rod extends into the high-pressure gas storage bin, and the lower end of the lower loading rod is connected with a mechanical testing machine base. A constant-load sample is connected between the upper loading rod and the lower loading rod, an extensometer is mounted on the constant-load sample, and a temperature sensor and a pressure sensor are mounted in the high-pressure gas storage bin. The device can effectively provide a high-pressure hydrogen test environment, the method is not limited by the wall thickness of the pipe, and the fracture toughness value of the sample in the hydrogen environment is obtained.

836bd2959310f8070eece5113c4d4a2406078c61.title: Method for testing hydrogen induced cracking of material in high-pressure hydrogen environment
836bd2959310f8070eece5113c4d4a2406078c61.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of material testing, and discloses a method for testing hydrogen induced cracking of a material in a high-pressure hydrogen environment, which comprises the following steps: firstly, preparing an extended compact tensile sample based on size data of a standard wedge-shaped opening loading sample and a standard compact tensile sample; then carrying out fatigue crack prefabrication on the extended compact tensile sample through a fatigue testing machine, and carrying out shape conversion to obtain a standard wedge-shaped opening loading sample with fatigue cracks, and taking the standard wedge-shaped opening loading sample as a target wedge-shaped opening loading sample; applying a load to the tail end of the fatigue crack on the target wedge-shaped opening loading sample, and placing the target wedge-shaped opening loading sample in a high-pressure hydrogen environment to determine the length of the current hydrogen-induced crack; and finally, determining a stress intensity factor threshold value of the to-be-tested material according to the initial applied stress intensity factor, the current hydrogen-induced crack length and the standard value of the hydrogen-induced crack length. According to the method, not only can a more accurate hydrogen-induced delayed cracking stress intensity factor threshold value be obtained, but also the test cost can be effectively reduced.

879c14d4c9d444f0665c9f901d4bd943f212fb43.title: Mode-adjustable fracture phase field simulation method considering hydrogen concentration driving mechanism
879c14d4c9d444f0665c9f901d4bd943f212fb43.abstract: The invention relates to the field of hydrogen induced fracture, and particularly discloses a mode-adjustable fracture phase field simulation method considering a hydrogen concentration driving mechanism, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining material parameters of a test piece; obtaining constitutive equations of stress, phase field and chemical potential through a non-equilibrium state energy dissipation equation; obtaining evolution equations and boundary conditions of the mechanical field, the phase field and the chemical field; establishing a hydrogen-assisted fracture phase field model; establishing a hydrogen embrittlement fracture phase field model with an adjustable mode; obtaining the change relation of the initial deflection angle of the crack along with the weight coefficient; and obtaining results of stress distribution, phase field variables, crack initiation and expansion evolution. Effective regulation and control of the initial deflection angle of the mixed type crack in the hydrogen environment are achieved, comparison verification is conducted on the initial deflection angle and test data, meanwhile, relative contribution of ball quantity and deviator crack driving energy is considered, accurate evaluation of the initiation and expansion path of the mixed type crack is achieved, and the method is suitable for popularization and application. Therefore, an effective method is provided for accurate prediction and mechanism explanation of complex hydrogen embrittlement fracture behaviors.

6e4f1413182d75345a1848f65bbb099c95f211b8.title: Submarine pipeline steel hydrogen-induced fatigue crack propagation prediction method based on hydrogen-induced dislocation pinning-unpinning mechanism
6e4f1413182d75345a1848f65bbb099c95f211b8.abstract: The invention discloses a subsea pipeline steel hydrogen-induced fatigue crack propagation prediction method based on a hydrogen-induced dislocation pinning-unpinning mechanism, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a four-stage nonlinear constitutive model of a pipeline steel material in a given hydrogen environment; the four-stage nonlinear constitutive model comprises constitutive relation equations of different stages, which are respectively constructed in four stages of pinning hardening, platform, nail removal and post-nail-removal hardening based on elastic-plastic mechanical behaviors of the pipeline steel material; and endowing the pipeline steel material in the constructed finite element model with the four-stage nonlinear constitutive model, and carrying out pipeline steel hydrogen-induced fatigue crack propagation prediction. According to the method, the staged nonlinear elastic-plastic constitutive model is constructed on the basis of the mechanical property change of the pipeline steel in the hydrogen environment due to hydrogen-induced dislocation pinning and nail disengaging, and the model is used for predicting the hydrogen-induced fatigue crack propagation of the subsea pipeline steel, so that the prediction precision of the crack propagation behavior of the material in the hydrogen environment is remarkably improved.

ff3d9f27a0bae34136b8bddef932a6f7256ec5ae.title: Alpine region hydrogen-containing comprehensive energy system using vortex tube
ff3d9f27a0bae34136b8bddef932a6f7256ec5ae.abstract: The invention discloses an alpine region hydrogen-containing comprehensive energy system applying a vortex tube and a dispatching method. The system comprises an electrolytic bath, a compressor, a hydrogen storage tank, the vortex tube, a hot end heat exchanger, a heat storage tank, a cold end heat exchanger, a cold storage tank, a hydrogen fuel cell and a demand side. And the demand side comprises an alpine region oxygen environment, an alpine region hydrogen environment and hydrogen-doped natural gas users. According to the comprehensive energy system, oxygen prepared in an electrolytic cell is directly fed into an oxygen demand side, hydrogen enters a vortex tube through pressurization storage, energy separation is carried out in the vortex tube, cold and hot hydrogen flow division is achieved, different hydrogen flows of the vortex tube can be adjusted and changed, efficient distribution of hydrogen energy is achieved, and the overall economical efficiency is improved. According to the comprehensive energy system, the energy utilization efficiency and flexibility can be greatly improved, the special geographical environment requirements of the alpine region are met, and the energy self-sufficiency and emergency guarantee capacity is enhanced.

240f9e55b126e9dbd6e3b5b7be57e104a85ee4ee.title: Test method for balancing pressure and reducing friction in high-pressure hydrogen environment box
240f9e55b126e9dbd6e3b5b7be57e104a85ee4ee.abstract: The invention discloses a high-pressure hydrogen environment box and a test method for balancing pressure and reducing friction. The environment box comprises a test box body and a gas chamber, a sealing cavity is formed in the test box body; the air chamber is arranged on the test box body in a penetrating mode to form an upper air chamber and a lower air chamber, the upper air chamber and the lower air chamber are communicated with the internal sealing cavity, an upper piston rod is fixedly installed in the upper air chamber, and a lower piston rod is arranged in the lower air chamber in a sliding mode. The upper piston rod and the lower piston rod are respectively sealed with the upper air chamber and the lower air chamber through sealing structures, and the upper piston rod and the lower piston rod are used for mounting a test piece and an extensometer; the invention aims to solve the problems that when a high-pressure hydrogen environment fatigue device in the prior art carries out a fatigue test, an environment box and a piston rod are sealed only by using a sealing ring, so that air leakage is easily caused, and if multiple sealing rings are used, internal and external pressure difference is caused, so that friction force is increased, and test data are influenced.

f908082b7c89912ca6e47fd1eea784719a5680cf.title: Sintering method for alternately strengthening oxygen reduction in vacuum and hydrogen environments
f908082b7c89912ca6e47fd1eea784719a5680cf.abstract: The invention relates to a sintering method for alternately strengthening oxygen reduction in a vacuum and hydrogen environment, which comprises the following steps: uniformly doping organic carbon into a metal powder raw material, utilizing the characteristics of high-temperature volatilization and decomposition of the organic carbon, heating the organic carbon to volatilize or decompose the organic carbon into CO, CO2, H2O and other gases in a presintering stage, and forming through open pores in a metal blank after overflowing. The pore structure provides a channel penetrating into the green body for hydrogen, so that the hydrogen can be directly subjected to reduction reaction with metal oxide in the green body, and the problem that the oxide in the green body is difficult to fully reduce due to limited mass transfer in the traditional process is effectively solved. In the reduction process, vacuum hydrogen circulation deoxidation can be carried out for multiple times according to the requirement of a sintered product on oxygen element; in the high-temperature sintering process, a vacuum dehydrogenation method can be carried out according to the requirement of the sintered product on the hydrogen element, the oxygen and hydrogen element content of the final product is reduced, and the comprehensive performance of the sintered product is improved.

53f48f5cba12d61a265f785d4ccbb96ae7d71b0c.title: Synthesis method of 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol
53f48f5cba12d61a265f785d4ccbb96ae7d71b0c.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of organic synthesis, and particularly discloses a synthetic method of 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol. The invention relates to a synthetic method of 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol. The synthetic method comprises the following steps: protecting phenolic hydroxyl in 3-bromo-2-methylphenol by using a protecting group to prepare the 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol, mixing the intermediate B, a palladium catalyst, isopropenyl boric acid pinacoline ester, a second base catalyst and a polar solvent, and performing Suzuki reaction in a nitrogen environment to obtain an intermediate C; and mixing the intermediate C, palladium on carbon and a protonic solvent, and carrying out hydrogenation reaction in a hydrogen environment to obtain a target product D. The synthesis method disclosed by the invention is high in product yield, mature in process, environment-friendly, safe and suitable for large-scale production, and the application range of the 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol can be effectively expanded.

1ac6f16dd174a3aab664e4632df61a51e10b2996.title: Device for testing compatibility of metal material and hydrogen environment
1ac6f16dd174a3aab664e4632df61a51e10b2996.abstract: The utility model relates to the technical field of metal mechanical property detection testing equipment, in particular to a metal material and hydrogen environment compatibility testing device which comprises an upper clamp, a vacuum pump and a first gas storage bottle, the first gas storage bottle is used for storing high-pressure gas of types required by testing, one end of the upper clamp is detachably connected with a sample, and the other end of the upper clamp is detachably connected with a second gas storage bottle. The upper clamp is used for blocking a central channel of a sample and forming a first cavity body, the vacuum pump and the first gas storage bottle are respectively communicated with the first cavity body, and during use, the upper clamp can be detached from one end of the sample, and the sealed first cavity body is formed between the upper clamp and the central channel of the sample; the second cavity cools the sample to a required temperature, or the sample is heated to the required temperature through the induction heating coil, so that the temperature control during the test of the sample is realized, the test requirement is met, the test accuracy is improved, the test cost is reduced, and the test safety is guaranteed.

3e4768137a9aed3d8c0979414cc1da2bf87be4b4.title: High-nitrogen austenitic stainless steel for ultralow-temperature environment and preparation method thereof
3e4768137a9aed3d8c0979414cc1da2bf87be4b4.abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of metal materials, and discloses high-nitrogen austenitic stainless steel for an ultralow-temperature environment and a preparation method thereof. The steel comprises the following components in percentage by weight: 0.01% of C # imgabs0 #, 0.1%-0.3% of Si, 1.5%-2.0% of Mn, 16.5%-18.5% of Cr, 12.5%-14.5% of Ni, 2.0%-3.0% of Mo, 0.30%-0.40% of N and the balance of Fe and inevitable impurity elements. The preparation method comprises the steps of high-pressure nitrogen injection, electric arc furnace crude smelting, vacuum induction furnace refining, temperature control cooling, rolling and heat treatment, aluminum powder is added in stages in the crude smelting process to inhibit nitride generation, and the nitrogen dissolution index NS is proposed to be used for representing the effective dissolution behavior of nitrogen. The yield strength of the obtained material at room temperature is greater than 430 MPa, the tensile strength is greater than 740 MPa, the impact energy is greater than 420 J, and the impact energy in a liquid hydrogen environment is greater than 260 J.

f4f43911e2bdb643d06bc7b3c0e33c675fdde4ff.title: Test structure for hydrogen permeation test in high-pressure gas-phase hydrogen environment as well as mounting method and application of test structure
f4f43911e2bdb643d06bc7b3c0e33c675fdde4ff.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of hydrogen energy conveying and material performance testing, in particular to a testing structure for hydrogen permeation testing in a high-pressure gas-phase hydrogen environment and an installation method and application of the testing structure. The testing structure comprises a sample body and an insulation sealing assembly, and the sample body is of a double-step disc structure; the uppermost edge of the first sealing insulation assembly is flush with the upper end face of the cylindrical platform, the sample body is installed on the inner side of the first sealing insulation assembly in a matched mode, the second sealing insulation assembly is in a shape with an upward opening, and the first sealing insulation assembly is installed in the second sealing insulation assembly in a matched mode. The test surface of the sample body of the test structure and the gas main flow keep a consistent flow velocity field, and when the test structure is used for testing, the permeation behavior of the hydrogen flow on the material surface can be truly reflected; all the clamping and conducting structures are arranged outside the pipe wall of the test pipeline or at the left part of the sample body, so that flow field disturbance is prevented from being introduced into a main airflow path.

b17e11b2644fa3a2be9c1395c674b97612891f14.title: Experiment table for testing high-temperature and high-pressure hydrogen environment
b17e11b2644fa3a2be9c1395c674b97612891f14.abstract: The utility model relates to the technical field of experiment machines, in particular to a high-temperature and high-pressure hydrogen environment test experiment table, which not only collects hydrogen after an experiment is completed, facilitates subsequent continuous utilization and improves the utilization rate of the hydrogen, but also performs multiple protection measures on the device, avoids hydrogen leakage and improves the safety of the device. Comprising an experiment table; the device further comprises a protection mechanism, a sealing mechanism, an experiment mechanism, an inflation mechanism and a gas storage mechanism, the protection mechanism is installed on the experiment table and avoids explosion caused by hydrogen leakage, the sealing mechanism is installed on the experiment table and avoids hydrogen leakage, and the experiment mechanism is installed on the experiment table and conducts a clamping test on a workpiece. The inflation mechanism is installed on the experiment table and heats and conveys hydrogen into the experiment table, and the gas storage mechanism is installed on the inflation mechanism and pumps out and stores the hydrogen after an experiment is completed.

950568f50b081ad3493386578d9399b2258bb925.title: Hydrogen pipeline leakage rate detection method, valve and system
950568f50b081ad3493386578d9399b2258bb925.abstract: According to the hydrogen pipeline leakage rate detection method, the valve and the system, the hydrogen pipeline is detected by using a program, a hydrogen leakage point can be quickly positioned, the manual detection time is shortened, meanwhile, an operator can be prevented from being located in a hydrogen environment for a long time, the potential safety hazard is reduced, and the detection efficiency is improved. If a plurality of elbows, tee joints, joints and other connecting pieces are arranged in the pipeline of the detection system, the gas flowability is poor, and the time can be properly increased; if the pipeline of the detection system is basically a straight pipe, the time can be properly shortened, the flexibility of the system can be effectively improved, and personalized setting is carried out according to system application scenes so as to improve the detection efficiency.

3be5d4bebe8db0495d5aeb7379321d62d2715caf.title: Hydrogen-corrosion-resistant steel plate for pipeline and production method thereof
3be5d4bebe8db0495d5aeb7379321d62d2715caf.abstract: The invention discloses a hydrogen-corrosion-resistant steel plate for a pipeline and a production method of the hydrogen-corrosion-resistant steel plate. The steel plate meets at least one of the following conditions: in a NACE TM0284 standard A solution environment, CLR is less than or equal to 10%, CTR is less than or equal to 3%, and CSR is less than or equal to 1%; in a NACE TM0177 standard stress corrosion test, the loading stress is 0.8 sigma s, and the surface of a tensile sample has no crack; in a 6.3 MPa pure hydrogen environment, the tensile strength, the ductility and the percentage reduction of area of the smooth sample are not lower than 90%, 85% and 80% in a nitrogen environment respectively; in a 6.3 MPa pure hydrogen environment, K1C of the step type compact tensile sample is greater than or equal to 110 MPa.m < 1/2 >. The production method comprises the steps of continuous casting, hot rolling and temperature control water cooling. And the initial cooling temperature of temperature control water cooling is Ar3-70 DEG C to Ar3-50 DEG C, and the final cooling temperature is Min (TVC, TVN)-50 DEG C to Min (TVC, TVN)-30 DEG C.

29ef153e437fa3c18a0f52b517154ff161e136af.title: Construction method and application of heat-resistant yeast for synthesizing mannitol
29ef153e437fa3c18a0f52b517154ff161e136af.abstract: The invention relates to heat-resistant yeast for synthesizing mannitol as well as a construction method and application of the heat-resistant yeast. According to the invention, firstly, Kluyveromyces marxianus is used as a chassis to screen five kinds of mannitol synthesis related genes from different sources, wherein the mannitol yield of the strain is the highest when CmMDH is over-expressed. And then, promoting the expression of the NADPH synthetic gene by increasing the copy number of the CmMDH and overexpression, so as to obtain the strain Y2CmMDH-KmUTR1 with higher yield. The production of the mannitol is further promoted by subsequently improving the oxygen introduction and pH (Potential of Hydrogen) environment. According to the invention, the yeast strain for efficiently producing the mannitol at 42 DEG C is constructed for the first time, and the mannitol is produced by using the molasses and the jerusalem artichoke without adding extra enzymes. The method has important significance for realizing industrial production of mannitol and recycling of agricultural wastes through a microbial synthesis method.

93302afe2595e73ea89fecbbe51a902eb100dd8e.title: Steel for 450MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and production method thereof
93302afe2595e73ea89fecbbe51a902eb100dd8e.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of pipeline steel production, in particular to 450MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline steel and a production method thereof. The steel comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.051%-0.059% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.70%-0.80% of Mn, 0.016%-0.026% of Nb, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.20%-0.30% of Ni, 0.12%-0.18% of Mo, less than or equal to 0.012% of P, less than or equal to 0.0015% of S, less than or equal to 0.0040% of N and the balance of Fe and impurities. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Mo is added to improve the volume fraction of a precipitated phase, Ni is added to promote dislocation slippage, and the finished steel plate is good in various properties in a hydrogen environment.

661d4a80aba74c57fe679ffe7b59f5a2a2b35d1c.title: Steel for 320MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and production method thereof
661d4a80aba74c57fe679ffe7b59f5a2a2b35d1c.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of production of steel for pipelines, in particular to steel for 320MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipelines and a production method of the steel. The steel plate comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.041%-0.049% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.58%-0.67% of Mn, 0.005%-0.010% of Nb, 0.05%-0.08% of V, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.20%-0.30% of Ni, 0.20%-0.30% of Cu, and the balance of Fe and inevitable impurities, p is less than or equal to 0.012%, S is less than or equal to 0.0015%, and N is less than or equal to 0.0040%. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb, V and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Cu is added to form a passive film, Ni is added to promote dislocation slippage, and the finished steel plate is good in various properties in a hydrogen environment.

905b5a7f79fed987d5883d6813abcb192cfa7e93.title: Steel for 245MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and production method thereof
905b5a7f79fed987d5883d6813abcb192cfa7e93.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of production of steel for pipelines, in particular to steel for 245MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipelines and a production method of the steel. The steel plate comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.041%-0.049% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.58%-0.67% of Mn, 0.005%-0.010% of Nb, 0.05%-0.08% of V, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.12%-0.19% of Cr, 0.10%-0.20% of Cu, less than or equal to 0.012% of P, less than or equal to 0.0015% of S, less than or equal to 0.0040% of N and the balance of Fe and impurities. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb, V and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Cu is added to form a passive film, the structure uniformity in the thickness direction is improved by adding Cr, and the finished steel plate is good in various properties in a hydrogen environment.
