8b2bba8a9dd4033dd8980e05613753ecc5b5e3cf.title: HYDROGEN SHIELDING FILM
8b2bba8a9dd4033dd8980e05613753ecc5b5e3cf.abstract: To provide a hydrogen shielding film that can suppress hydrogen embrittlement of a structural material for a long term under a hydrogen environment.SOLUTION: A hydrogen shielding film is constituted of a multilayer film laminated on an outside surface of a structural material comprising a metal and/or an alloy which are susceptible to hydrogen embrittlement. The number of layers constituting the multilayer film is at least two. The number of layers constituting the multilayer film laminated in part of the region of the outside surface of the structural material is different from the number of layers constituting the multilayer film laminated in the other regions of the outside surface of the structural material. In a hydrogen-resistant structural material, the whole outside surface of the structural material is coated on the hydrogen shielding film.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

f19b82c84768ab2245d3362177d6a3bcb504a845.title: Steel for 415MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and production method thereof
f19b82c84768ab2245d3362177d6a3bcb504a845.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of production of steel for pipelines, in particular to steel for a 415 MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and a production method of the steel. The steel plate comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.051%-0.059% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.70%-0.80% of Mn, 0.016%-0.026% of Nb, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.20%-0.30% of Cu, 0.12%-0.18% of Mo, less than or equal to 0.012% of P, less than or equal to 0.0015% of S, less than or equal to 0.0040% of N and the balance of Fe and impurities. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Mo is added to improve the volume fraction of a precipitated phase, Cu is added to form a passive film to prevent hydrogen permeation, and the finished steel plate is good in performance in a hydrogen environment.

f45afd8f55b6da4c1ad0721cda3a1e91c4365708.title: Steel for 290MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and production method thereof
f45afd8f55b6da4c1ad0721cda3a1e91c4365708.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of production of steel for pipelines, in particular to steel for a 290MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and a production method of the steel. The steel plate comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.041%-0.049% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.58%-0.67% of Mn, 0.005%-0.010% of Nb, 0.05%-0.08% of V, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.20%-0.30% of Ni, 0.04%-0.08% of Cr, less than or equal to 0.012% of P, less than or equal to 0.0015% of S, less than or equal to 0.0040% of N and the balance of Fe and impurities. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb, V and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Cr is added to improve the structure uniformity in the thickness direction, Ni is added to promote dislocation slippage, and the finished steel plate is good in various properties in a hydrogen environment.

373ad3dedcced2cd136a41aa8da669c4d3dd7fec.title: Steel for 360MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and production method thereof
373ad3dedcced2cd136a41aa8da669c4d3dd7fec.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of production of steel for pipelines, in particular to steel for 360MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipelines and a production method of the steel. The steel plate comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.051%-0.059% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.70%-0.80% of Mn, 0.016%-0.026% of Nb, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.10%-0.16% of Cr, 0.12%-0.18% of Mo, less than or equal to 0.012% of P, less than or equal to 0.0015% of S, less than or equal to 0.0040% of N and the balance of Fe and impurities. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Mo is added to improve the volume fraction of a precipitated phase, Cr is added to improve the structure uniformity in the thickness direction, and the finished steel plate is good in performance in a hydrogen environment.

079b994080c20929c528c8b3d95f21dfe8808565.title: ACIER MARTENSITIQUE POUR ENVIRONNEMENT D'HYDROGÈNE À HAUTE PRESSION
079b994080c20929c528c8b3d95f21dfe8808565.abstract: Provided is a martensitic steel capable of exhibiting very high strength even under a high-pressure hydrogen environment.　The martensitic steel for a high-pressure hydrogen environment has a component composition comprising, in mass%, C: 0.25 to 0.75%, Si: 0.1 to 1.5%, Mn: 0.1 to 1.5%, P: 0.04% or less, S: 0.01% or less, Ni: 0.5% or less, Cr: 9.0 to 15.0%, one or both of Mo and W according to the relational expression (Mo+1/2W): 3.0% or less, Cu: 0.5% or less, Nb: 0.3% or less, N: 0.10% or less, with the balance being Fe and inevitable impurities, wherein, when a low strain rate tensile test using a hollow test piece is conducted in high-pressure hydrogen of 10 MPaG or more, the tensile strength is 1800 MPa or higher, the carbide area ratio in a cross-sectional structure is 0.1 to 10.0%, and the average circle equivalent diameter of the carbide is 0.10 to 1.0 μm.

15b2b731c64604ee1371b2b882bf79cb62c92770.title: Preparation method of TiO2 in mixed crystal form, TiO2 loaded with elemental palladium as well as preparation method and application of TiO2
15b2b731c64604ee1371b2b882bf79cb62c92770.abstract: The invention provides a preparation method of TiO2 in a mixed crystal form, TiO2 loaded with elemental palladium as well as a preparation method and application of the TiO2, and belongs to the field of hydrogen sensing. The invention provides a preparation method of TiO2 in a mixed crystal form, which comprises the following steps: carrying out annealing treatment on TiO2 in a single crystal form to obtain TiO2 in the mixed crystal form; the annealing treatment is carried out in an atmosphere containing CO. The crystal form and the surface property of the TiO2 can be changed in the process of annealing the single crystal form TiO2 in the CO-containing atmosphere to form the mixed crystal form TiO2, so that the hydrogen adsorption capacity and the response speed of the TiO2 are improved. Furthermore, by loading Pd, the sensitivity and high selectivity of the catalyst to hydrogen can be further enhanced, and meanwhile, the catalyst also has relatively high detection performance in a low-concentration hydrogen environment and at a low working temperature.

a58bc695e43962113b11185302efb0c9c312250f.title: Hydrogen environment sealing structure leakage characteristic test system
a58bc695e43962113b11185302efb0c9c312250f.abstract: The invention discloses a hydrogen environment sealing structure leakage characteristic test system, and relates to the technical field of gas leakage monitoring, the hydrogen environment sealing structure leakage characteristic test system comprises a gas supply assembly, a leakage assembly, a sealing structure, a multi-parameter measurement assembly and a hydrogen leakage rate measurement assembly, the gas supply assembly comprises a hydrogen storage container and a gas filling pipeline, the hydrogen storage container is used for storing hydrogen, and the gas filling pipeline is used for filling gas; a gas outlet of the hydrogen storage container is communicated with a first end of the gas filling pipeline, the leakage assembly comprises a leakage joint, the leakage joint is communicated with a second end of the gas filling pipeline, and the leakage joint is used for leaking hydrogen into the sealing structure; the multi-parameter measuring assembly comprises multiple different types of measuring devices and is used for measuring different parameters of leaked hydrogen in the sealing structure, and the hydrogen leakage rate measuring assembly is connected with the sealing structure and is used for measuring the hydrogen leakage rate. According to the invention, online real-time monitoring of hydrogen leakage can be realized, and effective data support is provided for improving the accuracy of leakage monitoring.

d9f7630e6e890f018bd3bf076c1cadc2fe221308.title: High-strength boron carbide composite material and preparation method thereof
d9f7630e6e890f018bd3bf076c1cadc2fe221308.abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of composite materials, and particularly relates to a high-strength boron carbide composite material and a preparation method thereof.The preparation method comprises the following steps that S1, modification of titanium boride whiskers is conducted, specifically, the titanium boride whiskers, silicon powder and a grinding aid are put into a ball milling tank, ball milling, cleaning and drying are conducted, and the modified titanium boride whiskers are obtained; s2, preparation of composite material powder: mixing phenolic resin, boron carbide powder and deionized water, performing primary ball milling, then adding the modified titanium boride whisker, performing secondary ball milling, drying, and performing tertiary ball milling to obtain the composite material powder; and S3, sintering of the composite material: pressing the powder into blocks, drying moisture, pyrolyzing in a hydrogen environment, then coating with silicon powder, and sintering in vacuum. Titanium boride whiskers are adopted as a toughening and reinforcing component to reinforce and toughen the boron carbide composite material, and a liquid phase siliconizing sintering method is adopted to immerse the silicon element into the composite material system, so that the composite material is obtained. And silicon carbide can be generated in situ in the composite material, so that composite toughening of titanium boride and silicon carbide is realized.

818231a067d428df8873170f446ae8383a173e88.title: Low-temperature high-pressure hydrogen environment mechanical test bed
818231a067d428df8873170f446ae8383a173e88.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of test devices, and provides a low-temperature high-pressure hydrogen environment mechanical test bench, which comprises a hydrogen environment device, a refrigeration device and a test device, and is characterized in that the hydrogen environment device comprises a hydrogen environment box and a hydrogen supply mechanism, and the hydrogen supply mechanism supplies hydrogen to the hydrogen environment box; the refrigerating device refrigerates the hydrogen environment box; the testing device comprises a testing clamp, a transmission rod and a driving mechanism, the transmission rod is arranged in the hydrogen environment box in a reciprocating sliding mode, the first end of the transmission rod extends into the hydrogen environment box, the second end of the transmission rod extends out of the hydrogen environment box, the testing clamp comprises a first clamping part and a second clamping part, and the first clamping part is fixed relative to the hydrogen environment box; the second clamping part is connected with the first end of the transmission rod. The driving mechanism drives the transmission rod to slide back and forth. Therefore, a low-temperature and high-pressure hydrogen environment can be provided in combination with the refrigeration device and the hydrogen supply mechanism, the to-be-tested material is mounted on the test fixture, and tension or pressure can be applied to the to-be-tested material by utilizing the driving mechanism, so that the mechanical property test of the to-be-tested material can be completed.

51c82203da219654fc3b19e9938829c5f079aab6.title: High-strength and high-toughness steel suitable for high-humidity and harsh hydrogen environment and preparation method of high-strength and high-toughness steel
51c82203da219654fc3b19e9938829c5f079aab6.abstract: The invention relates to high-toughness steel adapting to a high-damp-heat harsh hydrogen environment and a preparation method, and belongs to the technical field of steel preparation. The high strength and toughness steel comprises the following chemical components in percentage by mass: 0.40%-0.55% of C, 0.20%-1.50% of Si, 0.55%-1.50% of Mn, 0.70%-1.50% of Cr, 0.50%-1.50% of Ni, 0.15%-0.35% of Mo, 0.025%-0.065% of Al, less than or equal to 0.015% of P, less than or equal to 0.010% of S and the balance of Fe and inevitable impurities. By optimizing the alloy element ratio and synergistic effect, the strength, toughness and delayed fracture resistance of the steel are remarkably improved, and the long-life service requirement of the steel in the severe hydrogen environment is met at the strength level of 1200-1400 MPa.

5b4c50e65fa48d1dceabc9c96249640c3a495ddf.title: Method and device for detecting hydrogen embrittlement resistance of high-entropy alloy based on machine learning driving
5b4c50e65fa48d1dceabc9c96249640c3a495ddf.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of high-entropy alloy hydrogen embrittlement resistance detection, and discloses a high-entropy alloy hydrogen embrittlement resistance detection method and device based on machine learning driving, and the method comprises the steps of calculation of elongation at break, setting of an elongation at break threshold and comparison of the elongation at break and the threshold. According to the method, the brittleness resistance of the high-entropy alloy in the hydrogen environment is evaluated through the unified standard elongation at break, and the detection reliability and comparability can be ensured regardless of the sample size. Compared with the direct comparison of the fracture length, the fracture elongation is not influenced by the sample size, so that the samples with different sizes can be evaluated under the unified standard, and the error caused by the size difference of the samples is avoided.

4e1975cdbb75486b38a8c60f9d74e810f53dd034.title: Niobium oxide spraying powder, niobium oxide target material and preparation method thereof
4e1975cdbb75486b38a8c60f9d74e810f53dd034.abstract: The invention discloses niobium oxide spraying powder, a niobium oxide target material and a preparation method of the niobium oxide spraying powder, and belongs to the technical field of plasma powder preparation. According to the niobium oxide spraying powder, niobium oxide and a certain amount of water are mixed and then ground, then slurry obtained through grinding is subjected to spray granulation and then sintered in a hydrogen environment at a specific temperature, and crushing and screening are conducted after sintering, so that the sphericity degree of the niobium oxide spraying powder can be effectively improved; the particle size of the niobium oxide spraying powder is in a proper range, and the particle size distribution uniformity is high; in addition, the obtained niobium oxide spraying powder also has a suitable apparent density range, excellent flowability and a relatively high spraying deposition rate. Meanwhile, in the preparation process of the niobium oxide spraying powder provided by the invention, no other metal powder is added, and no binder is added, so that the preparation cost can be effectively reduced. Furthermore, when the niobium oxide spraying powder provided by the invention is used for preparing a niobium oxide target material, the prepared niobium oxide target material is high in density and low in resistivity.

f516242d52d2b85ca207c909dd324354b731baec.title: High-temperature electrochemical hydrogen charging method suitable for 316L stainless steel
f516242d52d2b85ca207c909dd324354b731baec.abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of hydrogen behavior tests in metal materials, and particularly relates to a high-temperature electrochemical hydrogen charging method suitable for 316L stainless steel. The method provided by the invention is scientific and reasonable in design, and is a high-temperature electrochemical hydrogen charging method taking the mixed molten salt of NaHSO4.H2O and KHSO4 in a mass ratio of 1: 1 as the electrolyte. Compared with normal-temperature electrochemical hydrogen charging which takes H2SO4 as an electrolyte and high-temperature and high-pressure hydrogen charging which is carried out in a hydrogen environment by utilizing a high-pressure kettle in the current 316L stainless steel hydrogen embrittlement research, the method disclosed by the invention not only improves the problem of low efficiency of normal-temperature electrochemical hydrogen charging, but also solves the safety problem of high-temperature and high-pressure electrochemical hydrogen charging; according to the method, high-concentration hydrogen can be introduced into the 316L stainless steel, so that the 316L stainless steel is obviously embrittled.

fd6d6f847cdd73e1c01a28be7a991b341a5f1d66.title: Thermal desorption gas chromatography analysis test system
fd6d6f847cdd73e1c01a28be7a991b341a5f1d66.abstract: The invention provides a thermal desorption gas chromatography analysis test system, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen diffusion characteristic research of materials in a high-pressure hydrogen environment, and the thermal desorption gas chromatography analysis test system comprises a high-pressure permeation device and a thermal desorption diffusion device; the high-pressure permeation device comprises a hydrogen permeation upper end cover, a hydrogen permeation lower end cover and a sealing ring; a hydrogen permeation cavity is formed in the hydrogen permeation lower end cover, a hydrogen inlet channel is formed in the hydrogen permeation lower end cover, and the hydrogen permeation lower end cover is in threaded connection with the hydrogen permeation upper end cover; the sealing ring is arranged in an annular sealing groove between the hydrogen permeation upper end cover and the hydrogen permeation lower end cover; the thermal desorption diffusion device is used for the thermal desorption hydrogen release process of the sample; the hydrogen permeation upper end cover and the hydrogen permeation lower end cover are connected through the threads, so that a sample is convenient to disassemble, assemble, take and place, and meanwhile, the sealing performance of the hydrogen permeation cavity is improved; besides, by arranging an annular sealing groove and a sealing ring, the sealing performance of the high-pressure permeation device is further improved, and the problem of lack of equipment for testing the diffusion performance of hydrogen in the non-metallic material under the 100 MPa high-pressure environment is solved.
